original: Take a §Y5§W year loan of §Y$AMOUNT$§W ducats. You can have up to §Y$SUPPORT$§W bank loans at the same time.
translation: 借贷一笔额度§Y$AMOUNT$§W金的贷款，为期§Y5§W年。最多可以同时向银行借贷§Y$SUPPORT$§W笔贷款。

original: Their government is tied to their dynasty, so we can not replace their ruler.
translation: 该国的政府与其王朝紧密相关，因此我们不能替换他们的统治者。

original: Click this button to create a peace offer that the enemy should be willing to accept. You still get to decide whether or not to send it.
translation: 点击这个按钮，创建一份敌方应该愿意接受的和平提议。你可以自行决定是否发送它。

original: They will not accept any demands right now.
translation: 他们现在不会接受任何要求。

original: They will not accept anything we can offer them right now.
translation: 他们现在不会接受我们的任何提议。
可以获得下列增益效果。\n

original: It will cost $CASH$ ducats to influence this cardinal.
translation: 贿赂这位枢机需要$CASH$金币。

original: This cardinal is already under our control.
translation: 这位枢机已在我们的掌控之下。

original: You can't afford the $CASH$ it would cost to influence this cardinal.
translation: 你无法负担贿赂这位枢机所需的$CASH$金币。

original: You can not move capital to a continent that has less than a third of your total provinces, unless your capital is the last province you own on its continent.
translation: 你无法将首都迁至省份数占比少于三分之一的大陆，除非你的首都是其所在大陆的唯一省份。

original: Breach! With a breach in the walls the besieging armies have a much better chance of storming this fortification!
translation: 城墙已经破裂！围攻部队破坏城防更容易了！

original: The city can hold out for years.
translation: 这座城市还能坚持好几年。

original: The city will probably surrender within twelve months.
translation: 这座城市可能会在十二个月内投降。

original: The city will probably surrender within nine months.
translation: 这座城市可能会在九个月内投降。

original: The city will probably surrender within six months.
translation: 这座城市可能会在六个月内投降。

original: The city will probably surrender within three months.
translation: 这座城市可能会在三个月内投降。

original: The city will surrender any day now.
translation: 这座城市随时可能会投降。

original: There is no sailor maintenance when in port.
translation: 泊于港内时无需水手维护。

original: They will get this size of armies due to:\n
translation: 他们拥有如此规模的军队是因为：\n

original: §Y$WHERE$§W will be a Center of Reformation.\n
§Y$WHERE$§W will no longer be a Center of Reformation.\n
§Y$PROVINCE$§! is a §Y$RELIGION$§! $TYPE$.\nNearby provinces will gradually be converted to §Y$RELIGION$§! as long as it is here and there are provinces it can spread to.
translation: §Y$PROVINCE$§!是一个§Y$RELIGION$§!$TYPE$。\n只要它存在，相邻省份及其它可传播省份的信仰将逐渐被同化为§Y$RELIGION$§!。

original: The religion in §Y$WHERE$§W is being converted to §Y$NEW$§W by a nearby $TYPE|Y$.\n
translation: §Y$WHERE$§W的信仰正在被临近的$TYPE|Y$同化为§Y$NEW$§W。\n

original: A Center of Reformation could appear in a European province.
translation: 宗教改革中心将会出现在欧洲的一个省份。

original: No Center of Reformation will appear.
translation: 宗教改革中心不会出现。

original: A religion can only have $NUM$ Centers of Reformation.
translation: 一个宗教只能拥有$NUM$个宗教改革中心。

original: Centers of Reformation are not available after the start of the Age of Absolutism.
translation: 在专制时代开始后不再会有宗教改革中心。

original: This religion can't have Centers of Reformation.
translation: 这个宗教不会出现宗教改革中心。

original: You already have a Center of Reformation.
translation: 你已有了一个宗教改革中心。

original: The religion is getting converted to §Y$NEW$§W because of its proximity to a $TYPE$.\nThe progress is currently at §Y$VALUE$%§!.\n
translation: 由于靠近一个$TYPE$，这里的信仰将会被同化成§Y$NEW$§W。\n当前进程为§Y$VALUE$%§!。\n

original: It's too late for Centers of Reformation.
translation: 宗教改革中心已经跟不上时代了。

original: Will no longer be an Elector.\n

translation: 选择§Y$NEW$§W作为新的国家理念。\n
不再采纳§Y$LOSE$§W作为国家理念。\n

original: The type of Government changes to §Y$GOV$§W.\n
The Government Rank of $WHO$ changes to $RANK$.
The type of Government of $WHO|Y$ changes to $GOV|Y$ with the Government Rank $RANK|Y$.\n
translation: $WHO|Y$的政体改变为$GOV|Y$ ，政府等级为$RANK|Y$级。\n

original: §R$SIZE$§W Regiment(s) rises up in Revolt in §Y$WHERE$§W.\n
§R$SIZE$§W ship(s) with Pirates will appear in §Y$WHERE$§W.\n
§Y$WHERE$§W will $DIRECTION$ a part of the Holy Roman Empire.\n
This area has no population and therefore no religion.
translation: 这片地区无人居住，因此也没有信仰。

original: Animism is the belief that the world is habited by a number of supernatural spiritual beings without any separation of the mundane and spiritual worlds. Spirits may inhabit anything from mountains to lightening depending on the location of the worshippers.\nIn the game Animist religion is as a label for a wide range of beliefs from South America to Africa or Indonesia.
translation: 泛灵论认为世界上生活着许多超自然的神灵，并且世俗与精神世界是相互联系的。取决于信徒的位置，自高山到闪电都有可能居住着神灵。\n在游戏中，从南美洲到非洲，或者印度尼西亚，泛灵论宗教遍布在整个世界。

original: Norse religion is the polytheistic traditional belief system of the Scandinavian peoples.\nBy 1444 the Norse religion was long gone and exists in no provinces or countries.
translation: 诺斯信仰是斯堪的纳维亚人们信仰的传统多神教。\n1444年时诺斯信仰已经消失了，不存在於任何省份或国家中。

original: The oldest Abrahamic religion in the game, Judaism builds upon the Torah and the traditions and scriptures of the Jewish people going back over 3000 years.\nBy the start of the game the Jewish faith is a minority faith in most of the world and only exist in the two provinces of Semien and Dembiya in Ethiopia.
translation: 游戏中最古老的亚伯拉罕宗教，犹太教建立在托拉、口传律法和3000年前的犹太经典之上。\n在游戏开始时，犹太教已是世界上的小众宗教，只存在于埃塞尔比亚的塞米恩和德姆比亚两个省份。

original: Zoroastrian religion is the traditional faith of the Iranian peoples and the old Persian Empire. Zoroastrianists are monotheists and follow the teachings of the prophet of Zoroaster.\nBy the start of the game Zoroastrianism has been in decline for centuries following the Islamic conquest of Iran and apart from a concentration around the province of Yazd they exist only as minorities in India and Persia not represented in the game.
translation: 琐罗亚斯德教是旧波斯帝国和伊朗人民的传统信仰。 琐罗亚斯德教是一神论并谨遵先知琐罗亚斯德的圣训。\n在游戏开始时，琐罗亚斯德教已经开始衰落，这是因为伊斯兰教征服了伊朗。除了围绕着圣城亚兹德周围的省份在其他印度河波斯地区已经消失。

original: Ibadism is claimed by its adherents to be older than both Sunni and Shia Islam but is nowhere near as popular. The Ibadis stress strict adherence to an interpretation of Islam and the Sharia that they hold as both older and more orthodox.\nIn the game Ibadis exist in majority only in Oman and around the Mzab oasis area in North Africa.
translation: 伊巴德派被它的信徒们宣称比逊尼派和什叶派还要古老，但它的受众却远没那么不多，伊巴德派严格限制信徒们翻译古兰经，这样他们可以保持古老的传统。\n在游戏初始，伊巴德派主要存在于阿曼和北非邻近姆扎卜绿洲的一些地区中。

original: Sikhism is the faith founded by Guru Nanak around the turn of the 16th century in the Punjab. A monotheistic religion, Sikhism was born in an area where Islam and Hinduism mixes but is in many ways unlike either.\nNo province or country start with Sikh religion in the game but it will likely appear some decades from the start.
translation: 锡克教大约在16世纪中在旁遮普的古鲁那纳克成立。 作为一个一神论的宗教，锡克教诞生自伊斯兰教和印度教混杂的区域但又不同于这两者。\n没有省份或者国家以锡克教开局但它将在开局几十年后出现。

original: Like all Buddhist branches, Theravada stems from the teachings of Gautama Buddha in the 5th century BC. The followers of Theravada Buddhism rely on the Pali Canons for religious and legal guidance and emphasis is put on Monastic duties and reaching the status of Arhat or enlightenment.\nIn the game Theravada Buddhism is primarily practiced in Sri Lanka and South East Asia.
translation: 如同佛教的其他分支一样，上座部佛教同样起源于公元前5世纪释伽牟尼所创立的教义。上座部佛教的信徒主要尊崇巴利文经典中的教规和法律，注重僧侣戒律以达到阿罗汉的觉悟。\n在游戏初始，上座部佛教主要在斯里兰卡和一些东南亚国家盛行。

original: Also known as Tantric Buddhism or even Lamaism, Vajrayana is a branch of Buddhism where the goal of the adherents is to become a Bodhisattva through use of Tantric Techniques. It is believed enlightenment cannot be reached simply from lone study but must be taught by a teacher.\nIn the game Vajrayana Buddhism is primarily practiced in Tibet and to some degree on the North Asian Steppes.
translation: 金刚乘又被称作怛陀罗佛教或者喇嘛教，它是佛教分支的一种，信众通过密宗的修行以达到菩萨的境界。该派认为悟道成佛不能仅靠自我修行而是需要有老师的传授。\n在游戏初始，金刚乘主要流行于西藏和北亚的一些草原部落中。

original: Mahayana is the most widely practiced branch of Buddhism. The goal of its adherents is to achieve enlightenment, possibly even achieve Buddhahood.\nIn the game only Dai Viet start as Mahayana Buddhist as many countries where it was dominant are instead categorized as Confucianist.
translation: 大乘佛教是传播最广的一种佛教。该派信徒主要宗旨为悟道，甚至实现成佛。\n在游戏初始，只有大越开局为大乘佛教国家，因为其他的地区主要被儒家思想所支配着。

original: Catholicism is the name of a Christian tradition with its roots in the old Latin rite that recognizes the Pope as the head of Christendom.\nIn 1444 Catholicism is the dominant Christian Church in western and northern Europe but it will likely be broken up by Protestantism and Reformism during the reformation.
translation: 天主教义是一种基督教传统的名称，它奉古老的拉丁礼，尊教宗为基督教世界的领袖。\n1444年，天主教义是西欧和北欧占主导地位的基督教教派，但在宗教改革期间它的地位很可能会被新教和改革宗粉碎。

original: Confucianism is the term for the philosophies of 5th century BC philosopher Confucius and stresses personal development and the importance of good government.\nIn the game China and Korea starts as Confucian countries, with some spread among the Jurchen states in Manchuria.
translation: 儒学是公元前5世纪哲学先贤孔子提出的一种哲学，着重于修身治国平天下。\n游戏开局中国和朝鲜是儒教国家，儒教在满洲的女真部落中也有一定的传播。

original: Hinduism is the term for a wide range of polytheistic Indian traditions with a common pantheon.\nOne of the oldest religions in the game Hinduism primarily exists in India and parts of South East Asia where it has been losing ground to Buddhism and Islam.
translation: 印度教是对在印度地区广泛传播的同属一个神系的印度传统多神信仰的统称。\n作为游戏中最古老的信仰之一，游戏开局时印度教主要存在于如今大多已改宗佛教和伊斯兰教的印度地区和部分东南亚地区。

original: The Orthodox Christian tradition has its root in the Greek rite and considers itself to be closer to the original Christian ideals than Catholicism. The Orthodox Churches reject the idea of the Pope and are instead divided into a number of churches presided over by Patriarchs.\nIn the game much of Eastern Europe is Orthodox religion.
translation: 东正教源于古老的希腊仪式，认为自身比天主教更最接近基督的原旨。东正教会拒绝承认教宗，分成由不同牧首统领的几个教会。\n在游戏中大部分东欧国家信仰东正教。

original: Protestantism covers a wide range of religious traditions starting with the teachings of Martin Luther during the reformation. They react against a number of the conventions that over time have developed in the Catholic church and the idea of a pope itself.\nIn the game Protestantism cover mainly countries inspired by Luther's teachings and who have formed state churches.
translation: 自马丁-路德的宗教改革后，新教在传统宗教区引起了广泛影响。该派反对传统天主教的陈旧规定和教宗的权威。\n在游戏中新教主要覆盖于那些受路德教义启发过的国家，以及那些建立了国家教会的国家。该派也会随着时间的推移缓慢的转化一些传统为天主教的地区。

original: Reformed covers a wide range of religious traditions inspired by men such as Jean Calvin or John Knox. Generally appearing later than the religions classified as Protestant the Reformed religion also rejects papal authority and want to return to the rules of the scriptures but unlike the Protestants they embrace a number of perceived more hard-line ideas such as predestination and iconoclasm and will not form state Churches.
translation: 改革宗主要存在於那些受到让-加尔文或约翰-诺克斯等人思想启发的各种传统宗教地区中，通常它在宗教改革运动中比新教要较晚出现，改革宗同样否定教宗的权威，并希望回归到圣经里的戒律中去，但与新教徒不同，他们接受更严格的教条和想法，如宿命论和破坏偶像，也不会建立正式的教堂。

original: Fetishism covers a very wide range of indigenous African religions. These religions often feature a veneration for ancestors, use of magic and traditional medicine.\nIn the game most of Africa is classified as Fetishist.
translation: 拜物教涵盖了非常广泛的非洲土着宗教。这些宗教通常都有对祖先的崇拜的习惯，使用巫术和传统医学为特色。\n在游戏中，非洲的大部分地区被归类为拜物教。

original: Shia Muslims hold that the legitimate successor of the prophet Muhammad as Caliph and Imam was his cousin and son-in-law Ali. The Shiites believe that a number of Imams have followed Ali and still await the coming of his final successor.\nIn the game Shia Islam is present in Iran, Yemen and as the minority religion in some Indian Sultanates.
translation: 什叶派穆斯林坚称只有先知穆罕穆德的表弟，他的女婿阿里才是穆罕穆德哈里发和伊玛目的合法继承人。 什叶派认为伊玛目必须跟从阿里或者他的继承人。\n在游戏中什叶派穆斯林出现在伊朗，也门和少数的印度苏丹中。

original: Shintoism is the ancient ethnic religion of Japan which over the centuries have come to coexist with Confucianism and Buddhism on the Japanese islands.\nIn the game all of Japan starts out Shintoist to signify the special mix of Buddhism, Shintoism and other traditions of the Japanese people.
translation: 神道教是古老的日本民族信仰，随着几千年的变化与儒教，佛教同时存在在日本。\n在游戏中所有的日本邦国都为神道教来着重体现它和佛教，神道教等其他日本人传统的融合。

original: Sunni Islam holds that the legitimate successor of the Prophet Muhammad was father-in-law Abu Bakr.\nAs the religion of the majority of the world's Muslims Sunni Islam is present from Morocco to Indonesia and is one of the largest religions in the game.
translation: 逊尼派穆斯林坚称只有阿布伯克尔才是先知穆罕穆德的合法继承人。\n作为伊斯兰教在世界中的多数派别，逊尼派穆斯林从西边摩洛哥到东边印度尼西亚都有存在，其也是游戏中最大的宗教之一。

original: Totemistic belief teaches that every individual has a spiritual kinship with an animal, the totem. Those who share a totem animal form clans, and consider one-another family.\nIn the game Totemism is the state religion of all North American Native states and it is present in most of the North American continent.
translation: 图腾教认为每一个个体都与动物图腾有着精神上的联系. 他们共享着动物图腾，认为彼此是一个大家庭。\n在游戏中，图腾教是一些北美原住民的国家信仰，主要存在于北美大陆上。

original: Coptic Christianity is a branch of Christendom that follow the Alexandrine rite and who answer to the Patriarch in Alexandria.\nWith the fall of Egypt to the Muslims hundreds of years ago the Patriarch is controlled by a Non-Christian state with the Coptic religion surviving as the majority faith only in Ethiopia and Nubia.
translation: 科普特正教会是基督教世界的一个分支，奉亚历山大礼，遵从亚历山大牧首。\n埃及沦陷在穆斯林下已经几百年了，亚历山大牧首被掌控在非基督教国家手中，科普特正教只在埃塞俄比亚和努比亚作为主流信仰延续着。

original: Tengri is the chief deity of one of the oldest Turkic or Mongol Shamanist religions.\nIn the game this religion covers a wide variety of Siberian and Manchurian Shamanism practiced by the states that start in North Asia.
translation: 长生天是最古老的突厥和蒙古萨满教中的主神。\n在游戏中这个宗教包括了许多北亚国家奉行的各类西伯利亚信仰和满洲萨满教。

original: Inti religion covers a wide range of disparate Andean faiths with many common features. Inti itself is the name of the sun god that the Inca empire promoted over all the other local Huacas.\nIn the game most of the Andes start out with the Inti religion.
translation: 因蒂宗教是安第斯山脉地区众多有许多共同特征的不同信仰的统称。因蒂是太阳神的名字，印加帝国将其置于其他所有本土神灵之上。\n在游戏中绝大多数安第斯山脉地区的国家开局信仰因蒂宗教。

original: Nahuatl religion is a range of Mesoamerican polytheistic traditions. While the Pantheon and many concepts are quite similar to the Mayan religion the Nahuas or Aztecs assign a much higher importance on the need for human sacrifice in order to survive each new cosmic cycle.\nIn the game most of the area around modern central Mexico starts out with Nahuatl religion.
translation: 纳瓦特尔神话是一系列中美洲多神信仰的泛称。 尽管其神系和许多概念与玛雅宗教十分相似，纳瓦特尔神话或者阿兹特克神话更看重献祭活人以在世界轮回时幸存。\n在游戏中绝大多数现代墨西哥中部地区的国家以纳瓦特尔宗教开局。

original: Mayan religion covers a range of Mesoamerican polytheistic traditions inherited from the older Mayan civilizations. While the names differ the pantheon and many traditions are quite similar to the Nahuatl religion.\nIn the game the Yucatan Peninsula and the former lands of the League of Mayapan starts out with Mayan religion.
translation: 玛雅信仰是中美在地域上的原始信仰，其承自古老的玛雅文明。 尽管在神系和一些传统上与阿兹特克教有很大的相似之处。\n在游戏中尤卡坦半岛和岛屿成立了玛雅联盟信仰着玛雅教。

original: Chinaware' represents various exotic goods such as chinaware and carpets. Generally from the Orient, these high value luxuries command a high price on the market.
translation: 游戏内的瓷器代表了一系列珍贵的商品，包括了瓷器和地毯等。这些主要来自东方的奢侈品在市场上可以卖出高价。

original: Cloth represents the various fabrics and clothing made from wool and linen. Later cotton, imported from India and the Americas, became a major material for cloth.
translation: 织物代表着各种毛料及亚麻的纺织品和衣物.在晚些时期，从印度和美洲进口的棉花成为了织物的主要原材料

original: Coffee was discovered in the northeast region of Ethiopia and coffee cultivation first took place in southern Arabia. From the Middle East, coffee spread to Italy in the 17th century and was then introduced to the rest of Europe. Coffee became more widely accepted after it was deemed a Christian beverage by Pope Clement VIII in 1600, despite appeals to ban the 'Muslim drink'.
translation: 咖啡最早是在埃塞俄比亚东北部发现的，并首先种植于阿拉伯半岛南部.17世纪晚期咖啡传入意大利，然后传至欧洲的其他地方.在1600年，教宗克雷芒八世将其定为基督徒的饮品后，咖啡开始广泛传播，尽管有人要求禁止这种“穆斯林饮品”

original: Copper also includes other non-ferrous metals like lead and tin. Copper was the main component of bronze and was essential in the early production of cannons.
translation: 铜制品也包括了类似铅和锡在内的其他有色金属.铜是青铜的主要成分，也是早期生产大炮的所必须原材料之一

original: Cotton originated from Central Asia but was not widely used in Europe until it was introduced to the American colonies and used as a cheap but good complement or substitute for wool in the clothing industry of the late 18th century
translation: 棉花起源于中亚，直到18世纪晚期，棉花在美洲殖民地种植，才开始在欧洲广泛使用.价廉、物美，在服装工业中，它不仅能够作为毛织品的补充使用，甚至成功的取而代之

original: Fish was one of the most basic foods for the European population in this age, as meat was more than a luxury for the great majority. Fishermen also provided the basic recruiting pool of the merchant and military navies of most nations.
translation: 鱼类在当时是欧洲人最重要的食物来源之一，因为肉类对大多数人来说还属于奢侈品. 在大多数国家，渔民是商船和军舰水手的基本来源.

original: Furs were one of the basic elements of high quality and warm clothing. Skins from all kinds of animals were supplied initially from Russia but more and more from North America where beavers would be the prize of choice at least till the late middle 18th century.
translation: 毛皮是制造暖和衣服的基本材料之一，最初所有的毛皮是由俄罗斯来提供，但到18世纪中晚期，上等毛皮已越来越多地取自生活在北美洲的河狸皮.

original: Gold and silver were the basis of all formal currencies in Europe. The great gold and silver mines of Central and South America would end the great bullion crisis that had gripped Europe in the previous century. However unwise usage of this great wealth could lead to inflation and ruin.
translation: 黄金和白银是欧洲地区最基本的流通货币. 在中南美洲发现的金矿数十倍地增加了流通货币量，为一些国家带来了巨额财富，但也带来了货币贬值和通货膨胀.

original: Grain represents the vegetable foodstuff that was the staple diet for humans and animals. Lack of it would always lead to revolts and riots. Other cereals and vegetable foodstuffs would later be augmented by tomatoes, corn, and even potatoes from America offering a wider choice both in food and agricultural production varieties.
translation: 谷物包括各种植物类食品，是人和动物最重要的日用必需品，谷物的缺乏总是会带来叛乱和暴动. 其他的植物类食品包括原产于美洲的番茄，玉米及马铃薯等，使得农业生产更加多样化.

original: Iron represents not just iron, but other ferrous metals and the production of alloys such as steel. Iron formed the basis of the metallurgical industry and was used extensively in the production of weapons and other military equipment.
translation: 铁代表铁和其它黑色金属，比如钢. 铁是冶金工业的最基本原料，并被用于制造武器和其他军事装备.

original: Ivory was one of the main exports of Africa apart from slaves. It was highly sought after by Europeans for use in various manufactured goods such as cutlery, gifts, small pieces of art, furniture, etc.
translation: 象牙是来自非洲除奴隶外最重要的贸易品，被欧洲人用于各种产品，包括餐具，家具和艺术装饰品等.

original: Naval Supplies represent everything needed in ship construction, from basic wood to tar, ropes, linen, sails, and various other materials. The Baltic was initially the main supplier until North America became an alternate source of supply in the early 18th century. Colonial expansion into America was in part to secure supplies of such vital goods.
translation: 海军供给代表了所有船只上需要的物品，从基础的木头到焦油、绳子、亚麻布、船帆以及各种其他东西.最初，波罗的海一直是主要供应地，直到18世纪早期北美成为另一个源产地.对于这些关系到国计民生的资源的需求也是殖民美洲的源动力之一

original: Salt is essential for human life. In addition it was the most common means to preserve food for the long winter months. It was either mineral, brought from mines in Central Europe, or natural, from salt marsh production via evaporation along sunny coastlines.
translation: 食盐对于人的生存是不可或缺的，还被用来在冬季贮存食物. 食盐主要来自中欧的盐矿，盐碱地和沿海地区.

original: Slaves had been a trading commodity since Antiquity but demand increased sharply in the late 16th century when Slaves offered one of the cheapest sources of labor for European plantations in the Americas.
translation: 从古典时代起奴隶就已经是商品之一了.但是在16世纪晚期，由于开在美洲的欧洲种植园需要奴隶作为最廉价的劳动力的来源之一，对于奴隶的需求迅猛增长

original: Spices were known in Europe since ancient times, mostly for their medicinal value, and for their ability to improve the taste of food. Pepper, ginger, nutmeg, chili, cinnamon, etc. came partly from East Africa but mostly from India, China, and the Spice Islands (current Indonesia), to be traded in Alexandria or the other terminals of the great caravan roads. The European desire for cheaper and more direct supply constituted the main motivation for the very first eastbound sea voyages of discoveries for Portugal.
translation: 香料在古代即为欧洲所知，主要用于医药和改善食物味道。包括胡椒，生姜，豆蔻，辣椒，肉桂与其他类似物品，其产区包括东非，印度，中国和香料群岛（即今印度尼西亚），通过亚历山大等贸易城市运抵欧洲。欧洲人对香料的渴求是葡萄牙发现东方航线的重要动力。

original: Sugar was used not only as a sweetener but also for food preservation. The sugar cane was the only known means of obtaining sugar at this time and had been grown initially in some Mediterranean islands. But the labor-intensive plantation system in America, especially in the Caribbean islands, would soon move the major production sources overseas.
translation: 糖不仅是一种甜味剂，也是食物保藏的手段之一.最早甘蔗是仅有的提取糖的来源，种植范围也仅限地中海群岛.但是随着美洲劳动密集型种植园体系的建立，尤其是加勒比海群岛地区，很快甘蔗的主产地就移至海外了

original: Tea was an important luxury drink in China, India, and South-East Asia. It was often used in religious or social rituals. The English popularized tea in Europe. Never considered as noble a drink as coffee it still produced large profit merely from the fact that the world supply was low.
translation: 茶是重要的奢侈饮料，主要产于中国，印度和东南亚地区，大量用于宗教仪式和社会庆典. 英国人在欧洲普及了饮茶习俗. 虽然不像咖啡一样被认为是贵族饮料，但较低的产量使茶叶也能带来大量的收入.

original: Tobacco was unknown in Europe until brought from Americans in the late 16th century. It quickly became a fashion for the upper classes who could afford it and ensured the fast and profitable economic growth of the British colonies in North America, as well as in Portuguese Brazil. No one knew what they put in it, but they just couldn't stop smoking it.
translation: 烟草在欧洲长期不为人所知，直到16世纪晚期才从美洲传入，很快就在富欤的上流社会中流行起来. 由于其利润丰厚而在北美的英国殖民地和巴西大量种植. 没有人知道为什么没办法停止吸烟.

original: Wines had been produced since time immemorial in the southern parts of Europe. It still constituted an essential element of the everyday diet, except maybe in the Muslim world. Wine was not considered a luxury product but probably served as a welcome relief for hundreds to an otherwise dull diet.
translation: 早在远古时代酒就已经在南欧出现了.它一直是日常饮食的重要组成部分之一，或许只有穆斯林才能拒绝它的诱惑.酒并不是一种奢侈品，作为粗茶淡饭的佐餐良品它广受欢迎

original: Wool came mostly from sheep that grazed in the more marginal lands not suited to other forms of agriculture. Prior to the use of cotton it was the major raw material for clothing.
translation: 羊毛主要来自无法种植农作物的草原上牧养的羊群. 在棉花为人们所知之前是衣服的主要原料.

original: Cocoa was used as a stimulant by the Aztecs, Incas and Indian rulers since the early medieval times. It was popularized in Europe in the early 16th century when the Spaniards imported it from its American colonies. Cocoa became a luxury enjoyed by the rich.
translation: 自中世纪起，阿兹塔克、印加和印第安的统治者们就常用可可作为刺激性饮料。16世纪初叶可可由西班牙人从美洲殖民地引入欧洲便风靡起来，成为富人们享受的奢侈品。

original: Used for everything from chess pieces to high quality furniture, tropical woods have always been considered an expensive and exclusive commodity. While many of these wood types would be new to the European market the demand soon rose and the trafficking of Mahogany, Teak, Ebony or other rare woods soon became a major business.
translation: 热带木材作为一种名贵的高级商品被广泛应用于从制作棋子到高质量的家具的各个领域中. 对于欧洲市场来说许多种类的热带木材都是陌生品种,但是它们的需求在迅速上升,红木,柚木,乌木等珍稀木材的倒卖迅速成为一项重要的商业活动.

original: For as long as textiles have been woven there has been a market for fine dyes. During the late middle ages expensive dyes such as Indigo would be worth a fortune due to how distant the source in India was.\nAs the world opened up dyes became easier to get hold of, both through the possibilities to produce them in America and the greater accessibility of the Indian market. Nonetheless dyes remained rare and in the early 19th century, as the dye plantations in India fell into European hands, a veritable gold rush ensued.
translation: 只要世上还有纺织品，就会有对染料的需求。在中世纪晚期，像产自印度的靛蓝这样的珍贵染料随着运输距离的增长价格会逐渐变的高不可攀。\n随着航路的开辟，染料变得易于获得，在美洲也可以生产染料，前往印度的商路也更加通畅。尽管如此，直到19世纪初，染料依然十分珍贵。因此随着印度的广大种植园终于落入欧洲人手中，一场「淘金热」也随之爆发。

original: The finest of all fabrics of the east was the silk produced in India, China and East Asia. While less iconic than spices the profits from silk and finely woven cotton cloth would in fact soon dwarf those of the spice trade for the European East India Companies.\nDue to increasing demand attempts were also made to produce the material locally in Mercantilist Europe, with very varied degrees of success.
translation: 东方的纺织品中最上佳者,就是产于印度,中国和东亚的丝绸. 虽然不像香料那样具有标志性,但是实质上欧洲国家的东印度公司从丝绸和其他高级纺织品衣物中赚取的利润要比香料高得多.\n随着需求的上涨,重商的欧洲人也尝试着在本土生产丝绸,而结果则有好有坏.

original: To spread smoke and fragrance through the burning of materials has been common in ceremonial practices for centuries. Frankincense, Agarwood, Sandalwood, Myhrr and other goods suited for this use can be found in few places and their diffusion was an integral part in the formation of trade networks such as the Silk Road or the fittingly named Incense Route.
translation: 在几个世纪的仪式实践中，通过焚烧材料以传播香味和烟雾已经十分普遍。乳香，沉香，檀香，没药等适合这种用途的商品可以在少数地方找到，他们的传播扩散是诸如丝绸之路（恰当名为香路）等贸易网络形成的一个组成部分。

original: Since the dawn of history, the care for domesticated animals has been one of the main occupations of humanity. Livestock includes everything from cows and horses in rich agricultural areas to the herds of pastoralists in the great plains and deserts of the world.
translation: 自有历史以来，对于家畜的照顾一直是人性的重要部分。畜牧包括了世界上从富饶的农业区到大草原以及沙漠的牧民放牧的牛马以及别的牲畜。

original: Glass has been valued for centuries as a useful material for art, architecture, or simply the crafting of vessels for daily use. Eventually, as glass-making techniques improved, glass would also become crucial to the scientific field of optics, with glass lenses being used in the fabrication of spectacles, telescopes, and a plethora of other devices with wide-ranging applications from maritime navigation to the natural sciences.
translation: 玻璃作为艺术，建筑或者日用器皿制造的有用材料，已经被珍视了数个世纪。最终，随着玻璃制造技术的提升，玻璃会变在光学领域变得重要，玻璃透镜会被用在眼睛，望远镜和大量有着从航海到自然科学的广泛应用的其他设备的制造中。

original: Paper is a necessity for all types of advanced accounting, administration and diffusion of knowledge and the process of its production was originally devised in China and then slowly made its way to all corners of the Old World. Far superior to other types of writing materials such as parchment the large scale production of paper requires a specialized set of skills and equipment, making it a rare and sought after commodity.
translation: 纸张对于各种先进计算、管理和知识的传播都是必不可少的，造纸术最早起源于中国，并逐渐传播到世界角落。远远优于羊皮纸等其他类型的书写材料，纸张的大规模生产需要一套专门的技术和设备，使其成为一种难得的商品。

original: Since the earliest times, stones such as rubies, sapphires, diamonds, emeralds, jade, or pearls, have been used in jewelry and ceremonial attire. For centuries the only source of diamonds in the world were the fabled mines at Golconda. While not all precious stones are as rare, they are all highly sought after commodities.
translation: 很早以来，诸如红宝石，蓝宝石，钻石，祖母绿，珍珠，玉石等宝石已被用作首饰和仪式服饰。虽然并不是所有的宝石都是罕见的，但几个世纪以来，世界上钻石的唯一来源是戈尔孔达的钻石矿，它们都受到热烈追捧。

original: Coal has a long history as a source of fuel, but it is not until the invention and dissemination of the practical Steam Engine that demand would take off. As the Industrial Revolution swept across Europe, the use and export or import of coal would become a major business and an integral part of a modern economy.
translation: 煤作为一种燃料，拥有很长的历史，但直到实用蒸汽机发明和传播之后对煤的需求才起飞。随着工业革命散布到整个欧洲，煤的使用和进出口会成为一项重要生意和现代经济的组成部分。

original: Die roll for this side in this phase.
translation: 现阶段该军队的幸运点数.

original: Relative modifier from SHOCK value of commanding leader compared to the opponent's commanding leader.
translation: 我军将领与敌军将领冲击力的差距影响.

original: Relative modifier from FIRE value of commanding leader compared to the opponent's commanding leader.
translation: 我军将领与敌军将领火力的差距影响.

original: Terrain effect on the dice roll.
River crossing or landing effect on the dice roll.
translation: 跨河或者登陆作战会影响战斗骰值.

original: You cannot disband a unit that is in enemy land or next to enemy armies.
translation: 你不能在被敌人占领的地域或者临近敌人的军队时解散单位
你不能解散遣外雇佣军团.

original: Disbanding an army will reduce the amount of money your nation is spending on maintenance.\nIf the unit is very low strength you may want to disband it and use your manpower pool to reinforce units in more important areas.
translation: 解散一支部队可以减少国家军费支出.如果该部队兵力不足，你可能想要解散它，以便将人力用于更重要的地方

original: $NUMBER|Y$ of its men will return to our manpower pool. Mercenaries will not return.
translation: $NUMBER|Y$ 的人将回到人力池中，雇佣兵将不会返还。

original: Disbanding a fleet will reduce the amount of money your nation is spending on maintenance.\nIf the unit is very low strength you may want to disband it and use your sailor pool to reinforce fleets in more important areas.\nWhen disbanding a fleet, its sailors will be returned to our sailor pool.
translation: 解散一支舰队可以减少国家军费支出.\n如果该单位实力较差，你可能想要解散它，以便将水手用于更重要的地方.\n解散舰队时，水手将会被返还.

original: Creating a new unit will create an empty unit and allow you to assign regiments from the current unit to it.
translation: 组建新单位将会创造一个空单位，可以使你把团队从其他单位调出分配进去.

original: This button will close the current troop window\n§YRight click to select this unit§W
translation: 这个按钮将关闭当前部队窗口\n§Y右击选中这个单位§W

original: Choosing the merge option will take the current selected units and convert them into a single unit.
translation: 合并功能可以使被选中的单位合并成一个单位

original: You can only reorganize when two units are selected.
translation: 你至少要选中两个以上的单位才能重组.

original: You can't merge units of different countries.
translation: 你不可以将不同国家的单位混搭到一起.

original: You can only reorganize when none of the units are in combat.
translation: 当任何一个被选中的单位处于战斗中时不能重组.

original: You can only reorganize when none of the units are retreating.
translation: 当任何一个被选中的单位在撤退中时不能重组.

original: You can only reorganize when units are in the same location.
translation: 只有在同一省份的单位才能重组.

original: Reorganizing these two units will allow you move regiments between the two units
translation: 你可以通过整编这两支部队改变他们所属团队

original: Clicking here will transfer the regiment from the current unit to the other one.
translation: 点击这里将会把团队转移到另一个单位里

original: This is a pure multiplier that determines how much damage your troops ultimately deal during the Fire phase of combat. It represents the technological advancements in weapons and material.
translation: 这是决定一支部队在战斗开火阶段对敌军杀伤能力的因子.它体现了武器和装备上的科技进步

original: This is a pure multiplier that determines how much damage your troops ultimately deal during the Shock phase of combat. It represents the technological advancements in weapons and material.
translation: 这是决定一支部队在战斗的冲击阶段杀伤敌军能力的因子.它体现了武器和装备上的科技进步

original: This is a flat increase to the amount of damage your units deal in combat.
translation: 少量增加你的部队在战斗中造成的伤害

original: §YGive Ruler Military Command§!\nThis will make a general out of your ruler. He or she will then be available to command your armies.
translation: §Y让统治者成为将领§!\n这将使你的统治者变成一名将军。他（她）将能够指挥军队。

original: A monarch who leads an army into combat is far more likely to die, a monarch's death could cause negative effects like a regency council or cause your country to become a junior partner in a personal union. Also your country itself will not see the death of its ruler in a battle as a positive sign.
translation: 亲自领导军队的君主死亡的可能性更高，君主的死亡可能会导致诸如摄政会议或者被他国联合统治等负面效果。你的国家本身也不愿看到统治者战死沙场。

original: You have already chosen to convert your ruler to a general. Remember a monarch who leads an army into combat is far more likely to die, a monarch's death could cause negative effects like a regency council or cause your country to become a junior partner in a personal union. Also your country itself will not see the death of its ruler in a battle as a positive sign.
translation: 你的统治者早已成为将军。请记住，亲自领导军队的君主死亡的可能性更高，君主的死亡可能会导致诸如摄政会议或者被他国联合统治等负面效果。你的国家本身也不愿看到统治者战死沙场。

original: A female ruler cannot become a general in our country.
translation: 在我国女性统治者无法成为将领。

original: You have a female monarch, they cannot take the field and lead your armies unless an idea or policy allows them to.
translation: 女性君主正在统治这个国家，她们不能上战场指挥军队，除非理念或政策允许。

original: You have a regency council, so there is no monarch that can become a general on the field.
translation: 正处于摄政会议期间，君主还不能上战场指挥军队。

original: Your monarch is still a minor and a regency council is running your nation. You cannot convert your ruler to a general just yet as he is not old enough to command an army.
translation: 你的君主现在还小，一个摄政会议正在统治你的国家. 你不能把君主转变为将军，因为他的年纪还不足以指挥军队。

original: You need the '§YQuest for the New World§!' national idea to recruit explorers and conquistadors.
translation: 你需要「§Y探索新世界§!」国家理念才能招募探险家和征服者。

original: Naval units are usually restricted to the sea areas that have already been explored. However naval units commanded by explorers can strike out into the unknown.\n
translation: 海军只能在已发现水域航行，只有由探险家指挥的海军单位可以探索未知水域.

original: Land units are usually restricted to land provinces that have already been explored. Recruiting a conquistador will allow you to explore more land areas and maybe add them to your empire.\n
translation: 陆军只能在已发现陆地行军. 征服者可以探索更多陆地并将新大陆并入你的帝国.

original: An Admiral can command your naval units, the ability of your admiral depends on your Naval Tradition.\n
translation: 提督可以指挥海军单位，提督的能力取决与你的海军传统.

original: A General can command your land units, the ability of your general depends on your Army Tradition.\n
translation: 将军可以指挥陆军单位，将军的能力取决于你的陆军传统.

original: Maximum of §Y$VALUE$§W percent in this location.
The following modifiers are applied to this multiplicatively:\n
translation: 下列效果取决于这些乘数:\n
你已经信仰这个宗教了

original: You cannot convert religion when you are at war.
translation: 战争期间不能转换国教.

original: You can only convert religion if we have a positive stability in our country.
translation: 只有我国稳定度足够时才能转换国教。

original: It is not possible to convert to §Y$NEW$§W from §Y$OLD$§W.
You cannot change religion when you are the defender of a faith.
translation: 你是信仰守护者，不能转换国教。

original: $COUNTRY$ has their capital on the same continent.
They are too advanced technologically benefit from becoming a protectorate.
translation: 他们科技组太先进而无法通过成为受保护国而受益。

original: We are too advanced technologically to benefit from becoming a protectorate.
translation: 我们科技组太先进而无法通过成为受保护国而受益。

original: Our capitals are located on the same continent.
translation: 我们的首都位于同一大陆.

original: Their capital must be in range from our traders.\n    §W(Current Range: §Y$CURR$§W Max Range: §Y$MAX$§W).
translation: 他们的首都必须在我们的贸易范围内。\n§W(目前距离: §Y$CURR$§W 最大距离: §Y$MAX$§W)。

original: Our capital must be in range from their traders.\n    §W(Current Range: §Y$CURR$§W Max Range: §Y$MAX$§W).
translation: 我们的首都必须在他们的贸易范围内。\n§W(目前距离: §Y$CURR$§W 最大距离: §Y$MAX$§W)。
和 $COUNTRY$ 的停战协议将于 §Y$DATE$§! 到期.

original: Impact of Production Modifiers and\nTrade Good Price
translation: 生产力修正和\n货物价格

original: You can store up to §Y$VAL$§! papal influence ($YEAR$ years worth)
translation: 你最多可贮存§Y$VAL$§!教廷影响力（每年$YEAR$）
附庸提供的军队数量上限

original: A governmental form where power is shared between the monarch and the nobles, where labor or military services are offered in exchange for land.
translation: 封建君主制的国家权力由君主和贵族分享，贵族提供劳力和兵役以换取土地分封。

original: A governmental form where the nation is governed as a republic but with a heavy reliance on trade and commerce.\nIf a Merchant Republic has more than 20 Provinces in §YStates§!, they will suffer a penalty to their §YRepublican Tradition§!.
translation: 商业共和制国家的经济极度地依赖商业和贸易，权力掌握在商人集团手中。\n若一个商业共和制国家拥有超过20个§Y直辖§!省份，则会遭受§Y共和传统§!的惩罚。

original: Among the earliest government types known to man, the country is ruled by a single individual with undefined power.
translation: 独裁君主制的历史极为悠久，国家权力由个人单独掌控，完全不受任何限制。

original: A political system where a country is governed by nobles, holding substantial rights and benefits.
translation: 贵族共和制国家的权力掌握在贵族集团的手中，政策法律均偏向于满足贵族的利益。

original: A governmental form where the state is governed as a monarchy relying to a great extent on strict organization of political matters and bureaucracy.
translation: 官僚君主制国家的运作十分倚重组织严密的文官集团。

original: A governmental form where the state is governed as a republic relying to a great extent on strict organization of political matters and bureaucracy.
translation: 官僚共和制国家的运作十分倚重组织严密的文官集团。

original: A governmental form where a few patrician families hold the power and elect rulers amongst themselves.
translation: 一种由少数显贵家族把持权力并在他们自己人当中选出统治者的政府形式。

original: A governmental form where peasant communities hold the power themselves and elect rulers from among their leaders.
translation: 一种由农民团体把持权力并在他们自己人当中选出统治者的政府形式。

original: A governmental form where the monarch governs the country with absolute power, without having to abide by any laws or regulations.
translation: 专制君主制国家的最高统治者掌握着国家所有事务的最终决定权，不受任何法律的约束。

original: A governmental form under a monarch, which can more be described as an army with a state, than a state with an army.
translation: 一种极其尚武的君主制政府形式，与其说是拥有军队的国家，更像是一个拥有国家的军队。

original: A governmental form where elected representatives exercise absolute power over the state.
translation: 独裁共和制下当选统治集团在获得职位后拥有不受限制的权力。

original: A governmental form where the monarch has to abide by a certain constitution.
translation: 君主立宪制下最高统治者的权力受到宪法条文的约束。

original: In essence a political system where a nation is governed by an absolute ruler embracing the ideas of the Enlightenment.
translation: 开明君主制的最高统治者拥有不受限制的权力，但受启蒙思潮影响而较为仁慈宽厚。

original: A political system where the state is governed by representatives elected by the people who have to follow a specified set of laws and regulations.
translation: 立宪共和制下当选统治集团的权力受到宪法条文的约束。

original: A governmental form where a nation is controlled by state officials primarily concerned with procedural correctness.
translation: 官僚极权制国家的各级官僚机构十分注重制度教条。

original: A governmental form where the nation is governed by the clergy in the name of God.
translation: 政教合一制国家的权力由宗教领袖掌握，并以神的名义进行统治。

original: A governmental form where the nation is governed by the members of a Monastic Order in the name of God.
translation: 政府形式为国家被神受君权的骑士团所统治着。

original: A political structure where the nation is governed by a spiritual leader, the Pope, the highest ranking office of the Roman Catholic Church.
translation: 教宗制国家由天主教的世俗象征教宗统治。

original: A political system where a tribe is controlled by an individual ruler with unlimited power and the ability to exercise any action without consequence or retribution, often ruling through fear.
translation: 此种政体下的部落领袖拥有不受任何制约的无限权力，往往导致极端残暴的统治。

original: A political system where a large tribal society has formed a kingdom, with one strong ruler who rules through law.
translation: 一种由部落社会构成的王国，一个强力的统治者通过法律来统治。

original: A governmental form where a confederation of tribes rule with a certain degree of internal autonomy but are nationally governed by a central authority.
translation: 此种政体下各部落拥有一定自主权，并推举一位盟主为其共同领袖。

original: A governmental form where all the members of the tribe are allowed to make their voice heard and influence how their tribe should be governed.
translation: 此种政体下部落成员对公共事务拥有一定的发言权。

original: This state is the upholder of the Imperial Roman legacy and the Orthodox Church. As Tsar of all the Russias our ruler is the true overlord of the Eastern Slavic Peoples.
translation: 这个国家是罗马遗产和东正教会的中流砥柱。全俄罗斯的统治者——沙皇是所有东斯拉夫人民名副其实的领主。

original: This state has a government system that has evolved in the years after the fall of Kiev and under the pressure of constant incursions of Tatar tribute expeditions. The ruling family can exercise great power, but seniority succession and princely appanages can lead to lengthy internal conflicts.
translation: 在吸取了基辅罗斯衰落的教训，以及长期承受鞑靼人劫掠的压力之后，这个国家的政体已经进化。统治家族手握重权，但世袭权利和领地划分可能引起内部冲突。

original: An advisor dedicated to the study of the fundamental nature of knowledge, reality and existence.
translation: 哲学家专注于研究认知，现实以及存在等抽象概念的深刻本质.

original: An advisor highly skilled in the study of nature and the physical world.
translation: 自然科学家专注于自然与物理世界的研究.

original: A highly creative person exceptionally skilled in sculpturing, painting or poetry.
translation: 一位在雕塑，绘画和诗歌方面拥有杰出技能和创造力的人士。

original: A skilled politician, highly efficient in governmental matters and responsibilities of the state.
translation: 政治家具有高超的政治才能，勇于负责，擅长处理各种政治事务.

original: An advisor responsible for the administration of the nation's financial wealth and trade investments.
translation: 财政专家可以负责国家财政金融，管理贸易投资等.

original: A highly ranked naval veteran continuously investigating new inventions and naval tactics to improve and expand our existing navy.
translation: 海军改革者能够在各种船船武器研究，舰队战策略或舰队建设方面发挥突出作用.

original: A highly ranked military veteran continuously investigating new inventions and tactics to improve and expand our existing army.
translation: 陆军改革者能够在各种陆战武器研究，陆地战策略或陆军建设方面发挥突出作用.

original: A trade advisor controlling all aspects of trade in the state from allocating the right number of merchants to where the most suitable trade routes exists.
translation: 贸易家可以负责拓展商业贸易，分配商业人才以获取利益最大化.

original: A person highly knowledgeable in spiritual matters and the study of religious topics.
translation: 一位在精神事务和宗教话题上拥有丰富知识的人。

original: Our eyes and ears in foreign countries, aids us in our efforts to collect both military and political information from our rivals without their knowledge.
translation: 间谍大师是我们的不可多得的耳目，最擅长搜集机密军事政治信息.

original: Our government's representative overseas, responsible for the administration of our colonies.
translation: 殖民地官员能够帮助政府管理远洋领地，进行殖民地的拓展与开发.

original: Our government's representative in foreign countries.
translation: 外交家能够帮助政府协调与各国的关系，改善国家形象.

original:
Sire, Our National Bank Loan of §Y$AMOUNT$§W ducats has expired.
We can repay the loan immediately in its full amount.
Or we may choose to extend this loan for a period of §Y5§W years.
Extending the loan will increase our inflation by §R+$INF$%§W.
We will also have to continue paying the interest of §Y$INT$%§W.
translation: 大人，我们从国家银行贷款的 $AMOUNT$ 金币已经到期.

original: Sire, The loan of $AMOUNT$ that $COUNTRY$ has lent us, has now expired.
translation: 大人，我们从 $COUNTRY$ 贷款的 $AMOUNT$ 金币已经到期.

original: Sire, $COUNTRY$ is offering us a loan of $AMOUNT|Y$¤ ducats until $DURATION$. We will have to pay an interest of §Y$INTEREST$%§! yearly if we accept.
translation: 大人，$COUNTRY$ 提议借给我们 $AMOUNT$ 金币，在 $DURATION$ 偿还. 贷款利率是每年 $INTEREST$ .

original: We are currently researching §Y$NAME$§W and with this funding we expect to be finished in §Y$DATE$§W.
translation: 我们正在研究§Y$NAME$§W并预计将在§Y$DATE$§W完成.

original: We are currently investing for stability level §Y$NAME$§W and with this funding we expect to be finished in §Y$DATE$§W.
translation: 我们正在投资§Y$NAME$§W级稳定度，预计将在§Y$DATE$§W完成.

original: We have reached our maximum level.
We have a §Y$CHANCE$§W percent chance to compete one of their merchants away.
translation: 我们有§Y$CHANCE$§W的机会排挤掉其他商人.

original: This merchant is generating §Y$AMOUNT$§W ducats yearly.
translation: 此商人团每年可得到§Y$AMOUNT$§W金币的收入.

original: Send a merchant to this center.
translation: 向这个贸易中心派遣商人.

original: We must reach level §Y$LVL$§W in §Y$TABLE$§W before building this.
translation: 我们必须在§Y$TABLE$§W达到§Y$LVL$§W级时才能建造此建筑.

original: You cannot build this without first building
This building cannot be built here.
translation: 此建筑不能在这里建造

original: You may not build this if you have already built
Are you sure you wish to build
A construction is currently in progress.
$BUILDING$ can only be built in a capital.
$BUILDING$ can only be built in a port.
Click here to recruit this regiment.
translation: 点击这里来组建此团队.

original: The fire value of the unit is a measure of the amount of casualties the unit will inflict in the fire phase of combat. The amount depends, in part, on the offensive fire value of the attacking units and the defensive fire value of the defending units.
translation: 一个单位的火力是对此单位在战斗的射击阶段消灭敌军能力的度量. 具体数值取决于部队两个方面的表现：作为进攻方时的火力和作为防御方时的火力.

original: The shock value of the unit is a measure of the amount of casualties the unit will inflict in the shock phase of combat. The amount depends, in part, on the offensive shock value of the attacking units and the defensive shock value of the defending units.
translation: 一个单位的冲击力是对此单位在战斗的冲锋阶段消灭敌军能力的度量. 这个数值取决于部队两个方面的表现：作为进攻方时的冲击力和作为防御方时的冲击力.

original: The morale value of the unit is a measure of how much morale damage it will inflict on opposing units. When a combatant has 0 morale its units will retreat even if they are still numerically superior. The amount of damage depends, in part, on the offensive morale value of the attacking units and the defensive morale value of the defending units.
translation: 士气是衡量一支部队在战斗过程中能承受敌方损伤士气程度的数值。如果参战部队士气为零，即使人数占优也会撤退。承受的士气损伤程度取决于进攻单位的进攻士气和防御单位的防御士气。

original: You cannot afford this regiment. You need at least $COST$¤
translation: 你无法承担这支部队的费用，至少需要$COST$¤

original: This province is already recruiting a unit.
translation: 这个省份已在征募团队.

original: Click here to build this ship.
This province is already building a ship.
translation: 这个省份已在建造舰船.

original: Cannons are the attack value of the ship
translation: 火炮是度量战舰进攻能力的数值

original: Is the effectiveness of the ship in combat, the higher the speed the more likely a ship will find and engage a target
translation: 体现了战舰在战斗中的效率，船速越快，就越容易在战斗中率先发现敌舰并率先开火.

original: Is the ability for ships to resist damage
translation: 用来度量战舰的坚固程度

original: You cannot afford this building, it costs $PRICE$¤ to build.
translation: 你无法承担该建筑的花费，至少需要$PRICE$¤

original: Do you wish to embrace the idea of $IDEA$?
You have currently not selected any idea for this slot.
translation: 目前还没有为这个槽位选择任何理念。

original: A new slot will open up when we reach government tech level §Y$NEWLEVEL$§W. Our current level is §Y$LEVEL$§W.
translation: 如果我们的行政等级达到§Y$NEWLEVEL$§W级，我们就能再选择一个国家理念。我们的当前的等级是§Y$LEVEL$§W级。

original: You are not advanced enough to send merchants.
We have a complete monopoly, no use sending more merchants.
translation: 我们已经完成了垄断，不必再派遣更多商人了。

original: We have no merchants to send.
translation: 我们没有商人可供派遣

original: You have the maximum number of merchants en route.
translation: 你派出商人的数目已经达到上限

original: We cannot afford to send a merchant here. We need $VALUE$ ducats to do that.
translation: 我们无法派遣商人，我们需要 $VALUE$ 金币来支付所需费用

original: We are not advanced enough to have a monopoly.
Do you wish to change your government from $OLDIDEA$ to $NEWIDEA$?
translation: 你是否想要将你的政府从$OLDIDEA$变更为$NEWIDEA$？

original: This will change your legitimacy to §Y$LEG$§!.
translation: 你的正统性将因此变为§Y$LEG$§!

original: You cannot send a missionary to a province that you do not control and own.
translation: 你不能将传教士派往你尚未控制的省份

original: We lead a Trade League they are part of.
translation: 我们领导着他们所在的贸易联盟.

original: They lead a Trade League we are part of.
translation: 他们领导着我们所在的贸易联盟.

original: We are in the same Trade League as equals.
translation: 我们平等的处于同一贸易联盟中.

original: They are at war with us.
Leads a Personal Union with us.
translation: 该国主导着与我国的联合统治。

original: In a Personal Union with us.
translation: 该国接受了我国的联合统治。
该国得到了我国的独立保证。
该国保证了我们的独立。
我国与该国没有外交上的联系。

original: The lord of $ACTOR$ wishes to enter a Royal Marriage with one of your sovereign lord's dependents. This will bring our two countries closer together.
translation: $ACTOR$的领主想要和你的家族成员进行王室联姻。这将会使得我们两国的关系更加紧密。

original: Our vassal $ACTOR$ wants to be designated as our march instead of vassal. As a march, they won't pay us any taxes and we can't annex them, but they will get the following bonuses:
translation: 我们的附庸$ACTOR$希望成为卫戍国。作为卫戍国，他们不向我们缴税也不能被我们吞并，但他们将获得以下加成：

original: Our legitimacy will change by $VAL$ when signing the deal, due to their inferior prestige and legitimacy.
translation: 由于对方较低的威望和正统性，如果签订协议，我国正统性将$VAL$。

original: Do you wish to request a Royal Marriage with $COUNTRY$? This will bring our two realms closer together.
translation: 你想与$COUNTRY$王室联姻吗？ 这将使我们两国的关系更加紧密。

original: We have received an offer of peace from $COUNTRY$. They are offering us the following terms:
translation: 我们收到了来自$COUNTRY$的和平提议。他们提供了下列条款：

original: We negotiate on behalf of our entire alliance
translation: 谈判时，我国将代表整个同盟
谈判时，§Y我国仅代表本国§W

original: , and they are negotiating for their entire alliance.
, and they are merely §Ynegotiating for themselves.§W
\n(Our people expect us to accept this peace deal, refusing it would cause great turmoil in our country.)
translation: \n（这个提议比我们所期望的有利，\n拒绝它将引发我们国内的骚乱。）

original: We have recently sent a diplomat, so we cannot send another until §Y$DATE$§!.
translation: 最近已经派遣过外交家，所以直到 §Y$DATE$§!我们才能再次派遣

original: A spy of ours was recently discovered in their country, so we cannot send another until §Y$DATE$§!.
translation: 最近我们派出的一个潜伏在这个国家的间谍被发现了，所以我们在 §Y$DATE$§!之前不能再派出另一个.

original: We are a subject country. It is not up to us.
translation: 我们是一个属国，这不由我们决定

original: We cannot ask them while we have a truce with $OVERLORD$.
translation: 由于我们与$OVERLORD$的停战协议，我们不能提出要求.

original: We cannot ask them while they have a truce with $OVERLORD$.
translation: 由于他们与$OVERLORD$的停战协议，我们不能提出要求.
属国不能与宗主国结盟。
属国不能指定宗主国为宿敌.
我们与$OVERLORD$处在停战协议之中.
他们与$OVERLORD$处在停战协议之中.

original: We are at war. We will not marry our enemies.
translation: 两国正在交战，不能和敌人联姻。
我们正在等待他们的答复

original: Do you wish to declare war against $COUNTRY$
You have no diplomats to send.
translation: 你没有外交官可供派遣

original: Are you sure you wish to break our royal ties with $COUNTRY$. This will hurt our relations and slightly destabilize our country.
translation: 你确定要终止与$COUNTRY$的王室联姻吗？这将会严重损害两国之间的关系并降低我国的稳定度。

original: The glory of the dynasty is one of the top priorities of any nation. To turn our back on a dynastic link will both upset the other nation and cause unease amongst our nobility.
translation: 王室的光荣是一个国家最优先所考虑的事，终止王室联姻将使其他的国家不安并造成我国贵族之间的动荡。

original: A treaty of Support for Independence can only be signed between a subject nation and an independent nation.
translation: 支持独立条约仅在属国和独立国家之间能够签署。

original: Ask $COUNTRY$ to support our struggle for independence. If they agree, they will come to our aid when we declare war on our overlord.
translation: 向$COUNTRY$请求支持我们的独立斗争。如果同意，他们就会在我们向宗主国宣战时帮助我们。

original: Offer $COUNTRY$ our support in their struggle for independence. If they agree, we will come to their aid when they declare war on their overlord.
translation: 为$COUNTRY$的独立斗争提供我们的支持。如果同意，我们就会在他们向宗主国宣战时帮助他们。

original: Cancel the treaty of support that we have with $COUNTRY$. We will no longer be able to call on their aid if we declare war on our overlord.
translation: 取消我们和$COUNTRY$签署的支持条约。如果我们对宗主国宣战，我们无法拉拢他们。

original: Cancel the treaty of support that we have with $COUNTRY$. They will no longer be able to call on our aid if they declare war on our overlord.
translation: 取消我们和$COUNTRY$签署的支持条约。他们不再能够响应他们对宗主国发起的战争。

original: If a country accepts our offer of support we will come to their aid when they declare independence.
translation: 如果一个国家接受我们的支持，我们将在他们宣布独立时提供帮助。

original: If a country accepts our request for support they will come to our aid when we declare independence.
translation: 如果一个国家接受我们的支持请求，当我们宣布独立时他们会提供帮助。

original: Do you wish to offer an Alliance to $COUNTRY$? Doing so will oblige us to assist each other in times of war.
translation: 你想向$COUNTRY$提议结盟吗？这样在战争时期两国可以互相支援。

original: Do you wish to cancel your Alliance with $COUNTRY$? This will create a truce between your countries, and will adversely affect relations.
translation: 你想要终止与$COUNTRY$的联盟吗？这会在两国之间产生一张和平协议并损害关系。

original: $ACTOR$ offers us an Alliance. By doing so we are promising to help each other in times of war.
translation: $ACTOR$向我们提议结盟。同意的话，我们将承诺在战争时期相互支援。

original: The ruler of $WHO$ has died, without leaving a direct heir. They will join in a union with $OVERLORD$ unless we contest it. If we contest it, it will create a succession war over $WHO$.
translation: $WHO$的统治者没有留下直系继承人就撒手人寰。除非我们索求王位，否则他们将会加入$OVERLORD$的联合统治。如果我们这样做，就会发起对$WHO$的王位继承战。

original: If a country accepts our Alliance offer it may come to our assistance during wars.
translation: 如果一个国家接受了我们的结盟提议，那么我们在战争时期就会得到该国的援助。

original: Dissolving the current Alliance will, of course, end the current Alliance you have with this country, and will adversely affect relations.
translation: 撕毁与这个国家现有的盟约，并破坏双方的关系

original: Do you wish make $COUNTRY$ a regular vassal again?
translation: 你确定要让 $COUNTRY$ 成为普通附庸国吗？

original: $WHO$ will become a regular vassal again. This will cost you §R-1§! stability and hurt your relation with $WHO$ severely.
translation: $WHO$将恢复成普通的附庸国。这会使你的稳定度§R-1§!并严重损害你和$WHO$的关系。

original: $WHO$ will become a regular vassal again. This will hurt your relation with $WHO$ severely.
translation: $WHO$将会恢复为普通附庸，这将大大损害你和$WHO$的关系。

original: Ask your overlord if you can become their march instead of being a vassal.
translation: 向你的宗主国请愿，成为他们的卫戍国。

original: Do you wish to ask $OVERLORD$ if you can become their march?
translation: 你希望向$OVERLORD$请愿，成为他们的卫戍国吗？

original: Do you wish to revoke the embargo against $COUNTRY$?
translation: 你要取消针对$COUNTRY$的禁运吗？

original: Do you wish to ask $COUNTRY$ to become our Vassal?
translation: 你要邀请$COUNTRY$成为我们的附庸国吗？

original: Do you wish to ask $COUNTRY$ to become our Protectorate?
translation: 你希望要求$COUNTRY$成为我们的受保护国吗？

original: Do you wish to ask $COUNTRY$ if we can become their Protectorate?
translation: 你希望请求$COUNTRY$让我们成为他们的受保护国吗？

original: Suggest that they become our Vassal.
translation: 建议他们成为我们的附庸国。

original: Suggest that they become our Protectorate.
translation: 建议他们成为我们的受保护国。

original: Suggest that we become their Protectorate.
translation: 建议我们成为他们的受保护国。

original: $COUNTRY$ is asking us to become their vassals. By accepting, we will be considered to be under their protection. In return we will have to pay 50% of our income and we can only ally with them.
translation: $COUNTRY$要求我们成为他们的附庸。如果接受，我们将得到他们的保护。作为回报，我们将支付收入的50%给他们，且仅能与他们结盟。

original: $COUNTRY$ is asking us to become their protectorate. By accepting, we will be considered to be under their protection, and they will help our technological advancement. In return, we will have to give them 50% of our trade power and we can only ally with them.
translation: $COUNTRY$要求我们成为他们的被保护国。接受之后我们将处于他们的保护之下，同时他们也会帮助我们发展科技。作为交换，我们必须把贸易竞争力的50%转给他们，并只能和他们结盟。

original: $COUNTRY$ is asking us to become our protectorate. By accepting, they will be considered to be under our protection, and we will help them in technological advancement. In return, they will have to give us 50% of their trade power and they can only ally with us.
translation: $COUNTRY$请求成为我们的被保护国。接受之后他们将处于我们的保护之下，我们会帮助他们发展科技。作为交换，他们必须给予我们50%的贸易竞争力并且只能和我们结盟。

original: To offer Vassalization you must 1) have a Military Alliance 2) have a relation of at least +190 3) the target country must be at peace.
translation: 想要附庸他国你必须 1) 和该国结盟 2) 至少拥有 +190 以上的关系 3) 目标国必须处于和平状态.
取消我们和他们的附庸关系
取消我们的保护国协定

original: Break off our Vassalization with our current masters.
translation: 终止和我们宗主国的附庸关系

original: The nation of $COUNTRY$, $ALLIANCETYPEDESC$, is requesting that you come to their aid in the $WARNAME$ against $LIST$.
translation: $COUNTRY$，$ALLIANCETYPEDESC$，正在请求你在 $WARNAME$ 中帮助他们对抗 $LIST$。

original: our brothers and sisters in the faith
translation: 拥有共同信仰的兄弟姐妹

original: multiple conflicts they are engaged in
Call on your partner to aid you in this conflict.
translation: 召集你的盟友在这场战争中支援你。

original: Do you wish to call upon your Allies in these times of war?
translation: 你要在战争期间召集你的盟友吗？

original: If we decline, we will lose $PRES|R$ prestige.
translation: 如果我们拒绝，将会失去$PRES|R$威望。

original: If we decline, we will lose the title of Defender of the Faith!
translation: 如果我们拒绝，我们将失去信仰守护者的地位！
我们已保证他们的独立了

original: We have already issued a warning.
translation: 我们已经发布了一个警告

original: Do you wish to request Military Access from $COUNTRY$, thereby allowing our armies access to their land?
translation: 你想要索要$COUNTRY$的军事通行权，即允许我们的军队进入他们境内吗？
向他们索要军事通行权

original: $COUNTRY$ is requesting Military Access from us. Accepting will allow them to move armies into our land.
translation: $COUNTRY$向我国索要军事通行权。若接受，该国军队可以在我国领土通行。

original: Cancel our Military Access to their country.
translation: 放弃他们给予我们的军事通行权。

original: Do you wish to give Military Access to $COUNTRY$? This will enable them to station troops in our land.
translation: 你想要给予$COUNTRY$军事通行权吗？这将会允许他们在我们境内驻军。

original: Enable them to station troops in our country.
translation: 允许他们在我们境内驻军。

original: Do you wish to revoke the Military Access given to $COUNTRY$? Doing so will prevent their troops from accessing our country.
translation: 你想要收回给予$COUNTRY$的军事通行权吗？这样做会使他们的军队无法进入我国境内。

original: Revoke their ability to station troops in our country.
translation: 收回他们在我国境内驻军的权利。

original: Open a negotiation to trade money, land or other things.
translation: 展开谈判，以交换金钱、土地或其他东西。

original: Do you wish to send a gift to $COUNTRY$? This will cost us §Y$COST$§!¤ and improve our relations by §G$OPINION$§! for §Y$MONTHS$§! months.
translation: 你确定要向$COUNTRY$馈赠礼物？这将花费我们§Y$COST$§!¤ 并且在 §Y$MONTHS$§!月间提高我们的关系§G$OPINION$§!

original: Gifts can not be smaller than $MIN|Y$¤.
We will greatly disturb our relations with them. This will give them a Casus Belli against us.
translation: 我们将极大地破坏与他们之间的关系，这将给予对方一个针对我国的宣战理由。

original: You can only Claim their Throne if you have a Royal Marriage.
translation: 你仅能在有王室联姻的情况下要求对方统治权。

original: We have already claimed this throne.

A 'Royal Marriage' represents a marital union between the royal families of two countries. It will improve relations greatly. If you declare war against a nation with which you have a Royal Marriage, you will suffer greatly.
translation: 两国王室之间婚姻上的结合，将极大地增进双边关系. 如果你对一个与你王室联姻的国家宣战，你将受到极大的负面影响.

original: Their government form does not allow Royal Marriages, as they lack a monarchy.
translation: 该国的政体无法联姻，只有君主政体可以联姻。

original: Our government form does not allow us to make Royal Marriages.
translation: 我国的政体不允许王室联姻。

original: While we have a Regency Council, we cannot start any wars.
translation: 摄政会议统治期间无法发动战争。

original: While at war with a nation you can move your troops into its land. By occupying its provinces and demanding them in return for a Peace you conquer enemy provinces. Unless you have a Casus Belli your Stability will suffer greatly from a declaration of war.
translation: 与一个国家开战时你可以移动你的部队进入其领土，通过占领对方的省份，提出苛刻的和平协议以获取敌人的省份。但除非你拥有宣战理由，否则无故宣战将极大地降低你的稳定度。

original: You may not declare war upon a country which you have an Alliance with. Break the Alliance first.
translation: 你不能向一个同盟国家宣战。必须先撕毁盟约。

original: You may not declare war on a country in your Trade League. Exit the league first.
translation: 你不能向同一贸易联盟中的国家开战。必须先退出贸易联盟。

original: You may not declare war upon a country whose overlord you have an Alliance with. Break the Alliance first.
translation: 你不能你盟友的属国宣战。必须先撕毁盟约。

original: You may not declare war at the moment as your country is too disorganized. Get above -3 stability first
translation: 你不能在国家过于混乱的时候宣战。必须先把稳定度提高到-3以上。

original: You are always at war with rebels.
translation: 你与叛军永远处于战争状态。

original: We currently have no diplomatic relations with this country.
translation: 我们现在与这个国家没有外交关系。

original: Our primary culture is §Y$CULTURE$§W. §Y$CULTURE$§W is in the §Y$GROUP$§W group.
translation: 我们的主流文化是§Y$CULTURE$§W .§Y$CULTURE$§W属于 §Y$GROUP$§W文化圈

original: Are you sure you wish to sack $NAME$?
Do you wish to recruit $NAME$? This will cost us §Y$NOW$§W¤ and an additional §Y$LATER$§W¤ a month.
translation: 你确定要雇用$NAME$吗？这将花费你§Y$NOW$§W¤，此外每月要支付§Y$LATER$§W¤的薪酬。

original: This province is a part of the Empire.
translation: 这个省份属于神圣罗马帝国。

original: Do you wish to disband this unit?
translation: 你确定要解散这个单位吗？

original: This will remove this unit completely from the game, and you will no longer have to pay any maintenance costs for it.
translation: 这将从游戏里完全移除这个单位，同样你也不必再为它支付维护费了.

original: Do you wish to upgrade this fleet?
translation: 你想要升级这个舰队吗？

original: This will upgrade only the ships that can be upgraded and set the morale to zero.
translation: 可升级的船只将会被升级,它们的士气将会归零.

original: The arrival of horses following the European involvement also changed Native American warfare. Many tribes adopted the horse as an important part of their culture, and became excellent horsemen.
translation: 马的抵达改变了美洲人的战争.许多民族让马成为了民族的一个重要组成部分，并变成优良的骑手.

original: The arrival of horses following the European involvement also changed indigenous American warfare. Many tribes adopted the horse as an important part of their culture, and became excellent horsemen.
translation: 欧洲人带来了马匹，美洲土著的战斗方式也随之发生了变化。很多部落驯养了马匹作为他们重要的文化组成部分，并且训练成为杰出的骑手。

original: The arrival of horses following the European involvement also changed indigenous American warfare. Many tribes adopted the horse as an important part of their culture, and became excellent horsemen.
translation: 欧洲人带来了马匹，美洲土著的战斗方式也随之发生了变化。很多部落驯养了马匹作为他们重要的文化组成部分，并且训练成为杰出的骑手。

original: Riders equipped with bows and firearms who excel at raiding and harassment tactics.
translation: 装备了弓箭和火枪的土著骑手，擅长突袭和骚扰战术。

original: Riders equipped with bows and firearms who excel at raiding and harassment tactics.
translation: 装备了弓箭和火枪的土著骑手，擅长突袭和骚扰战术。

original: Riders equipped with bows and firearms who excel at raiding and harassment tactics.
translation: 装备了弓箭和火枪的土著骑手，擅长突袭和骚扰战术。

original: Light cavalry specializing in raiding and hit-and-run tactics.
translation: 轻装骑兵擅长于突袭和风筝战术。

original: Light cavalry specializing in raiding and hit-and-run tactics.
translation: 轻装骑兵擅长于突袭和风筝战术。

original: Light cavalry specializing in raiding and hit-and-run tactics.
translation: 轻装骑兵擅长于突袭和风筝战术。

original: Swarm cavalry were loose order cavalry armed with bows or carbines and would use harassing fire tactics to disorder the enemy before charging. The loose order the cavalry made them less vulnerable to fire from the enemy, but if the opposition could withstand their harassing attacks they would quickly fall under a charge.
translation: 密袭骑兵纪律松散，装备弓或卡宾枪，能够运用火力骚扰战术在敌军冲锋前扰乱敌军.松散的队形使得他们不易被敌军火力攻击，但如果对方承受下他们的袭扰，他们很快就会在敌军冲锋面前溃不成军.

original: Swarm cavalry were loose order cavalry armed with bows or carbines and would use harassing fire tactics to disorder the enemy before charging. The loose order the cavalry made them less vulnerable to fire from the enemy, but if the opposition could withstand their harassing attacks they would quickly fall under a charge.
translation: 阵型松散的密袭骑兵装备了弓箭或卡宾枪，他们在冲锋前会先射击扰乱敌军。松散的队形使得他们易于避开火力，但是如果敌军在扰乱攻击下屹立不动，那么密袭骑兵将很快会在一次冲锋中崩溃。

original: Swarm cavalry were loose order cavalry armed with bows or carbines and would use harassing fire tactics to disorder the enemy before charging. The loose order the cavalry made them less vulnerable to fire from the enemy, but if the opposition could withstand their harassing attacks they would quickly fall under a charge.
translation: 阵型松散的密袭骑兵装备了弓箭或卡宾枪，他们在冲锋前会先射击扰乱敌军。松散的队形使得他们易于避开火力，但是如果敌军在扰乱攻击下屹立不动，那么密袭骑兵将很快会在一次冲锋中崩溃。

original: The American Dragoon was rifle and spear armed cavalry unit. Although a dragoon by name, it was actually much closer to the Swedish style charging cavalry. The brave warriors would charge towards the enemy firing carbines and pistols before closing for hand to hand combat.
translation: 美洲龙骑兵是配有来复枪与长矛的骑兵单位，虽然名为龙骑兵，但实际上却是更接近瑞典风格的冲锋骑兵.勇士们在向敌人冲锋的过程中会用卡宾枪及手枪射击，相接之后便展开肉搏战.

original: The American Dragoon was rifle and spear armed cavalry unit. Although a dragoon by name, it was actually much closer to the Swedish style charging cavalry. The brave warriors would charge towards the enemy firing carbines and pistols before closing for hand to hand combat.
translation: 美洲龙骑兵是装备了来福枪和长矛的骑兵单位。尽管以龙骑兵为名，但是它事实上更接近于瑞典式的冲锋骑兵。勇敢的战士们冲向正在开火的敌人，之后便是近身肉搏战了。

original: The American Dragoon was rifle and spear armed cavalry unit. Although a dragoon by name, it was actually much closer to the Swedish style charging cavalry. The brave warriors would charge towards the enemy firing carbines and pistols before closing for hand to hand combat.
translation: 美洲龙骑兵是装备了来福枪和长矛的骑兵单位。尽管以龙骑兵为名，但是它事实上更接近于瑞典式的冲锋骑兵。勇敢的战士们冲向正在开火的敌人，之后便是近身肉搏战了。

original: Swarm cavalry were loose order cavalry armed with bows or carbines and would use harassing fire tactics to disorder the enemy before charging. The loose order the cavalry made them less vulnerable to fire from the enemy, but if the opposition could withstand their harassing attacks they would quickly fall under a charge.
translation: 蜂群骑兵是装备弓箭或卡宾枪的散列骑兵。他们在冲锋前会通过骚扰来扰乱敌人。松散的队形让这些骑兵对于敌人的火力网较能抵抗，不过如果对方能够抵挡住他们的骚扰，他们会很快在冲锋中失败。

original: Heavily armored African cavalrymen employing Western Cuirassier tactics.
translation: 使用西方胸甲骑兵战术的重甲非洲骑兵。

original: Heavily armored cavalrymen made up mostly of Abyssinian nobility and trained to fight in the rough, hilly terrain of their homelands.
translation: 主要由阿比西尼亚贵族组成的重甲骑兵。他们擅长在自己祖国的崎岖多山的地形作战。

original: Light cavalrymen armed with javelins originating in Abyssinia.
translation: 起源于埃塞俄比亚的轻装骑兵，他们装备了投枪。

original: Horsemen armed with muskets who would dismount in battle and fight as infantry.
translation: 装备火枪的的骑兵。他们在战斗中会下马作为步兵战斗。

original: Light cavalry specializing in raiding and hit-and-run tactics.
translation: 专精于袭扰和一击脱离战术的轻骑兵。

original: Mandekalu Cavalry were soldiers who owed direct fealty to the Mansa of Mali, who equipped and fed them in exchange for military service.
translation: 曼德卡路骑兵是直接效忠于马里曼萨的士兵。马里曼萨为他们提供装备和给养以换取他们为自己而战。

original: The Mossi were renowned horsemen who excelled at light cavalry tactics and raiding deep inside enemy land.
translation: 莫西人是非常有名的马上民族，他们擅长轻骑兵战术和深入敌人的土地进行袭扰。

original: Somali tribal horsemen were lightly armed and armored and favored the use of hit-and-run tactics.
translation: 索马里部落骑兵是轻装的骑兵，擅长使用一击脱离的战术。

original: Nomadic Tuaregs whose job it is to raid and harass the enemy.
translation: 图阿雷格游牧民专职突袭和骚扰敌军。

original: The North American Guerrilla were expert raiders, often applying a hit-and-run tactics, especially once they received access to horses.
translation: 北美游击兵是突袭的专家，经常运用打了就跑的风筝战术，特别是当他们有马匹的时候。

original: Black Riders (for the color of their armor) are cavalrymen each equipped with two pistols and a sword, often wearing a cuirass for protection. They were used by many German states in the 16th and 17th centuries. Using firearms as their primary weapons they broke with the medieval knight tradition of cavalrymen always being equipped with lances. In battle they would fire their pistols at the enemy line, then attempt a charge and melee combat to rout enemy soldiers.
translation: 黑骑士(因他们所着护甲颜色而得名)将两把手枪和一柄佩剑作为标准装备，并且常常穿戴护胸甲。16到17世纪他们受雇于德意志诸邦，打破了中世纪骑士经常装备长枪的传统而使用火枪作为首选。在战斗中他们会向敌方战线开火，然后试图发起冲锋和肉搏战击溃敌人。

original: Maximum unit weight that the province can supply without causing attrition. Actual attrition depends on various other factors as well.
translation: 最大单位承载量是省份可以有效补给的部队数量，取决于各种因素.

original: Maximum attrition that one of your units can take in this province.
translation: 该省所能支持的最大军队数量.

original: The amount of unrest in the province.
The amount of local autonomy in the province.
translation: 省份地方自治度的总额。

original: The current unrest has the following effects on $PROVINCE$:\n
translation: 当前的叛乱值对$PROVINCE$有如下影响：\n

original: This province is mainly populated by $CULTURE$ people.
The amount of soldiers that this province contributes to your maximum manpower.
translation: 这个省份贡献给你的最大人力数

original: The amount of sailors that this province contributes to your maximum sailors.
translation: 该省份对水手上限贡献的水手人数

original: This is the yearly tax income from this province. It will generate a monthly income of $MONTHLY|Y2$¤.
translation: 这是这个省份的年度税收。它将产生$MONTHLY|Y2$的月度收入。

original: This is the monthly tax income from this province. It will generate a yearly income of $YEARLY|Y2$¤.
translation: 这是这个省份的月度税收。它每年将产生$YEARLY|Y2$¤的收入。

original: The actual amount depends on the base tax and buildings in the province.\n
translation: 实际数量取决于省份的税基和建筑.\n

original: This is the monthly production income of the province. It will generate a yearly income of $YEARLY|Y2$¤. The actual amount depends on the base production and value of trade goods in the province.\n
translation: 这是省份的生产收入，每年产生 $YEARLY|Y2$¤ 的收入。 具体的数量取决于基础生产力和省份的货物价值。\n

original: Your total income is the accumulated revenue from taxes, production and trade.
translation: 你的总收入取决于税收、工业和贸易

original: The total number of units produced.
The current price for this resource on the market.
We are not advanced enough for this idea.
translation: 我们还不足以选择此国家理念.

original: We have already embraced this idea.
translation: 我们已经选择了这个国家理念.

original: The preferred unit of our country is the type of unit that can be recruited in our core provinces. Other nations that control one of our core provinces can also recruit our preferred unit there. When the preferred unit is changed, the unit type suffers a temporary morale drop due to reorganization.
translation: 首选部队是可以在我国核心省份征召的单位类型。其他国家占领我国的核心省份时也可以在那里招募我们的首选部队。当变更首选部队时，这种单位类型的部队会因部队重组而暂时士气下降。

original: Our land units have a morale value of §Y$VALUE$§W.
translation: 我国陆军部队士气值为§Y$VALUE$§W。

original: The morale of our military units is the most important factor in deciding their worth on the battlefield. Morale represents a variety of factors such as tactics and organization as well as improvements in weapons and equipment.
translation: 部队在战场上的价值很大程度上取决于士气。士气是各种因素的综合体现，比如战术和组织、武器和装备的进步。

original: We have a total of $NO$ land units.
translation: 我国总共有$NO$个陆军单位。

original: We have a total of $NO$ naval units.
translation: 我国总共有$NO$个海军单位。

original: Our naval units have a morale value of §Y$VALUE$§W.
translation: 我国海军部队士气值为§Y$VALUE$§W。

original: We are currently capable of supporting a total of §Y$NO$§! land units without penalties.
translation: 目前我国能支持的无惩罚陆军数量上限为§Y$NO$§!。

original: We are currently capable of supporting a total of §Y$NO$§! naval units without penalties.
translation: 目前我国能支持的无惩罚海军数量上限为§Y$NO$§!。

original: They are currently capable of supporting a total of §Y$NO$§! land units without penalties.
translation: 目前该国能支持的无惩罚陆军数量上限为§Y$NO$§!。

original: They are currently capable of supporting a total of §Y$NO$§! naval units without penalties.
translation: 目前该国能支持的无惩罚海军数量上限为§Y$NO$§!。

original: There is a siberian frontier here, so no colonists can be sent!
translation: 这里是西伯利亚拓荒区，不可以派遣殖民队！

original: A colony is currently being constructed here.
translation: 这里目前有一个殖民地正在建造中。

original: You have no colonists to send.
translation: 没有可供派遣的殖民队。

original: Send colonist to attempt to increase the size of your colony.
translation: 派遣殖民队扩建殖民地。

original: Abandoning this colony will make $COUNTRY$ lose the colonization progress and leave the colony to its destiny.
translation: 放弃这个殖民地将会使$COUNTRY$失去殖民进程，放任它听天由命。

original: Base Tax is the basic value of the province. This will decide your potential tax incomes from the province.
translation: 基本税收是省份的基本价值，决定了你在这个省份可能的税收收入。

original: It will take $TIME$ days to send a Colonist here.
translation: 殖民者抵达这里需要$TIME$天。

original: There is a native population of §Y$NUMBER$§! in this province. They may or may not tolerate our presence.
translation: 这个省份的原住民有§Y$NUMBER$§!，他们不一定会容忍我们的存在。

original: The aggressiveness of the natives will determine the likelihood that they will attack our settlers.
translation: 原住民的敌意决定了他们攻击我们的移民的几率。

original: The ferocity of the natives determines how hard they will fight.
translation: 原住民的狂暴度决定了他们发动攻击的强度。

original: These people are already following the true faith.
translation: 这些民众早已信奉了正统信仰。

original: These people are already following our secondary religion.
translation: 这些民众早已信奉了我们的兼容信仰。

original: An expedition is already en route.
translation: 一支探险队已经在路上了。

original: You cannot send a Missionary to a Colony. However, unless the Province belongs to a Trade Company Region a Colonist will convert the inhabitants to the True Faith.
translation: 你无法向殖民地派遣传教士。殖民者会将原住民转向正确的信仰，除非此省份属于一个贸易公司地区。

original: We have no missionaries to send.
translation: 没有可供派遣的传教士。

original: This province's religion is already being converted by a nearby religious center.
translation: 附近的宗教中心正在这个省份传教。

original: Your current form of government is limiting this slider to a maximum value of $VALUE$. You can pass this value but this will come at a great cost.
translation: 当前的政体限制了该项国策的最高值为$VALUE$。你可以超过这个值，但将付出高昂的代价。

original: Your current form of government is limiting this slider to a minimum value of $VALUE$. You can pass this value but this will come at a great cost.
translation: 现行政体限制该项国策的最低值为 $VALUE$ . 你当然可以超过这个值，但代价高昂.

original: They will receive the following provinces:
You are awaiting the creation of your dependency.
translation: 你在等待附属国的建立。

original: Creating $NAME$ will make them your Vassals and award them the following provinces:
translation: 设置$NAME$成为你的附庸国，需要给与他们下列省份：

original: Creating $NAME$ will make them your Protectorate and award them the following provinces:
translation: 建立$NAME$将会使他们成为你的受保护国并让他们得到以下省份：

original: As a subject nation, you cannot release subjects.
translation: 作为一个附属国，你不能再释放附属国。

original: You cannot release subjects while at war.
translation: 你不能在战争中释放附属国。

original: You have no subject whom you can release.
translation: 你没有可以释放的属国。

original: §Y$COUNTRY$§W considers this to be one of her core provinces.
translation: §Y$COUNTRY$§W认定这是它的核心省份之一
与首都间没有陆地连接

original: States in the Holy Roman Empire
Free Cities in the Holy Roman Empire
translation: 神圣罗马帝国内的自由市

original: A time of both social and economic problems, our nation is struggling with both famine and war as well as the opposition against the Church and aristocracy.
translation: 此事存在着社会和经济问题，我们的国家挣扎在战争和饥饿之中，也同时对抗着教会和贵族的势力

original: Decades of feudal oppression, economic difficulties and religious intolerance have taken their toll on our nation and the population's desire for liberty is posing a serious threat to our Monarchy.
translation: 几十年来的封建压制、经济困难以及宗教压迫，已经对我国造成了很多损失.民众对于自由的渴望已经对我国的君主制构成了严重的威胁

original: The Peasantry's unmet demand for economic, religious and political amendments has led to violent revolts erupting across our nation.
translation: 农民阶级对于经济、政治以及宗教的改革需求未被满足，导致了国内暴力革命烽烟四起

original: Religious struggles, some more violent than others, were very common during this time and revolts would spring up on a regular basis.
translation: 宗教冲突比其他一切都更加暴力，这段时间叛乱将此起彼伏，并增加基本叛乱值.

original: In a time plagued by religious struggles, efforts to mediate between these different religious groups only became harder.
translation: 经理了一段时间宗教斗争的困扰之后，尝试在各个不同宗教团体之间斡旋已变得更加困难

original: The mental strain of war, financial neglect and political instability had eventually forced the government to revise its war expenditures.
translation: 厌战，经济失当，政策不稳经常迫使政府修正自己的国防预算.

original: The mental strain of war, financial neglect and political instability had eventually forced the government to focus on its domestic problems.
translation: 厌战，经济失当，政策不稳经常迫使政府将注意力转到国内事物上.

original: The increased efforts to control the legal and economic status of the peasants are draining the strength of the common people and unrest is brewing among the lower classes of society.
translation: 加强对农民人身控制的努力导致普通民众的生活日益恶化，并且不安情绪正在社会的底层中酿造.

original: Plans to improve the conditions for the serfs and eventually also abolish serfdom are under consideration.
translation: 限奴计划使农奴的状况有所好转，而且最终废除农奴制也在考虑之中.

original: The mental strain of war, financial neglect and political instability had eventually forced the government to revise its war expenditures.
translation: 厌战，经济失当，政策不稳经常迫使政府修正自己的国防预算.

original: Despite the number of assassination attempts and revolutionary tendencies infecting our nation, our Monarch has recently received a surprising amount of support.
translation: 尽管暗杀频现革命思潮涌动，我们的君主最近仍然拥有数量惊人的支持者.

original: Our Monarch's indecisiveness and poor administration has led the people to question his right to rule and the number of conspiracies to increase.
translation: 我们的君主优柔寡断的拙劣的统治能力已经导致人民怀疑他统治的正确性，并且针对他的阴谋的不断发生.

original: Widespread crop failure has left our people with very little, or nothing to eat, but measures have been taken to alleviate their suffering.
translation: 大面积的农作物歉收导致我们的人民食不果腹，不过我们已经采取措施来帮助他们渡过难关

original: Widespread crop failure has left our people with very little, or nothing to eat, but we don't have any resources to help them.
translation: 大面积的农作物歉收导致我们的人民食不果腹，然而我们却没有任何资源能够用来帮助他们

original: To avoid further instability, we must silence the discussions our philosophers are having about social reform.
translation: 为避免国家陷入动荡，我们必须禁止我们的哲学家们讨论社会改革问题.

original: Despite accusations of corruption within our government, plans are being made to further expand the bureaucracy.
translation: 尽管有些谴责认为我们的政府腐败丛生，但更进一步扩大官僚机构的计划仍在制定之中.

original: Attempts to reduce our bloated and corrupt government have been put in place.
translation: 精简官僚机构的计划已经在制定之中.

original: To come to terms with our mismanaged economy and avoid an economic crisis all resources have been focused on strengthening our currency.
translation: 为了替我们管理不善的经济埋单、避免经济危机，所有的资源都已经用来稳定货币

original: The war, extensive crop-failures and our mismanaged economy have paved the way for a bankruptcy. Our currency is rapidly losing its value and the monetary purchasing power is becoming increasingly limited.
translation: 战争，农业歉收和我们的经济政策失误已经使我们濒临破产. 我们的货币正在失去价值他的购买力变得日益有限.

original: Even though our financial planning is in desperate need of revision, we have decided to not cut back on war expenditures.
translation: 尽管我们的经济规划极度需要修正，我们仍然决定不削减用于战争的开支

original: Military research and the introduction of gunpowder have more or less made our former armed forces obsolete. We have decided to provide them some financial aid since they may still be of some use to us.
translation: 军事科技的发展和火药的传入已经或多或少使我们以前的军队过时了. 因为他们对我们可能还有利用价值所以我们决定给他们增加军费.

original: Military research and the introduction of gunpowder have more or less made our former armed forces obsolete. We have decided that a reform is in order.
translation: 军事科技的发展和火药的传入已经或多或少使我们以前的军队过时了. 所以我们决定对其进行装备换装.

original: The Peasants' War started out as several smaller uprisings but soon began to spread over the provincial borders. We are currently attempting to negotiate with them so that order can be restored.
translation: 农民起义刚爆发的时候不过是几处小型暴动，不过很快就蔓延过了省界.现在我们正在尝试与他们进行谈判以图恢复秩序

original: The Peasants' War started out as several smaller uprisings but soon began to spread over the provincial borders. Our only hope is to isolate and crush them.
translation: 农民起义刚爆发的时候不过是几处小型暴动，不过很快就蔓延过了省界.现在我们唯一的希望就是能够将他们各个击破了

original: The growing cultural conflict in our nation has reached its boiling point. We have decided to suppress the rebels once and for all.
translation: 我们国家不同文化间的冲突已经到达顶点，我们已经决定彻底地镇压反叛者.

original: The growing cultural conflict in our nation has reached its boiling point. We have decided to begin diplomatic negotiations to solve this once and for all.
translation: 文化冲突在我国已经到达了顶点. 我们已经决定开始和叛军谈判以彻底解决这一问题.

original: Our army is undergoing a thorough revision. Regular drilling has been introduced and while officers are still drawn from the nobility, the peasants and townspeople are now conscripted into the other ranks.
translation: 我国的陆军正在经历一次彻底的变更.引入了常规操练，军官仍是由贵族中产生，普通士兵则是在农民和市民中征召

original: Our navy is undergoing a thorough revision. This will help boost the morale of our troops and increase our efficiency.
translation: 我们的舰队正在进行全面换装，这将会有助于提高我军的士气和作战效率

original: Our nation's military structure, both naval and army, is undergoing a thorough revision. Regular drilling has been introduced and while officers are still drawn from the nobility, the peasants and townspeople are now conscripted into the other ranks.
translation: 我国的陆军和海军军事架构正在经历一次彻底的变更.引入了常规操练，军官仍是由贵族中产生，普通士兵则是在农民和市民中征召

original: With the help of foreign advisors, we have managed to start an extensive cultural and military reform to better match the advancement of the West.
translation: 在外国顾问的帮助下，我们已经发动了一场全面的进步的文化和军事改革.

original: Foreign advisors have proposed cultural and military reforms to westernize our country, but we don't see any gain from it.
translation: 外国顾问提议进行文化和军事改革以进行西化，但是我们不认为这样做有什么好处

original: Many influential representatives from several of the colonies afflicted by our national policies have assembled and we fear that if our diplomatic negotiations don't go well, they will turn all the colonies against us.
translation: 在我国政策的折磨之下，许多有影响力的殖民地代表已经联合起来.一旦外交谈判事有不谐，恐怕他们将会唆使所有的殖民地对抗我们
