They were also less likely to break ranks whilst fighting against the enemy. An example would be the Prussian Drilled Soldiers. They were among the world's best trained and equipped soldiers at the time. They were very disciplined and well trained for nearly any situation. So good was their reputation that the American Colonies had asked for Prussian drill instructors to be sent to train the colonists so they could fight against the British.
translation: 这种步兵是经过充分队列操练的步兵战士，在战斗中具有良好的组织纪律性，阵形很难被敌军突破，往往能够立于不败之地.普鲁士的步兵就是其中最好的例子.他们是当时世界上最训练有素，装备精良的战士，在几乎任何险恶环境下都能从容不迫.由于他们巨大的声名，连北美殖民地都想要聘请普鲁士的军事教官帮助训练士兵，以便能与英国军队对抗.

original: In the broken terrain in the foothills of the Rockies, new tactics built around ambush began to develop. These units did not have the staying power of the mountain infantry but they did hurt the enemies' morale with their ambush tactics.
translation: 在地形破碎的落基山脉，围绕着伏击战展开的新战术得到了发展。这些单位虽然不具备山地步兵的耐力，但他们却能用伏击战来打击敌军士气。

original: Cavalry units, armed with spear, sword or bow easily recognized by their red and gold striped headgear, worn to express their devotion to the Twelver division of Shia Islam.
translation: 手持矛、剑或弓的骑兵单位，佩戴显眼的红金条纹头饰以显示自己对十二伊玛目什叶派的献身精神。

original: Westernized Asian cavalry more adapted to Western tactics and strategies.
translation: 西化的亚洲骑兵更适应西方的战术和战略.

original: Westernized Asian infantry equipped with muskets and more adapted to Western tactics and strategies.
translation: 西化的亚洲步兵配备了火枪，更适应西方的战术和战略.

original: An army developed under the Qing dynasty after the Manchu conquest of China. The army made up the main bulk in military operations and consisted mostly of Chinese Han soldiers.
translation: 历史上的绿营军是在满洲征服中国建立清朝之后发展起来的.由汉族士兵组成的绿营军是清朝军事点数的主体.

original: During the 18th century the use of artillery on the battlefield became more widespread. The troops were now able to move their field guns with much more ease and speed.
translation: 在18世纪，火炮在战场上获得了日益广泛的应用.随着炮车的改良，火炮的机动性得到提升，更加适用于野战环境.

original: Cossacks remained an integral part of Eastern European armies. Although neither as disciplined nor as effective in the charge as the heavy cavalry. These light units specialized in raiding and sniping to disrupt their opponents.
translation: 哥萨克仍是东欧军队的组成部分，虽然他们在冲锋中不如重骑兵般纪律严明、效果显著，但这些轻装单位擅长突袭与狙击以扰乱敌军.

original: The Cuirassier takes its name from the Cuirass, a breast plate worn by the heaviest cavalry units. Wielding a heavy sword rather than a light saber, these units are fearsome when they charge. Usually supported by units of carbine equipped cavalry to give them extra punch, these units add shock power to any army.
translation: 胸甲骑兵由重骑兵所穿的胸甲而得名，这些令人胆寒的部队冲锋起来挥舞着重剑而非轻型军刀，在装备有卡宾枪的骑兵部队的支援下给敌人以重创，使任何敌军不寒而栗.

original: Mass Infantry tactics were a departure from the linear tactics that had been dominant for so long. These units can be summed up in two of the maxims of the famous Russian general Suvorov 'train hard, fight easy' and 'The bullet is a fool, the bayonet is a fine chap'. They were highly drilled shock infantry who favored the mass charge over musket fire.
translation: 步兵海战术与长久以来主宰战场的直线战术有所不同，这些单位可以用俄国名将苏沃洛夫的两句名言概括，即“训练场上多流汗，战场之上不流血”和“子弹是笨蛋，刺刀是好汉”.这些训练有素的突击步兵们相对于火枪射击来说更偏爱集体冲锋.

original: As more ideas were imported from Western Europe, the Eastern infantry man became much more like his Western European counterpart. The Green Coat infantry had its origins in Russia and its western training methods and equipment gave their units with more staying power in combat than ever before. It also represented a shift from the Petrine defense tactics to a more offensive unit.
translation: 随着西欧更多新思想的引进，东欧的步兵渐渐向他们西方的同行靠拢.绿衣步兵起源于俄国，西式装备与训练法使得他们在战斗中比以前更具持久力.这也表示彼得大帝的防守战术开始向进攻转变.

original: The Hussars of Eastern Europe had long been equipped with a lance along with other equipment. The lance was a power weapon in the attack, allowing a trooper to reach his enemy before the enemy could reach him, however, once the enemy managed to get passed the lance the lancer was vulnerable. Lance equipped cavalry were very strong in the attack but weak defensively.
translation: 东欧骠骑兵早已装备长矛与其他装备.长矛在进攻中是强有力的武器，能在敌军的攻击范围之外率先攻击敌军，然而，一旦进入敌军的攻击范围，长矛手是很危险的.装备长矛的骑兵非常善于进攻，但防守略逊一筹.

original: Petrine Infantry have their roots in the defeat of the Russian Armies at the battle of Narva during the Great Northern War. The army had been decisively routed by the better trained, but numerically inferior, Swedish Army and the army needed new tactics if it was to succeed. Trained with iron discipline, the Petrine Infantry excelled in defense. Their tactics were built around wearing down the enemys' ability to fight through sheer staying power.
translation: 彼得步兵经历了俄军在大北方战争时期纳尔瓦之战的失败之后，果断加强训练，但人数上还是略少.如果想取胜，他们和瑞典军都要采用新战术.在纪律严苛的训练之下，彼得步兵善于防守，他们的战术是包围敌军，依靠绝对的持久力使敌军难以再战.

original: August the Strong, Elector of Saxony, was not just famous for siring more bastards than any other European Monarch, he was also King of Poland. During his reign he brought more offensive infantry tactics to the Polish military, and the units became known as Saxon Infantry.
translation: 铁腕奥古斯特二世，萨克森选帝侯，不仅以拥有比欧洲其他王公多得多的私生子而闻名，也是波兰的国王。在他的统治下，波兰军队引入了更多的步兵进攻战术，这些军队之后以「萨克森步兵」之名闻名。

original: The Highland Infantry divisions which make up such a recognizable force in many of today's Commonwealth armies have their roots in the semi-feudal clan system of north and west Scotland. Scottish Highlanders were lightly armored clansmen, often equipped with the traditional Scottish basket-hilted sword, the claymore, as well as small knives, known as dirks. Later Highland soldiers also carried pistols. They were feared for the ferocity of their attack, particularly the famous Highland Charge, used to smash through enemy lines. Following the Jacobite rebellions, the Scottish Highlanders were gradually assimilated into the British Army. The first such Highland troops were the Black Watch, or 42nd Highland Regiment of Foot, who fought valiantly at Fontenoy during the War of Austrian Succession. The Highland Regiments subsequently became a feared fighting force, noted in particular for bravery and a refusal to surrender.
translation: 高地步兵师是英军的重要组成部分，他们来自于半殖民地半封建的苏格兰西部与北部氏族社会，苏格兰高地兵穿轻甲，常配有传统的苏格兰大剑及小飞刀，后来高地士兵还配有手枪.他们凶猛的进攻常使人胆寒，尤其是著名的高地冲锋，常用来粉碎敌军的阵线.在詹姆斯党叛乱之后，苏格兰高地兵逐渐融入英军.第一支高地兵团是“黑卫士”或称第42高地步兵团，他们在奥地利王位继承战争中的丰特努瓦之战作战十分勇猛.之后高地兵团便成为一股令人生畏的力量，尤其是他们的英勇与不屈.

original: A cavalry unit most often relying on indirect military tactics, harassing and raiding its enemies.
translation: 这种骑兵往往采用侧翼袭扰的战术作战.

original: The Stratioti developed in the Albanian-Greek areas of the Balkan. With little or no armor, they were armed with sabers, lances and maces. This light cavalry was excellent for screening, reconnaissance and for raiding into disarrayed or fleeing enemies. With the fall or Byzantium many sought refuge in the west, and the Venetian Stratioti cavalry of the late 15th century is believed by some to have introduced modern light cavalry tactics to the west.
translation: 巴尔干骑兵产生并发展于巴尔干半岛的阿尔巴尼亚－希腊地区。他们鲜有披挂，常手持弯刀、长矛及狼牙棒。这种轻骑兵擅长侦查及突袭乱军、逃兵等。随着拜占庭的沦陷，许多人寻求去西方避难，而15世纪晚期威尼斯的巴尔干骑兵据说又给西方带去了现代化轻骑兵战术。

original: An early form of European artillery used for both sieges and defense. The Bombard was a simple cannon able to hurl projectiles at enemy defenses. The missile of choice was often a metal ball or large stone, intended to cause damage to fortifications rather than enemy personnel. Even the smaller Bombards were heavy and difficult to move quickly during battle, limiting their use against infantry and cavalry formations.
translation: 早期的欧洲火炮是用来攻城和防守的，火炮是一种能将炮弹打到敌军防线的建议火炮.炮弹通常选用金属球或大石头，旨在破坏防御工事而非杀伤敌军.即使是小型的火炮也难以在战斗中快速移动，这限制了它对抗步兵与骑兵的能力.

original: A traditional West African tribal warrior armed with a spear and a characteristic shield excelling in defensive strategies.
translation: 西非地区传统部族战士，装备长矛与盾牌，擅长于防御作战.

original: With the arrival of the Europeans to the Americas, gunpowder weapons came to be known by the local population. The advantages became apparent and it was only a matter of time before units appeared carrying muskets. The Defensive musketeer was the descendant of the mountain warriors, following a similar pattern of organization and focus but now armed with a musket. This unit is strongest in defense, but the new gunpowder weapons give it extra punch in attack.
translation: 随着欧洲人来到美洲，火器渐渐被当地人了解.其优势十分明显，出现火枪部队只不过是时间问题.守备滑膛枪兵脱胎于山地战士，组织形式大同小异，只不过是装备了火枪.这些部队最善防守，但新式火器又使他们在进攻中也能大展拳脚.

original: The basic unit of armies of South Americas. They were usually a peasant levy led by aristocratic officers and armed with spear and shield. This unit formed the backbone of the armies of states like the Inca Empire.
translation: 南美洲的基本军事单位。他们通常是由贵族军官征召的农民，配有矛与盾。这些单位形成了诸如印加等帝国的骨干力量。

original: The high mountains of the Andes created an environment which was far superior for defense rather than attack. There was a gradual evolution were infantry began to specialize in defense and staying power over attack.
translation: 安第斯山脉的高山创造了一个易守难攻的环境.这样的环境使得这里的步兵渐渐地变得精于防守，从而可以积累更多的力量来进行反击.

original: Tercio infantry was developed principally by the brilliant general Gonzalo Fernández de Córdoba (El Gran Capitán), during the Italian Wars. It was a mixed infantry formation of pikemen and musketeers. Because of this combined-arms approach, the formation simultaneously enjoyed both the rigidity of its heavy infantry and the long-range firepower of its musketeers, making it an ideal defensive and offensive formation. Tercio formations, with their disciplined and spirited professional soldiers, were famed on the European battlefield for their nearly invincible manner in combat during the 16th and 17th centuries. Their domination of the European battlefields came to a definite end with the Spanish defeat by the French at the battle of Rocroi in 1643. A new fighting system, promoted by Gustavus Adolphus, would take over from then on.
translation: 西班牙大方阵主要由智将贡萨洛·费尔南德斯·德·科尔多瓦(El Gran Capitán)在意大利战争期间所发展。这种战术采用长矛兵和火枪手混合编队。混合编队使大方阵同时拥有重步兵的近战优势和火枪手的远程火力，实现了攻防兼备的效果。大方阵战术配合以纪律严明，士气高昂的职业战士，在16至17世纪的欧洲战场上几乎所向无敌。1643年在罗克鲁瓦战役中大败于法国之后，西班牙对欧洲战场的主宰宣告终结。古斯塔夫·阿道弗斯所改良的新战术逐渐取代了大方阵的地位。

original: While the hussar Cavalry represented the balance between fire and shock, and the Dragoon cavalry relied primarily on their muskets, the arme blanche cavalry relied primarily on cold steel. The bold charges of these units could shatter enemy formations.
translation: 如果说骠骑兵实现了火力与突击力的平衡，而龙骑兵主要依赖的是滑膛枪，那么佩刀骑兵主要依赖的就是冷兵器了.这支部队凭借其勇猛的冲锋能够轻易撕碎敌人的阵型.

original: The military reforms of the Swedish king Charles XI created a new force of infantry, specializing in the attack. Devastating volleys of musket rounds would be the prelude to a mass charge.
translation: 瑞典国王查尔斯十一世的军事改革催生了一支全新的长于进攻的步兵部队.他们毁灭性的滑膛枪齐射正是一次大规模冲锋的前奏.

original: The pistol armed Caracole Cavalry came to dominate European cavalry tactics in Eastern Europe, although the traditional shock action cavalry style of the Hussars was still in use. Armies trained in the Western European warfare quite often came out second best in combat against these units. Borne out of the bloodshed of the Polish Wars, the Swedish army developed a different kind of unit, the Swedish Gallop Cavalry. Although still armed with pistols like the caracole they did not discharge their pistols before the shock action but as a part of the charge itself. The results were devastating during the Thirty Years' War, forcing the Imperial Caracole cavalry to adapt very quickly.
translation: 尽管那些起到传统的突击作用的骠骑兵仍在服役，东欧佩戴手枪的手枪骑兵逐渐成为了主宰欧洲战场的主力骑兵.西欧训练出来的部队在和这些骑兵交锋的过程中经常会处于下风.经过波兰战争的浴血洗礼，瑞典军队开发出了一支特殊的部队——瑞典轻骑兵.和手枪骑兵一样他们也装备了手枪，不同的是他们不会在突击行动中收起手枪，而是带着手枪进行冲锋.在30年的时间里他们的影响是毁灭性的，迫使帝国的手枪骑兵尽快做出适应.

original: In the early 17th century the musket had a loading time that was still very slow and musket fire needed to be concentrated in volleys to be destructive, as the weapons were very inaccurate and misfires were common. Such a slow reloading time meant that the unit would be very vulnerable if all the guns were fired simultaneously. Since the days of Maurice of Nassau this problem was overcome by arranging the unit in lines (twelve, eight or six deep). When the front rank fired, they would move away to the rear to reload, after which the next rank would fire. Gustavus Adolphus, the great Swedish king, significantly improved this Maurician infantry tactic. He trained his troops so well that he was able to reduce the number of ranks to only three (one kneeling, the second crouching and, the third standing) and yet still maintain continuous fire.
translation: 在17世纪初期，火枪的装填速度很慢，射击精度差，需要集中火力齐射才能发挥威力.但如果一支队伍的火器全部同时发射，则在其后的装填时间中将完全丧失战斗力.拿骚的莫里斯首先采用分列射击战术(例如纵深12，8或6列)，第一列士兵开火后撤退到后排重新装弹，同时第二列士兵上前开火.瑞典国王古斯塔夫进一步地改良了莫里斯的战术.他通过加强训练，使阵列的纵深缩减到三列(一列取跪姿，一列蹲下，一列站立)而仍能维持连续的火力.

original: Landsknechte were a type of infantry first created in the early 16th century in the Holy Roman Empire. They were mostly armed with a long spear or pike. George von Frundsberg is considered to be the creator of the Landsknechte. The Landsknechte fought mostly in a square type formation called the Pike Square. They were also famous for the elaborate clothing they wore on the battlefield.
translation: 长枪兵是16世纪神圣罗马帝国建立的兵种。他们主要装备长矛或长枪。乔治·冯·弗伦茨贝格被认为是日耳曼长枪兵部队的创立者。长枪兵作战时一般采用方阵队形。他们也因华丽的服饰而闻名于世。

original: A highly maneuverable and portable cannon. The Swivel gun was rather small and designed primarily for short range warfare.
translation: 一门高机动性与高便携性的大炮.回旋炮体积小巧，主要用于近距离作战.

original: The Cossack continued to evolve as a unit. The use of new weapons and tactics gave the units greater staying power in fire combat and more shock power.
translation: 随着时间的推移，哥萨克骑兵也不断进行着改良.新式武器和新型战术的引入使他们能拥有更强的射击火力和冲击能力.

original: A large battleship equipped with three gun decks, usually holding more than a 100 cannons.
translation: 拥有三层甲板的大型战舰，一般装备上百门加农炮.

original: Despite initial reluctance, muskets gradually became more commonly accepted during the late 16th century. The advantage of firearms had become undeniable and muskets slowly found their way into the Muslim infantry forces.
translation: 许多穆斯林国家起初并不重视火枪，直到16世纪晚期才开始大量引入.但火器所带来的巨大优势很快在穆斯林军队中体现出来.

original: Muslim cavalry unit armed with a matchlock musket.
translation: 使用滑膛枪的穆斯林骑兵部队.

original: A two-decked battleship normally equipped with 60 to 90 guns.
translation: 这种战舰有双层甲板，一般装备有60至90门炮.

original: The war galleon was a large galleon outfitted for war. It was larger and more heavily armed than the regular galleons, and served as protecting escorts to galleon fleets. The Spanish treasure fleets were made out of galleons and war galleons.
translation: 这种大型帆船专用于作战.比普通大帆船的吨位更大，武器更多，一般用于为大帆船队护航.西班牙运送美洲金银的舰船主要就是由大帆船和武装大帆船组成的.

original: East African warriors. Somewhat influenced by Western military defense tactics.
translation: 东非的勇士.某种程度上可以说受到了西方军事防御战术的影响

original: With the introduction of western training methods and new equipment, the hill warrior became a much more effective fighting man. The new training methods gave the unit much more cohesion in combat, while the new equipment improved the unit's abilities in both attack and defense. The hill warrior remained, however, a mainly defensive unit.
translation: 随着西方的训练方法以及新装备的引进，昔日的山地战士变得更加英勇善战.新的训练方法使得这支部队在战斗中更有凝聚力，而新的装备则同时提升了部队进攻与防守的能力.不过值得注意的是，山地战士主要还是一支防守型部队.

original: South African warriors influenced by Western military offense tactics and strategies.
translation: 受到西方军事进攻战术战略影响的南非战士

original: North African warriors influenced by Western military defense tactics and strategies.
translation: 受到西方军事防守战术战略影响的北非战士

original: As western military ideas were spread, even the forest warrior in the Americas was not immune to change. The new training techniques improved this unit's ability to withstand fire in combat.
translation: 随着西方军事理念的传播，美洲森林地区的战士进行了改良.新的训练方式提升了他们承受敌方火力打击的能力.

original: Central African warriors influenced by Western military defense and offense tactics.
translation: 受到西方军事防守战术战略影响的中非战士

original: The Westernized South American infantry were the successors of the mountain warriors of earlier eras. Western training and equipment has improved these units in all departments, but their focus remains defensive.
translation: 西化的南美步兵部队是早期山地勇士的继承者.西式的训练以及装备使这些部队各方面都得到了加强，但他们的重心仍然是在防守上.

original: The new military tactics of Europe were slowly spreading across the Americas. The new training methods strengthened the cohesion of the plains warrior, while the new equipment increased the effectiveness of the unit in all areas of combat.
translation: 来自欧洲的新型军事战术渐渐地传遍了整个美洲.新的训练方法加强了平原战士的凝聚力，同时也增强了部队战斗时全方位的效力.

original: The longbow was a missile weapon mostly used by infantry from England and Wales from the 14th to the 16th century. The weapon was very accurate and had a long range and was powerful enough to penetrate chain-mail armor. The English used this weapon with great success in the Hundred Years War against France, never more so than at the battles of Crécy and Agincourt. With the development of gunpowder, the longbow became obsolete. This was not because it was less powerful than the early muskets but because to become a good longbow-man, you had to train for many years, while training people to use fire-arms was much easier.
translation: 长弓是一种远程武器，十四世纪至十六世纪大量装备于英格兰和威尔士的步兵部队中.改武器精准度高，射程长，并且威力足以击穿链甲.英国人在对法的百年战争中凭借该武器取得了巨大的胜利，尤其是在克雷西和阿金库尔战役中.随着火药的发展，长弓渐渐过时了.这并不是由于其威力低于早期的滑膛枪，而是训练一个优秀的长弓兵需要花费数年的时间，训练一个人使用火器却要简单很多.

original: The basic soldier of Western European armies. They tended to be peasant levies with little or no training and very poor equipment. However when deployed en masse they could be devastating.
translation: 早期西欧军队的主力.一般都是临时征召的农民，训练和装备水平很差.不过仍然可能通过数量优势压倒敌人.

original: The medieval Knight originated in the Frankish kingdoms, where mounted warriors were rewarded with grants of land for their military service. This concept of a powerful warrior elite spread through Western Europe and became an integral part of the feudal system, in which Knights ranked amongst the minor nobility. With the development of the wraparound saddle and stirrups, Knights became more heavily armored and better able to charge down opposing infantry with deadly force. They were also known to fight dismounted using heavy melee weapons when circumstances dictated it.
translation: 中世纪骑士起源于法兰克王国，在那里，一些骑兵战士由于其军事贡献被封赏土地.这种强大的精英战士的概念很快就传遍了西欧并且成为封建制度不可获取的一部分，骑士在小贵族之间被分成不同等级.随着全包围型马鞍以及马镫的发展，骑士的装甲变得越来越重型，他们能更有效的使用致命的武力冲散对方的步兵.在被打下马后他们还能使用重型近战武器继续战斗.

original: The Man at Arms was a professional soldier in Western European armies of the late middle ages. Knights and noble families would employ a number of men at arms to form their retinue. They would tend to be better armed and armored than the ordinary feudal footsoldier. During the Hundred Years War, Men at Arms were those soldiers who fought on horseback or with heavy weaponry, but were not of a high social standing and so could not be referred to as Knights. The better equipped and better trained were known as Sergeants at Arms.
translation: 重装步兵是中世纪晚期西欧部队中的职业士兵.骑士和贵族家庭通常都会雇佣一定数量的重装步兵作为他们的随从.他们通常也会装备着比普通封建步兵更好的武器和护甲.在百年战争期间，重装步兵也会骑上战马携带重型武器战斗，但是他们没有很高的社会地位，因此不能被称为骑士.其中装备最好，训练最为有素的就是有名的“重装军士”.

original: Even the plains warrior with his emphasis on bravery in attack, could not ignore the benefits of the musket brought from Europe. The new offensive musketeers still retained their attack emphasis, but the gunpowder weapons gave them additional firepower.
translation: 即使平原战士再怎样骁勇善战，也不能忽略从欧洲引进的滑膛枪带来的好处.新的进攻性滑膛枪手保持了原先的骁勇善战，同时火药武器也为他们提供了额外的火力.

original: The plains warrior was the ultimate offensive unit in the Americas, but even they were not immune to progress. New weapons and tactics allowed the units to improve their offensive capability, while new training methods helped these warriors to maintain morale in combat.
translation: 平原战士曾经是美洲终极的进攻性部队，但即使是他们也没能抵挡进步的潮流.新式的武器和战术提升了这支部队的进攻能力，同时新的训练方法使得这些战士能在战斗中保持士气.

original: The area of the Zapotec empire created conditions highly suitable for offensive warfare. Here military units were developed that specialized in attack and used tactics designed to undermine the morale of their opponents.
translation: 萨波特克帝国的领土非常适合进行进攻战.这里的军事化部队非常善于进攻以及使用各种破坏对手士气的战术.

original: The Cossacks community originally grew up on the steppe boundary between Muscovy and Poland on one side and the Tatars on the other. In this savage environment of constant raiding, military communities of horsemen developed. They soon became in demand as hardy, if undisciplined, horsemen.
translation: 哥萨克社区起源并发展于莫斯科大公国、波兰以及鞑靼的草原边界一带.在充满战事的残酷环境之下，军事化的骑兵社区发展起来了.很快地，不遵纪守法的人要成为骑兵成了一种残酷的需求.

original: An African military strategy developed by the African chief Shaka during the 18th century. The warriors would surround their enemy by positioning smaller groups of warriors on the left and right flank, representing the horns of a buffalo, and a larger group would be positioned in the middle, representing the chest.
translation: 18世纪南非祖鲁人的首领沙卡发展出了一种最为先进的军事阵形.即以小队战士快速对敌军的两翼(即“犄角”)进行包抄，而主力部队在中央(即“胸部”)冲锋.

original: $TYPE$ from §Y$NATION$§W. \n If we do not respond before §Y$DATE$§W we will autodecline.
translation: §Y$NATION$§W$TYPE$。\n如果不在§Y$DATE$§W之前回复，就默认为拒绝。

original: $TYPE$. \n If we do not respond before §Y$DATE$§W we will autodecline.
translation: $TYPE$。\n如果不在§Y$DATE$§W之前回复，就默认为拒绝。

translation: 提议向$RECIPIENT$出售$FLEETNAME$舰队，含有$COMPOSITION$，价格为§Y$PRICE$§!¤。

original: You cannot sell a province that you do not control.
translation: 你不能出售不在你控制下的省份.

original: You can't sell ships while you or the recipient are at war.
translation: 你不能在你或者对方处于战争状态时出售舰船给他们。

translation: 你不能向宿敌出售舰船。

$PLAYER|Y$ has no fleet in $COUNTRY|Y$ supply range.
Offer to rent out Condottieri troops to them in exchange for payment.

$ACTOR|Y$ is offering to rent us the army
$ARMY|Y$ $UNITDESC$

original: §R- We cannot cancel this arrangement while we are at war, unless $MONTHS$ months have passed since it was put into effect, on $DATE|Y$.§!
translation: §R－不能在我们战争期间取消合约，除非它已经生效了 $MONTHS$ 个月，即 $DATE|Y$。§!

original: §R- We cannot cancel this arrangement while the recipient is at war, unless $MONTHS$ months have passed since it was put into effect, on $DATE|Y$.§!
translation: §R－不能在他们战争期间取消合约，除非它已经生效了 $MONTHS$ 个月，即 $DATE|Y$。§!

original: §R- We cannot cancel this arrangement until $MONTHS$ months have passed since it was put into effect, on $DATE|Y$.§!
translation: §R－在它已经生效 $MONTHS$ 个月之前，我们不能取消它，即 $DATE|Y$。§!

translation: §R-我们不能在战争时租出军队.§!

不能合并遣外雇佣军团.

You can only rent out a maximum of $VALUE$ units.
translation: 你最大只能租出$VALUE$个单位。

translation: §R这个将领正在指挥遣外雇佣军团，不能被替换.§!

translation: 当前没有遣外雇佣军团收入

original: §RThis army does not have a leader.§!

成为我们§Y卫戍国§!的提议

original: Click to offer to rent out $UNIT|Y$ as Condottieri
§R -You cannot rent out Condottieri to $RECIPIENT$ because you are already renting out troops to their enemy, $ENEMY$.§!
translation: §R -你不能租赁雇佣军给$RECIPIENT$，因为你已经有军队租赁了给他们的敌人$ENEMY$。§!

original: You can rent out a maximum of $VALUE|Y$ units

translation: §Y可用的雇佣军§! 进一步被修正: $SUM$\n

original: This value would be furthered modified by any Modifiers to §YAvailable Mercenaries§!.
translation: 这个数值将被§Y可用的雇佣军§!的修正效果进一步修正.

original: You cannot attach a unit to a ship when you have offered to rent it out as Condottieri.
translation: 你不能使已租出的遣外雇佣军团登船.

original: Condottieri can only be attached to ships belonging to the country that is paying for them, and only if the whole unit can fit onto the ship.
translation: 遣外雇佣军团只能登上出钱雇佣他们的国家的运输船，且须整个单位都能一次性运输才行.

original: The ruler of $NAME$ is Papal Controller.
For each province you have with a temple in it, you get a reduction in the cost for raising stability. Provinces with a temple have a green tick.
translation: 每一个拥有教堂的省份都将减少你的稳定费用. 拥有教堂的省份会有一个绿色的标志.

original: A workshop increases the tax income for a province. Provinces with workshops are marked by a green tick.
translation: 工场增加税收. 拥有工场的省份会有一个绿色的标志.

original: Regimental Camps increase the total number of troops a province can support and supply and also reduce the recruitment time. Provinces with Regimental Camps have a green tick.
translation: 军营增加省份所能支持部队上限并且减少补充时间. 拥有军营的省份会有一个绿色的标志.

original: A Shipyard increases the amount of naval units you can support and reduces the time it takes to build ships. You can only build shipyards in coastal provinces. Provinces with a green tick have shipyards already.
translation: 造船厂增加你能维持的海军总数并且减少舰船建造时间. 你只能在沿海省份建造船厂. 拥有船厂的省份会有一个绿色的标志.

original: A province with a constable has dramatically increased direct tax revenue and a slight increase in the local unrest. Provinces with green ticks have constables.
translation: 有治安所的省份将会显著直接增加税收和缓慢增加本地叛乱度. 有绿色的省份已建了治安所.

original: A province with a courthouse gets a reduction in local unrest. Provinces with a courthouse are marked with a green tick.
translation: 有法院的省份能降低叛乱度. 有法院的省份会被绿色信标标出.

original: A Market Place increases both the population growth and the trade income of a province. Provinces with a market place are marked with a green tick.
translation: 市场将增加人口增长同时也增加省份贸易收入. 拥有市场的省份会有一个绿色的标志.

original: Tax Assessors reduce inflation in a province. A green tick denotes a tax assessor is already present.
translation: 税务局姜减少通货膨胀. 拥有税务官的省份会有一个绿色的标志.

original: War Colleges give a yearly increase in army tradition. War colleges cannot be built in provinces which have an admiralty. Green ticks denote provinces with war colleges.
translation: 陆军学院每年提供一定的陆军传统.陆军学院不能在已有港务局的行省建造.有绿勾的表示该行省已经建有陆军学院.

original: An Admiralty gives a yearly increase in naval tradition. Admiralties cannot be built in provinces with a war college. A green tick denotes a province with an admiralty.
translation: 海军学院每年都将增加陆军传统. 不能在已经有陆军学院的省份建造. 拥有海军学院的省份会有一个绿色的标志.

original: A Customs house gives a small increase in local taxation. A green tick denotes a province with a customs house.
translation: 海关将略微的增加当地税收. 拥有海关的省份会有一个绿色的标志.

original: This value represents how effective a unit is at inflicting damage in the shock phase.
translation: 进攻冲击力体现了单位在冲击阶段造成伤害的能力.

original: This is how effective a unit is at resisting damage in the shock phase.
translation: 防守冲击力体现了单位在冲击阶段抵抗伤害的能力.

original: The value represents how effective a unit is at inflicting damage in the fire phase of combat.
translation: 进攻火力体现了单位在射击阶段造成伤害的能力.

original: This value represents how effective a unit is at resisting damage in the fire phase.
translation: 防守火力体现了单位在射击阶段抵抗伤害的能力.

original: The Offensive Morale Value is how effective the unit is at inflicting morale damage on the enemy.
translation: 进攻士气体现了单位对打击敌方士气的能力.

original: This value is how effective the unit is at resisting morale damage.
translation: 防守士气体现了单位对抵抗士气打击的能力.

original: This represents the ability of a unit to attack opponents who are not in front of them in combat.
translation: 机动力体现了单位侧面打击敌军的能力.

original: When our §Y$NUM$§W additional merchants arrive, our profits should increase. \n The first one will arrive on $DATE$.
translation: 当我们§Y$NUM$§W个后续的商人抵达后，我们的收入将会提高。\n其中第一个将在$DATE$抵达。

original: Our Colonist has §Y$CHANCE$§W% chance of success. The Colony currently has §Y$NUM$§W Settlers and §Y$NATIVES$§W natives living there.
translation: 我们的殖民者有§Y$CHANCE$§W%的成功率.当前殖民地生活着§Y$NUM$§W个移民和§Y$NATIVES$§W个土著人

original: It is on the move towards §Y$DEST$§W.
If we are successful, the cardinal will support us and we gain §G$GAIN$§W prestige. If we should fail, we will lose §R$LOSS$§W.
translation: 如果成功，这名枢机将会支持我国且我们将获得§G$GAIN$§W威望。如果失败，我们将失去§R$LOSS$§W威望。

original: This message type currently $TRUTH$ displayed as a popup.
translation: 这条信息$TRUTH$以弹框的形式显示。

original: This message type currently $TRUTH$ displayed in the log.
translation: 这条信息$TRUTH$以日志的形式显示。

original: This message type currently $TRUTH$ displayed on the map (if applicable).
translation: 这条信息$TRUTH$在地图上显示（如果适用）。

original: Countries we have a Casus Belli against
translation: 我们拥有宣战借口的国家

original: These are the countries that we have a Casus Belli against. Declaring war on one of these countries costs us less reputation and stability.
translation: 我们拥有宣战借口的国家. 对其宣战时名声和稳定度的损失较少.

original: Countries that have Casus Bellis against us
translation: 对我们拥有宣战借口的国家

original: These are the countries that have a Casus Belli against us. These are countries that could be the most dangerous in the field of diplomacy as they are the ones most likely to declare war on us.
translation: 对我们拥有宣战借口的国家. 这些国家在外交方面具有很大的危险同时也更倾向于对我们宣战.
我们实行贸易禁运的国家
对我们实行贸易禁运的国家

original: Claim Sole Defender of the Faith
translation: 宣布成为信仰的唯一守护者

original: Can't colonize $REGION|Y$ because we have conceded it to @$TAG$ $WHOM$, and will have to start a war to cancel that treaty.
translation: 不能殖民$REGION|Y$地区，因为我们已经割让给了@$TAG$$WHOM$，取消合约将引发一场战争。

original: $FROM$ will be forced to make $GIVER$ concede $REGION$ to $TO$.
translation: $FROM$ 将强迫 $GIVER$ 割让 $REGION$ 给 $TO$.

original: $FROM$ will be forced to concede $REGION$ to $TO$.
Can't cancel this because it belongs to $WHO|Y$.
You need to restart for the change to take effect.
translation: 你需要重新启动以使设定生效

original: Error writing to the settings file. Check that the file is not write-protected and try again
translation: 写入设定文件出错. 确定该文件没有被保护然后再尝试

original: Click the nation you wish to play...
Click on the map to select a nation...
Click a province on the map to select your capital.
translation: 在地图上点击一个省份选作你的首都.

original: Click a province on the map to add or remove it from your country.
translation: 在地图上点击一个省份加入到你的国家中或是将其从你的国家中去除.

original: It's not possible to load a savegame in multiplayer.
translation: 在多人游戏中无法读取存档。

original: It's not possible to load a savegame in Ironman mode.
translation: 在铁人模式下无法读取存档。

original: Saving as a client is locked by gameplay settings.
translation: 游戏设定无法使用客机存档。

original: Only clients can tell its country AI what to do when the client is away (since the host can't leave the game).
translation: 当客机离线的时候只有客机才能设定AI的发展方向(因为主机不能离线)

original: Click to see what all players can see.
translation: 点选查看所有玩家视野

original: Click on a shield to release as Dependency...

translation: 我们要求全面吞并对方。
收到了全面吞并的要求。

original: We need at least $NUMBER|Y$ able bodied men (§GManpower§!) to build this unit.
translation: 建立这支部队需要1000后备兵员

original: We need at least $NUMBER|Y$ able bodied men (§GSailors§!) to build this unit.
translation: 至少需要$NUMBER|Y$可用人员(§G水手§!)以建造本单位.

original: This army has moved more than §Y$AMT$%§! of the distance to the next province, and can no longer be stopped or redirected.
translation: 这支军队已经移动了超过 §Y$AMT$%§! 的距离到相邻的省份，已经不能撤回或者转向.

original: §Y$UNITNAME$§! has moved more than §Y$AMT$%§! of the distance to the next province, and can no longer be stopped or redirected.
translation: §Y$UNITNAME$§! 已经移动了超过 §Y$AMT$%§! 的距离到相邻的省份，已经不能撤回或者转向.

original: Calculating paths...\nThis may take several minutes.
translation: 计算路径\n这将需要几分钟
§G右键 忽略\nShift+右键 屏蔽§!

original: For many years now our more advanced neighbors have laughed at us for our backward form of government. Well, no longer - as of today our great leader is a King!
translation: 多年以来，那些比我们更先进的邻居们一直嘲笑我们落后的政权形式.今天，这一切结束了——国王将是我们至高无上的领袖！

original: Our tribe is mightier than their tribe!
translation: 我们的部落更它们更加强大!

original: This is how well the fleet is positioned in the current battle. This is determined by the leader's maneuver value and the average sailing speed of the fleet. The larger the fleet is, the lower the maximum value is. This fleet currently cannot have more than $CAP$ positioning.
translation: 体现了在当前战斗中舰队的展开程度.该值由将领的机动力以及舰队的平均航行速度决定.舰队越庞大则该值上限越小.当前舰队的展开度上限为$CAP$.

original: Gotland sits in a key strategic location in the center of the Baltic Sea. For Denmark to remain a great power it must pass to Swedish control.
translation: 哥特兰岛坐落在波罗的海中心的一个重要战略位置上.为了使丹麦保持强大，它必须要转交给瑞典控制.

original: If the requirements are not met, the building disappears.
translation: 如果以下要求无法满足，这个建筑将消失.

original: It may be sparsely populated, but a united Scotland stands strong in the face of any opposition.
translation: 他们或许人丁稀少， 但一个统一的苏格兰将顽强地 面对他们所有的敌人.

original: War with our old enemy England galvanizes the country and brings out everyone who can carry a weapon!
translation: 与我们的老对手英格兰的战争，刺激了国家和能拿起武器的每个人！

original: Does NOT have war between civilized and nomads.
translation: 游牧民和定居者之间永远没有和平.

original: Have war between civilized and nomads.
$COUNTRY$ is offering Military Access to us. Accepting will allow us to move armies into their land.
translation: $COUNTRY$提议给予我国军事通行权。接受后我们的军队将被允许进入他们境内。

original: An exuberant Hungarian light cavalry unit renowned throughout Europe for its high discipline and skill.
translation: 服饰华丽的匈牙利胡萨尔轻骑兵，以其严明的纪律和战斗精神闻名全欧洲。

original: $SIZE$ tribe(s) of hostile natives will appear in $WHERE$.\n
translation: $SIZE$名怀有敌意的的原住民出现于$WHERE$. \n

original: The $WHO$ in the siege in $WHERE$ will get $SIZE$ penalties.

By introducing into circulation coins with a lesser precious metal content than is at the moment, we will reduce people's confidence in the coinage. This could cause an increase in inflation for our rival.
translation: 通过引入贵金属含量更少的流通硬币，我们会降低民众对铸币的信心.此举也会导致对手的通胀上升.

original: Several judiciously placed bribes to some of the most influential people in this country will cause them to speak out against the current government. This could cause the stability of this, no doubt, hostile state to fall.
translation: 贿赂该国最有影响力的人物，促使他们公开反对其政府. 导致该国稳定程度下降

original: The liberal supply of beads, blankets, whiskey and particularly guns might be just enough to convince the natives of this province to rise up in revolt against those that would take our legitimate land.
translation: 只要赠送一些珠宝，毛毯，烈酒和枪支，就可以说服该地区的原住民发动针对殖民当局的叛乱

original: A fortress can be very tiresome to siege, however, a small sum of gold placed into the right hands can be just the thing to speed the process along.
translation: 堡垒对于攻城来说是不小的麻烦，但是要是能把一小笔黄金交到合适的人手上，那这个麻烦很快就能解决了.

original: On §Y$DATE$§W this province will have slipped far enough from their grip and they will lose the Core Province.
translation: §Y$DATE$§W该国将失去这个省份的核心，因为这里脱离他们的掌控已经很久了。

original: They have control of the province.
translation: 该国拥有该省份的控制权

original: Their subject has control of the province.
translation: 他们的属国控制着这个省份。

original: Their suzerain has control of the province.
translation: 他们的宗主控制着这个省份。

original:
A nation will lose a Core Province §Y$YEARS$§W years after the most recent of the following: 
1) After having received it. 
2) After the most recent time the nation was at war with the current owner. 
3) The most recent owner change of the province.

A nation will gain a core province §Y$GAIN$§W years after having taken ownership.
translation:
一个国家在下列情形（以最近发生为准）的§Y$YEARS$§W年后会失去核心省份：
1) 得到以后。
2) 该国与省份所有者最近一次战争之后。 
3) 省份最近一次变更所有者之后。

一个国家也会在获得其所有权§Y$GAIN$§W年后得到一个核心省份。

original: This country may be created from this province, or appear as a new country if a revolt grows strong enough.
translation: 这个国家能通过这个省份创立，当叛军足够强时也能从这里独立出来。

original: This is a war that they have started.
translation: 这场战争是他们挑起的.

original: This is a defensive war, where we need to help our ally.
translation: 这是一场防御性战争，我们需要帮助我们的盟友防守

original: A vassal or a lesser partner of a union cannot sign a peace treaty.
translation: 附庸国或被联合统治的国家无法签订和平条约。

original: Our enemies have managed to disrupt our trade efficiency by inciting a number of quarrels and disagreements.
translation: 我们的敌人通过挑起不同意见和煽动了一系列的争吵，使得我们的贸易效率降低了

original: Our spy force has been infiltrated and as a result our intelligence is no longer reliable.
translation: 我们的间谍组织已经被他国所渗透，因此所获得的情报也不再可信.

original: Our enemies have managed to infiltrate our forces.
translation: 敌人已经设法渗透到了我们的军队之中

original: The rebels that are tormenting our nation have received unexpected support.
translation: 困扰我国的叛乱者得到了预料之外的支援
陆军传统的年度性衰减
海军传统的年度性衰减

original: This technology is $NUMBER$ years ahead of its time, so it is more difficult to reach.
translation: 当前年份早于此级科技设定时间$NUMBER$年，因过于超前而难以获得.

original: You are lesser partner of a union.
translation: 你处于被联合统治状态。

original: Only the major partner of the union has full control of the monarch and will be able to make a ruler out of him.
translation: 仅主导联合统治的一方对君主有完整控制权，并可将其选拔为统治者。

original: Their armies are not beaten yet though.
translation: 对方军队尚未被完全击败

original: Ever since Peter III drove the Duke of Anjou out of Sicily, the Kingdom has been in our eyes a rightful part of Aragon. It is time now to reassert those rights.
translation: 自从彼得三世把安茹公爵赶出西西里后，这个王国就成为了阿拉贡合法的一部分. 现在是时候去再次得到这些领地了.

original: You cannot raise war taxes when only at war with nomads.
translation: 只与游牧民族交战时，你不能征收战争税.

original: Shinobi are spies, scouts and assassins. They are skilled in the art of ninjutsu and their abilities involve invisibility and control over the elements.
translation: 忍者是间谍，斥候和刺客.他们精于忍术，善于隐匿身形和操控人心.

original: Our armies are confiscating the swords of our enemies.
translation: 你的军队正在没收敌人的刀剑.

original: The time has come to unite Japan by force! The time for diplomacy is over and all these warring daimyo lords must be conquered.
translation: 以武力统一日本的时候到了！外交时间结束，所有互相敌对的大名都必须被平定。

original: The warring factions of Japan have finally been united under a strong emperor.
translation: 群雄割据的日本终于被一位强大的天皇统一。

original: The warring factions of Japan have finally been united under a strong emperor.
translation: 群雄割据的日本终于被一位强大的天皇统一。

original: Daimyo, the Kami of our native Han have grown restless because of our realm's lack of stability, and our insistence at keeping our national focus away from our capital. Move the national focus to the capital, and the spirits will again look favorably upon us.
translation: 大名殿下，我们的神变得越来越不安，因为我国政局动荡，而且我们的国家焦点远离首都.将国家焦点移回首都，神明会再次保佑我们.

original: The ways of our warriors must be guided at all times by a sound philosophy of virtue and proper conduct. Loyalty, honor and obedience, such is the way of the Bushido. Strengthen our military tradition, and our realm will be respected throughout Japan.
translation: 我们的武士的行为方式必须时时刻刻处于美德和正义的指引之下.忠义，荣誉和服从，这是武士道的准则.强化我们的陆军传统，我们的国家将受到全日本的敬重.

original: A new style of dance based dramatic performance is sweeping the country and becoming more popular by the day. Support the Kabuki tradition of playwriting, and our family will become known as patrons of the arts.
translation: 一种新型的基于戏剧表演风格的舞蹈正风靡全国，变得越来越受欢迎.支持歌舞伎艺术的传统创作，这样我们就能成为众所周知的艺术赞助者.

original: Some of our merchants have begun engaging in longer distance trading by using a new brand of armored trading ships. By strengthening our own merchant class this could be an opportunity to learn some valuable maritime lessons.
translation: 一些商人开始使用新型的武装商船，以进行远洋海外贸易.通过提高我国商业水平，我们将有机会学到很多无价的海洋知识.

original: The Shinobi are a dark clad caste of spies, assassins and warriors operating throughout Japan. By setting up a well funded circle of Shinobi of our own we can protect family, clan and Han.
translation: 忍者是暗中活动于全日本的一种间谍，刺客和战士的混合体.通过建立一个在我们控制下的忍者集团，我们可以保护家族成员和藩臣的安全.

original: Many years have passed since the Divine Wind blew an invading Mongol army away from Japan, and saved the Motherland from foreign invasion. In the future, perhaps we should be better prepared?
translation: 距离神风摧毁入侵日本的蒙古大军并拯救日本免遭外敌蹂躏已经有很多年了.今后，也许我们应该做好更完善的准备？

original: §Y$FACTION$§W will not allow us to go over our force limit
translation: §Y$FACTION$§W 不允许我们超过军队上限

original: We have sent a mission to Europe to further our diplomatic contacts with the West.
translation: 我们派遣了一只外交使团到欧洲，以增强我们与西方国家的外交联系.

original: By sending an Embassy mission to the West we can perhaps learn new things about these strange and foreign lands.
translation: 通过派遣外交使团到西方，我们可以学到这片陌生的外国土地的很多东西.

original: A small community of foreign Christians are operating in this province, preaching and spreading the word of their foreign god.
translation: 一小股外国基督教徒正在这个省份行动，传播他们的外国宗教.

original: §Y$FACTION$§W is not the most powerful faction.

translation: §Y$ESTATE$§W阶层影响力提高了§Y$CHANGE$§W（当前为$CURRENT$），持续到$DATE|Y$。\n

original: The §Y$ESTATE$§! Estate gains §G$LOYALTY$%§! to loyalty change rate until $DATE|Y$.\n
The §Y$ESTATE$§! Estate loses §R$LOYALTY$%§! of loyalty change rate until $DATE|Y$.\n

Since The new Kirishitan religion from Europe has spread so far and wide within our Han, we have considered converting to this new creed. The implications of abandoning the faith of our ancestors are not to be taken lightly.
translation: 由于切支丹在我们藩国传播得如此深入和广泛，我们考虑改信这种新宗教.但是违背祖宗之道的后果肯定不会很轻。

original: We have imported effective weapons from the west.
translation: 我们从西方进口了一批先进武器.

original: A beautiful rock garden in this province is gaining us a reputation as a patron of the arts.
translation: 这座美丽的石头花园为我们建立了热心资助艺术的声誉.

original: The Celestial Empire proclaims its rulers to be sons of the heaven who are born to govern the country in divine right.
translation: 天朝宣称其统治者是天子，掌管这个国家是其天命所归。

original: $PROV|Y$ is NOT controlled by the $ESTATE|Y$ Estate.
$PROV|Y$ is NOT controlled by an Estate.
§Y$ESTATE$§W control of land is §Y$VALUE$§W or greater
§Y$ESTATE$§W control of land is lower than §Y$VALUE$§W
The Mandate of Heaven blesses and legitimizes the just rule and ruler, and woe to those who seek to rule in defiance of it.
translation: 正统的君王受命于天，天命可以使君主的统治合法化，并使那些反抗天命的人众叛亲离。

original: Our people no longer consider our rule to be blessed with the Mandate of Heaven.
translation: 人民不再认为我们的王朝受到上天庇佑。

original: You are currently not Connected to Paradox Connect.\nClick here to connect.
translation: 你尚未连接到Paradox网络.\n点击这里连接.

original: You are currently Connected to Paradox Connect.\nClick here to connect to view your achievements.
translation: 你已经连接到Paradox网络.\n点击这里查看你的成就.

original: By connecting to Paradox Connect you will gain access to a large number of achievements you can earn ingame. You will need to have an account on the Paradox Forums to do be connected.
translation: 通过连接到Paradox网络你可以在游戏中完成一大批成就.你需要一个Paradox论坛的帐号来连接.

original: $PROV|Y$ will come under the control of $ESTATE|Y$.
$PROV|Y$ will come under the control of $ESTATE|Y$, increasing their Influence by $POWER|Y$.
$PROV|Y$ will no longer be under the control of $ESTATE|Y$.
The Commanderies are the system of the generals and commanders of the Imperial armies. Eager to prove their valor and loyalty they seek to promote war over diplomacy to be able to advance in rank.
translation: 都督府是帝国军队的将军和指挥官们的组织机构。为了证明自己的英勇和忠诚，他们寻求通过外交手段来促进战争，以提高自己的地位。

original: The office organizing the provincial bureaucrats in charge of trade and seafaring. Seeking to promote profitable trade they are often opposed to the militaristic ambitions of the Commanderies.
translation: 这个部门组织各省的官僚负责贸易和航海。为了寻求促进有利可图的贸易，他们经常反对都督府的军事野心。

original: The corps of administrators promoted through the Imperial Examination system. Brilliant Confucian scholars, these men are the diplomats and bureacrats of the Empire. They promote policies to build a stable and strong Empire.
translation: 一群通过帝国科举体系提拔的行政官吏。这些才华横溢的儒家学者是帝国的外交官和官僚们。他们促进政策以建立强大而稳定的帝国。

original: Bring the brightest scholars in the nation together under one roof.
translation: 将这个国家所有明智的贤人聚集到一个屋顶下.

original: We have taken the Northern Capital and defeated the false emperors. The Middle Kingdom must be united under a Manchu banner. Our dynasty shall reign for a thousand years!
translation: 京城陷落，伪帝伏诛。满洲入主中原，吾朝千秋万载！

original: Enlist disgruntled soldiers and officers from the Ming army and establish the Green Standard Army.
translation: 征募明军中不满的官兵以组建绿营。

original: Break free from our Mongolian heritage and create a proper alphabet for the Manchu language.
translation: 摆脱蒙古文的束缚，设计更加适合满语的文字系统.

original: Establish a more centralized military force by establishing the Eight Banners.
translation: 通过组建八旗来建立更加集中的军事力量。

original: A loyal and effective government organ.
translation: 一个更加忠诚和有效率的政府机构.

original: Gathering together the brightest scholars of the nation.
translation: 聚集这个国家所有明智的贤人.

original: Reviews cases of subjects who feel they have been treated unfairly by the government or landlords.
translation: 评审认为自己被政府或君主剥削及不公平对待的国民们的事务.

original: We have rejected the people's request of installing the Sinmun Office.
translation: 我们已经拒绝了民众建立申闻鼓院的要求。

original: We have introduced the Manchu alphabet.
translation: 我们已经引进了满洲的字母

original: We have established the Eight Banners.
We have established the Green Standard Army.
A governmental form where a sovereign or military ruler rule a tribal chiefdom, with constant Casus Bellis on all their neighbors and troops who fight better on the plains.
translation: 一种由君主或军事领袖统治部落酋长国的政府形式，拥有无条件对周边国家的宣战理由以及平原作战能力更强的军队。

original: We are a nomadic people. As such we reject all other offers but gold or total submission!
translation: 我们是游牧民族.我们拒绝一切和约，除了进贡和彻底臣服!

original: Our enemy is a nomadic tribe, the only peace they understand is gold or steel!
translation: 我们的敌人是游牧民族，他们唯一能接受的和约是进贡或者毁灭!

original: A nomad tribe must control all provinces to be able to demand submission.
translation: 游牧民族必须控制所有省份才能要求投降.

original: Are you sure you want to destroy the $BUILDING$ in $PROVINCE$?\n$EFFECT$
This area is too remote and inhospitable to be permanently settled.
translation: 这个区域太过荒凉偏僻，不适合永久定居。

original: Can't colonize while nation is bankrupt.
Can only have one in each country, we have one in §Y$PROVINCE$§W
translation: 每个国家只能拥有一个，现在在 §Y$PROVINCE$§W 已经拥有一个

original: §RCan only have one high level building in a province§W
translation: §R省份内只能拥有一个高等级建筑§W

original: §RThis is already being built in your country§W
Reactionaries are violently opposed to any attempts at westernization by the government. They demand the old system be restored.
translation: 反动分子猛烈抗议政府西方化的任何尝试.他们要求重建旧的体系.

original: We have a nomadic tribe as our neighbor
translation: 我们的一个邻国是游牧民族

original: With the nomadic hordes on our doorstep we need to carve out a buffer zone to protect our valuable core provinces. Sending colonists to $PROVINCENAME$ will increase our chance of bringing into our control.
translation: 由于游牧民族处于我们家门口，我们不得不分出一个缓冲区域来保护我们有价值的核心省份.派遣殖民队到 $PROVINCENAME$ 可以增加将其纳入我们控制的机会.

original: Unify all Malayan provinces in the region under one strong ruler.
translation: 使该区域所有的马来亚省都统一到一名强力统治者之下

original: Conquered Borneo and the Malay Peninsula.
translation: 征服婆罗洲和马来半岛。

original: Conquered Sumatra and the Malay Peninsula.
translation: 征服苏门答腊和马来半岛。
征服苏门答腊和婆罗洲。

original: Form the mighty Hindustan and bring all the lands of the Indian subcontinent under your rule.
translation: 成立强大的印度斯坦并把所有印度次大陆置于我们的统治之下。

original: Form the mighty Hindustan and bring all the lands of the Indian subcontinent under your rule.
translation: 成立强大的印度斯坦并把所有印度次大陆置于我们的统治之下。

original: Form the mighty Hindustan and bring all the lands of the Indian subcontinent under your rule.
translation: 成立强大的印度斯坦并把所有印度次大陆置于我们的统治之下。

original: Form the mighty Hindustan and bring all the lands of the Indian subcontinent under your rule.
translation: 成立强大的印度斯坦并把所有印度次大陆置于我们的统治之下。

original: Form the mighty Hindustan and bring all the lands of the Indian subcontinent under your rule.
translation: 成立强大的印度斯坦并把所有印度次大陆置于我们的统治之下。

original: Form the mighty Bharat and bring all the lands of the Indian subcontinent under your rule.
translation: 成立强大的婆罗多并把所有印度次大陆至于我们的统治之下.

original: Form the mighty Bharat and bring all the lands of the Indian subcontinent under your rule.
translation: 成立强大的婆罗多并把所有印度次大陆至于我们的统治之下.

original: Form the mighty Bharat and bring all the lands of the Indian subcontinent under your rule.
translation: 成立强大的婆罗多并把所有印度次大陆至于我们的统治之下.

original: Form the mighty Bharat and bring all the lands of the Indian subcontinent under your rule.
translation: 成立强大的婆罗多，将所有的印度次大陆都至于你的统治之下.

original: Form the mighty Bharat and bring all the lands of the Indian subcontinent under your rule.
translation: 成立强大的婆罗多，将所有的印度次大陆都至于你的统治之下

We own §Y$FRAC$%§W of the Trade Value: §G$VAL$%§W
translation: 我们拥有贸易总价值§Y$FRAC$%§W中的：§G$VAL$%§W

translation: 他们拥有贸易总价值§Y$FRAC$%§W中的：§G$VAL$%§W

translation: 世界上 §Y$VAL$§W% 的 §Y$GOOD$§W 都在此交易.

translation: 我们获得了全球 §Y$VAL$§W% 的 §Y$GOOD$§W 供应

original: As a daimyo you cannot declare war on your emperor.
translation: 作为大名你无法向天皇宣战.

original: Trading totaling §Y$VAL$§W% of world supply gives:
translation: 贸易总额占全球供给的§Y$VAL$§W%所提供的加成：

translation: 这些货物在此交易(占全球市场的百分比):

translation: 我们获得了全球供应的 §Y$VAL$§W% ，我们需要获得 §Y$VAL2$§W% :
§Y$LEADER$§W 是主要生产者. (他们：§Y$THEIR$§W% 我们：§Y$OUR$§W%):

original: Owning or producing a translation of the holy bible is a legal offense punishable by burning at the stake.
translation: 拥有或生产圣经译本是会依法被处以绑在火刑柱上烧死的惩罚.

original: Make it an illegal offense, punishable by burning at the stake to either own or produce a translation of the holy bible.
translation: 将此作为违法行为，对拥有或生产圣经译本的人处以绑在火刑柱上烧死的惩罚.

original: We are not the leading producer of §Y$GOOD$§W\n
translation: 我们不是§Y$GOOD$§W的主要生产者\n

original: We are the leading producer of §Y$GOOD$§W\n
Trading enough of §Y$GOOD$§W to get extra bonus\n
translation: 足以获得额外奖励的§Y$GOOD$§W贸易\n

original: Is NOT trading enough of §Y$GOOD$§W to get extra bonus\n
translation: 不足以获得额外奖励的§Y$GOOD$§W贸易\n
