Don't have access to §Y$VAL$§W% of the world §Y$GOOD$§W Market.
Saruhan sounds a lot like a threat to the Lords of the West. If Aragon is ever to fulfill their destiny Saruhan must be defeated.
translation: 萨鲁罕听上去非常像是对西方君主的威胁.如果阿拉贡希望延续他们的气运那就必须击败萨鲁汉.

original: A powerful Shogun will bolster morale among his troops and attract new recruits willing to serve in his army.
translation: 一位强力的大将军有助于他麾下部队的士气，并吸引更多的士兵加入他的军队.

original: You cannot send a colonist here while at peace with the owner
translation: 你不能在与此地拥有者的和约期间将殖民队派遣到这里

original: §RThe faction currently in power doesn't allow building construction.§W
translation: §R当前执政的派系不允许修建建筑。§W

original: War taxes? To the horde, all taxes are war taxes!
translation: 战争税？对部落来说，所有的税收都是战争税！
从 §Y$SINCE$§W 起作为 §Y$OTHER$§W 的宗主国

original: At least one explorer ready to explore:\n$LIST$
translation: 有至少一个可以探索的探险家:\n$LIST$
总共 §Y$TOTAL$§W 港口中的 §R$NUMBER$§W 个被封锁了.\n$LIST$

original: We hold the prestigious title of Primas Germaniae, the most important Catholic Archbishop in the Holy Roman Empire.
translation: 我们持有负有盛名的头衔，日耳曼首席主教——神圣罗马帝国内最重要的天主教大主教。

original: We hold the prestigious title of Legatus Natus - the Pope's representative north of the Alps.
translation: 我们获得了一个负有盛名的头衔，当地使节——教宗在阿尔卑斯山以北的代表。

original: Do you wish to demand that $COUNTRY$ be absorbed into your country?
translation: 你是否希望将 $COUNTRY$ 纳入你的国家？

original: You may only Integrate a nation which has been your junior in a union for at least §Y$YEARS$§! years.
translation: 你只能合并被你联合统治超过§Y$YEARS$§!年的国家。

original: Being a small daimyo limits our naval capacity.
translation: 作为大名，我们的海军规模受到限制.

original: All provinces will remain with the current owner and be removed from the Empire.
translation: 名下所有省份将脱离神圣罗马帝国，省份所有者保持不变。

original: §Y$COUNTRY$§W will be released with the following provinces: $LIST$.\n
translation: §Y$COUNTRY$§W 将成立并拥有下列省份：$LIST$.\n

original: The Emperor (§Y$COUNTRY$§W) will gain ownership of the following provinces: $LIST$.\n
translation: 帝国皇帝 (§Y$COUNTRY$§W) 将获得下列省份的所有权：$LIST$.\n

original: All other provinces will remain with the current owner and be removed from the Empire.
translation: 名下全部其它省份将脱离神圣罗马帝国，省份所有者保持不变。
§Y$COUNTRY$§W 将成立并拥有 §Y$COUNT$§W 省份.\n

original: The Emperor (§Y$COUNTRY$§W) will gain ownership of §Y$COUNT$§W provinces.\n
translation: 帝国皇帝 (§Y$COUNTRY$§W) 将获得 §Y$COUNT$§W 省份的所有权.\n

original: You're not a member of the empire.
translation: 你不是神圣罗马帝国成员。

original: You cannot leave if you're a vassal or lesser part of a personal union.
translation: 当你是附庸国或被联统国时不能脱离帝国。

original: The Emperor cannot leave the Empire!
translation: 帝国皇帝不能脱离神圣罗马帝国！

original: Revoke the most recent imperial reform.
translation: 撤销最近进行的帝国改革。

original: §Y$COUNTRY$§W will revoke the most recent imperial reform.
translation: §Y$COUNTRY$§W将撤销最近进行的帝国改革。

original: Not possible to log into Paradox Connect at this moment, please make sure you have the latest version and have disabled any mods.
translation: 当前无法登陆Paradox主机，请确认你拥有最新的版本并禁用了所有模组.

original: You must occupy the province first.
translation: 你必须先占领这个省份。

original: This message type currently $TRUTH$ displayed as a message icon (if applicable).
translation: 这条信息$TRUTH$以信息图标的形式显示（如果适用）。

original: This message type $TRUTH$ currently displayed as a popup and will $TRUTH02$ pause the game.
translation: 这条信息$TRUTH$以弹框的形式显示并且$TRUTH$暂停游戏。

original: They were previously a part of this war already.
translation: 他们之前就已经参与了这场战争。

original: They are already in this war.
translation: 他们已经加入了这场战争。

original: They are already at war with §Y$COUNTRY$§!.
They are allied to the enemy.
They are fighting a war on the same side as the enemy.
translation: 他们正在战争中与敌方站在同一边。

original: §Y$COUNTRY$§! cannot intervene in this war because §Y$SUBJECT$§! has sided against §Y$DEFENDER$§! in this war, and §Y$COUNTRY$§! is allied with §Y$SUBJECT$§! in another war.
translation: 因为§Y$SUBJECT$§!已经在和§Y$DEFENDER$§!交战了，所以§Y$COUNTRY$§!无法干涉战事并且§Y$COUNTRY$§!和§Y$SUBJECT$§!在另一场战争中是盟友。

original: §Y$COUNTRY$§! cannot intervene in this war because §Y$SUBJECT$§! has sided with §Y$DEFENDER$§! in this war, and §Y$COUNTRY$§! is already at war with §Y$SUBJECT$§!.
translation: §Y$COUNTRY$§!无法干涉这场战争，因为§Y$SUBJECT$§!在这场战争中§Y$DEFENDER$§!一方，而§Y$COUNTRY$§!已经在与 §Y$SUBJECT$§!交战。
自动召唤有意向的盟友

original: The colonial and religious influence of foreigners might be seen as a threat to our country. Enforcing a law to prohibit foreigners entering and Japanese leaving the country will effectively isolate the nation.
translation: 外国人的殖民以及宗教思想可能会威胁到我们国家的统治.颁布强制性的法律禁止外国人进入以及日本人离开可以有效地将国家封闭起来.

original: Opening up our country to foreign traders might be an advantage over our neighbors
translation: 向外国贸易者打开国门也许可以让我们获得针对邻国的优势

original: The Sakoku Law prohibits foreigners to enter, and Japanese to leave the country.
translation: 锁国令禁止外国人进入以及日本人离开这个国家.

original: Requiring the daimyos and some of their troops to spend every other year at our court will improve our army and place enough of a financial burden on the daimyos to hopefully make them unable to wage war. To assure us of their loyalty, their wives and heirs will remain at our court as hostages.
translation: 要求大名们及其部分军队每年都前来朝见可以加强我们的军队，这样做还会对大名们的财政造成重大负担从而使他们无力发动战争.为了表示他们的忠诚，他们的夫人及继承人都将作为人质留在城中.

original: Occasionally keeping the daimyos and their soldiers at our court increases our army and give us additional court officials.
translation: 轮流让大名及其士兵留在城内可以加强我们的军队并给予我们额外的官员.

original: Forcing us to every other year move our court and soldiers to the shogun's court bleeds us of money and manpower.
translation: 强迫我们每年都要带着士兵前往朝见将军，从而榨干我们的财力和人力.

original: Our Colonist has §Y$CHANCE$§W% chance of success. The Settlement currently has §Y$NUM$§W Colonists.
translation: 我们的殖民队有 §Y$CHANCE$§W% 机会成功.定居点当前拥有 §Y$NUM$§W 殖民者.

original: A lack of maintenance has made this fort much harder to defend.
translation: 年久失修使得这座要塞基本无法用于防守

original: Spread rumors that will cause the Shogun to be displeased with them, lowering their influence.
translation: 散步谣言可以使他们触怒将军，降低他们的影响.

original: During peacetime we can employ our engineering corps to improve the fortifications in our provinces.
translation: 在和平时期我们可以雇佣工程队伍改良我们省份的防御工事.

original: Our engineering corps have been deployed to improve our provincial fortifications.
translation: 工兵已经部署好作为省级的防卫工事

original: The services of Ninjas don't come cheap, but they do have certain talents that may prove useful to us.
translation: 忍者的服务并不廉价，但他们确实拥有能力并可以证明对我们有用.

original: We no longer need the services of the Ninja clans.
translation: 我们不再需要忍者流派的服务.

original: Our Ninjas can be sent to strike at those employed by our rivals.
translation: 我们的忍者可以派去袭击那些敌人雇佣的忍者.
支配了日本的茶叶贸易.

original: The server was lost. You cannot continue without the host, the game will end.
translation: 主机的连接已中断，游戏即将结束.

original: The following rebel factions will soon start a rebel uprising:$LIST$
translation: 下列叛军派系将很快发起一场叛乱:$LIST$

original: You must restart the game for these changes to take effect.
translation: 必须重新启动游戏以使改变生效.

original:
Your game is no longer in synch!
 Error code: $CODE$ 
 
 The host can no longer guarantee that you have a correct gamestate. Possible solutions: 
 1. Ask the server to rehost the game. 
 2. Continue playing with a corrupt gamestate. (Not recommended. Will most likely result in a crash.)
translation:
你的游戏已经不再同步了！
错误码：$CODE$ 

主机已经无法确保你的连接状态正确.可能的解决办法：
1.退出再重新开始介入
2.联系服务器重建主机
3.在错误状态下继续游戏(不推荐)

original: We have not yet learned how to make cannons.
translation: 你还不知道怎么制造火炮。

original: We have a truce with the following countries. Declaring war on these countries will be considered a particularly dastardly act by the rest of the world. In addition, our people will also grow concerned that their ruler cannot be trusted to keep his word.
translation: 我们与该国签订了停战协定. 强行对他们宣战将为世界各国所不耻. 而且我们的子民也会认为他们统治者是反覆无常的食言小人.

original: Do you wish to cancel the military access given to us by $COUNTRY$? Doing so will prevent our troops from accessing their country.
translation: 你想要放弃$COUNTRY$给予我们的军事通行权吗？这样做会使我们的军队无法进入他们境内。

original: This is the base value of tax that this province will provide when it has developed into a full-fledged city.
translation: 当该省份发展为正规城市时，它将向你提供的基础税收.

original: A §Y$TYPE$§W will be put to sea here on §Y$DATE$§W.
There are currently no available mercenaries.
translation: 目前没有可用的雇佣兵。

original: You cannot afford this ship. You need at least $COST$¤
translation: 你买不起这艘船.你至少需要$COST$¤
于$DATE|Y$到期,或者§Y统治者死亡§!.
因饥荒与疾病失去战斗力
我们给予$LIST$有条件的军事通行权。
$LIST$给予我们有条件的军事通行权。
他们与我们是宗主与臣民的关系

original: $MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCHNAME$ $WARADJECTIVE2$ in the §Y$WARADJECTIVE1$ $WARNAME$§W and our armies were $RESULT2$.
In the year of our lord $YEAR$, $MONARCHNAME$ converted to the true faith of $RELIGION$.
$MONARCHNAME$ was §R damned to eternal torment in the fiery pits of hell §W in the year of our lord $YEAR$ when the $RELIGION$ faith became our state religion.
translation: 公元$YEAR$年，$RELIGION$成为了我们国家的官方信仰，$MONARCHNAME$这个家伙应该§R在地狱的火坑里受到永恒的折磨§W。

original: $MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCHNAME$ saw the path to righteousness and converted to $RELIGION$ in the year $YEAR$.
translation: $YEAR$年$MONARCHTITLE$$MONARCHNAME$看到了正确的道路，皈依了$RELIGION$。

original: The dark year of $YEAR$ saw $MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCHNAME$ embrace the sacrilegious faith of $RELIGION$.
translation: 黑暗的$YEAR$年，$MONARCHTITLE$$MONARCHNAME$接纳了遭天谴的$RELIGION$信仰。

original: In the year of $YEAR$, $MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCHNAME$ embarked on the path to righteousness by embracing $RELIGION$ as a Syncretic Faith.
translation: $YEAR$年，$MONARCHTITLE$$MONARCHNAME$走上了正确的道路，接纳了$RELIGION$作为相融信仰。

original: In the year of $YEAR$, $MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCHNAME$ embraced the sacrilegious $RELIGION$ as a Syncretic Faith.
translation: $YEAR$年，$MONARCHTITLE$$MONARCHNAME$接纳了遭天谴的$RELIGION$作为相融信仰。

original: You can't send a missionary here while a province improvement is being built.
translation: 省份正在建造设施，你不能派遣传教士.

original: The $DESCRIPTIVEAJECTIVE2$ reign of $MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCHNAME$ saw the $CONSTRUCTIONADJECTIVE2$ of a $SBUILDINGNAME$ in $PROVINCE$.
During $PRONOUN$ reign the provinces of $PROVINCE$ were $GAINED$.
The reign of $MONARCHNAME$ saw the provinces of $PROVINCE$ $GAINED$.
The $CULTURE$, having showed their loyalty time and time again, were accepted as full partners in our mighty nation.
translation: $CULTURE$一次又一次的显示了他们的忠心，成为了我国的主流文化.

original: The $CULTURE$, having become increasing insignificant in our empire, were no longer seen as important to our mighty nation.
translation: $CULTURE$在帝国中越来越无足轻重，不再是我国的主流文化.

original: In the year $YEAR$ $MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCHNAME$ was proclaimed, dei gratia Romanorum imperator electus semper augustus
translation: $YEAR$年，$MONARCHTITLE$$MONARCHNAME$当选神圣罗马帝国皇帝，吾主庇佑，帝选天成

original: In the year $YEAR$ $MONARCHTITLE$ $MONARCHNAME$ became the Emperor of China
The year of $YEAR$ saw $COUNTRY$ given the dignity of Prince Elector of the Holy Roman Empire.
translation: $YEAR$年，$COUNTRY$获得了神圣罗马帝国选帝侯的资格。

original: The $WARNAME$ continued in the reign of $MONARCHNAME$.
The reign of $MONARCHNAME$ saw the continuation of the $WARNAME$.
Are you sure you wish to send a missionary to $PROV$?
translation: 确定要向$PROV$派遣传教士吗？

original: Bank loan size will be set to $SIZE$x monthly incomes.\n
translation: 银行贷款规模将被设定为$SIZE$x月收入。\n

original: Declare War on §Y$WHO$§W with §Y$CASUSBELLI$§W casus belli.\n
Are you sure you wish to overwrite the file $NAME$?
You cannot negotiate separate peace between two junior partners in a war.
translation: 不能在非战争盟主之间单独媾和。

original: A member of a coalition can never sign a separate peace.
translation: 包围网的成员永远无法签署单独媾和。

original: You cannot negotiate separate peace with someone who is a former subject of the defender.
translation: 你无法与防御方的前附属国单独媾和。

original: You cannot negotiate separate peace with someone who is a former overlord of the defender.
translation: 你无法与防御方的前宗主国单独媾和。

original: In the reign of $MONARCHNAME$ we moved our Capital to $PROVINCE$.
translation: 在$MONARCHNAME$统治期间，我国迁都至$PROVINCE$。

original: Due to the lack of anything of note, $MONARCHNAME$ is known throughout history as $MONARCHNAME$ the $ADJECTIVE1$.
translation: 由于毫无功绩，$MONARCHNAME$被历史学家称为$ADJECTIVE1$$MONARCHNAME$。

original: The reign of $MONARCHNAME$ is only remembered for $PRONOUN2$ $ADJECTIVE2$.
translation: $MONARCHNAME$在统治期间只表现出了$PRONOUN2$$ADJECTIVE2$性格。

original: Even Peasants look down upon us
Our realm is not well known
Our name is spoken around the world
For years, we've been in awe of our neighbor's technological advancements but this is soon about to change as we have managed to convince them to help us improve our deplorable army.
translation: 多年以来，我们一直敬畏着我们的邻居拥有更先进的技术，但这一切即将发生改变，我们已经设法说服他们来帮助我们提高军事水平。

original: Only the host can change the game speed.
translation: 只有主机能够更改游戏速度。

original: Only server administrators can change the game speed.
translation: 只有服务器管理员能够改变游戏速度。

original: This area is too remote and inhospitable to explore.
translation: 这个地区太偏远贫瘠了，无法探索。

original: This area can only be entered by an Explorer (Sea Province) or a Conquistador (Land Province).
translation: 这个地区只有探险家（海洋省份）或征服者（陆地省份）能够进入。

original: This province cannot be reached via any ports connected to our capital.
translation: 这个省份不能通过任何港口与首都相连。
其他附属于这个贸易中心的省份。

original: The emperor gains a core on §Y$NEW$§W.\n
Are you sure you wish to convert to the §Y$NAME$§W faith? This will greatly destabilize your realm as well as break all your current alliances and royal marriages.
translation: 你确定要转变为§Y$NAME$§W信仰么？ 这将严重影响你的国家稳定，并且打破目前的联盟和王室联姻。

original: Create a vassal or protectorate from some of your provinces.
translation: 从你的省份中建立一个附庸国或保护国。

original: Create a subject (either a Vassal or a Protectorate) from some of your provinces.
translation: 在你的一些省份上建立一个附属国（附庸国或保护国）。

original: You need more than one player to start a game.
translation: 你需要至少两个玩家进行游戏。

original: You cannot start until the save game has been transferred to all players.
translation: 你不能开始游戏，得等到所有玩家都读取好。

original: You cannot set your status to Unready while receiving a save game.
translation: 你在接受存档时不能设定状态为未准备。

original: Separatism will decay by $PERYEAR$ yearly until $UNTIL$.\n\n
translation: 分离主义将每年减少$PERYEAR$直至$UNTIL$.\n\n
严酷的待遇一直持续着

original: There is not yet enough data to generate this graph.
translation: 没有足够的数据生成这个图表.

original: It is the year of our Lord Eighteen Hundred and Twenty. The revolutionary era has passed and now the long nineteenth century is in progress. What changes has your nation seen over the last 400 years?
translation: 现在是主后1820年，革命时代过去了，漫长的十九世纪现在正在进行。想看看在过去的400年里你的国家发生什么变化吗？

original: This advisor is not yet available for you to hire.
translation: 目前你还不可雇佣该顾问。

original: Until $DATE$, nobody but us can hire this advisor.
translation: $DATE$前，只有我们能雇用这个顾问。

original: As a vassal you can only declare war on your liege to break free and nobody else.
translation: 作为一个附庸国，在独立前你不能向宗主以外的任何国家宣战。

original: A subject can never call their overlord into a war.
translation: 一个附属国永远无法召唤他们的宗主国参战。

original: A subject can only call their fellow vassal in a war against their overlord.
translation: 附属国只能召集同宗的其他附属国对抗共同的宗主国。

original: Our senior nobles showed their devotion to our nation by volunteering their services for a regency council during the minority of our monarch.
translation: 在我们的君主成年之前，年长的贵族们通过摄政会议工作，对国家作出贡献。

original: We can't raise war taxes since we are not at war.
translation: 在处于和平状态时，我们不能开征战争税.

original: We are already raising war taxes.
translation: 我们已经在提高战争税了

original: The narrow strait across §Y$SEA$§W connects this province to §Y$PROV$§!
Narrow straits can be crossed by armies without the use of transports. An enemy fleet may, however, block the crossing unless both sides are under allied control.
translation: 陆军可以直接通过海峡，但是如果敌国的海军封锁了这个海峡，陆军就不能通过了.

original: The strait is currently $STRAITSTATUS$ to your troops.
translation: 该海峡目前对你的军队是$STRAITSTATUS$。

original: A river flows between this province and §Y$PROV$§!.
translation: 该省份与§Y$PROV$§!之间有一条河流。

original: Attacking across a river will penalize the attacking army.
translation: 跨河攻击会导致攻击方受到惩罚。

original: The Elite Infantry of Frederick the Great. These troops are ruthlessly drilled to give high moral and favor the offense over the defense
translation: 腓特烈大帝的精英步兵.经过残酷的训练这支部队士气高昂，比起被动防守他们更倾向于主动进攻.

original: There are $SIZE$ units in the queue.
There are also $SIZE$ units queued for production in this province.
translation: 该省份还有$SIZE$个单位在建造队列中。

original: You can only hire mercenaries at your own continent.
translation: 只能在本大陆征召雇佣兵。
团队整编，将未满员的同类团队整合为几个满员团队

original: Merge all understrength regiments of the same type to create as many full strength as possible.\n\nHold §YShift§! while clicking to leave 0-strength regiments behind, allowing you to reinforce them later.
translation: \n\n当点击把零组织度的军队留在后面时按§YShift键§!，你能够在迟些时候再增援他们.

original: §Y$WHO$§W will become the main source of the revolution.\n
Convert Ruler to General with §Y$POWER$§W tradition.\n
translation: 以 §Y$POWER$§W 的陆军传统将统治者训练成将领.\n

original: Convert Heir to General with §Y$POWER$§W tradition.\n
translation: 以 §Y$POWER$§W 的陆军传统将继承人训练成将领.\n
获得 §Y$POWER$§W 海军传统的提督。 \n
获得 §Y$POWER$§W 海军传统的探险家。 \n
获得 §Y$POWER$§W 陆军传统的征服者。 \n
获得 §Y$POWER$§W 陆军传统的将军。 \n

original: $TARGET|Y$ will no longer be in union with $SENIOR|Y$.
They have closed their market for us
Click here to change the priority for autosending merchants
translation: 点击改变自动派遣商人优先级

original: For each CoT you can define a priority for autosending merchants. A red cross denotes that no merchants will be sent, priority can then be set to three levels. Red is the lowest, yellow is mid priority, while green is high priority.
translation: 每个贸易中心你都可以定义自动派遣商人的优先级.红叉表示没有商人会被派遣，优先级可以分为三个不同等级.红色是最低优先级，黄色是中等优先级，绿色是最高优先级.

original: The CoT page on the ledger allows you to manage the sending of merchants for all known CoTs. You can either send merchants manually or sent priorities for autosending. There is an additional option to turn autosending off and on depending on your situation.
translation: 统计表里的贸易中心页可以设定商人派遣的事项. 你既可以手动派遣商人也可以自动派遣. 这里有一个附加选项，可以根据情况关闭自动派遣.

original: Click here to go to the CoT page on the ledger
translation: 点此进入统计表的贸易中心页面

original: Click on the flag to send a merchant
You Don't have any merchants to send

You can set priorities for auto-sending merchants here. A cross denotes that a merchant should not be sent to a particular COT, and you can also set the priority for a COT to have merchants auto-sent to it.
translation: 你可以在这里设置商人自动派遣。红叉表示不派遣商人，上面的指示条分三个等级，红色最低，黄色中等，绿色最优先。

original: A shield in this column denotes which country has a monopoly in a CoT
translation: 贸易中心列表中的盾牌表示了被某个国家所垄断

original: Our decision to embrace the idea of grand navy has given impetus to our ship building industries.
translation: 我们注重建造强大海军的决定促进了我们的造船工业.

original: Despite our decision to embrace the idea of grand navy our ship building industry seems to be suffering.
translation: 尽管我们决定了接受建立强大海军的思想，我们的造船工业却似乎举步维艰.

original: Due to our superior seamanship we are developing yet newer and better ways to improve our navy.
translation: 因为拥有出众的造船技术，我们正在利用更新更好的方法促进我们的海军发展.

original: With our superior seamanship giving us a navy that can rule the waves, a hint of hubris is setting in. Don't worry though, it will never catch up with us.
translation: 因为我们高超船舶技术带给我们能主宰海洋的海军，一种傲慢的情绪在产生. 不过不要担心，没人能够超越我们.

original: Our use of naval fighting instruction has allowed us to develop even better blockade tactics, at least till our enemies learn to counter them.
translation: 我们对于海军战斗教学的利用已经使发展更先进的封锁战术成为可能，至少在我们的敌人学会反击之前.

original: Our use of naval fighting instruction has improved the overall blockade ability of our forces, but it seems that a little complacency is setting in.
translation: 我们对于海军战斗教学的利用已经提高了我们军队的整体封锁能力，不过看来有些人开始自满了

original: Our excellent shipwrights are developing yet newer and better ships for our fleet.
translation: 我们优秀的造船者们正在为我们的舰队开发更新更好的船只.

original: There are problems with our dockyards causing our otherwise excellent shipwrights not to function as well as they would normally.
translation: 我们造船厂的一些问题使我们优秀的造船工人无法像平常一样工作.

original: Our policy of national conscripts is causing recruits to flock to the standards.
translation: 我们的国家征兵政策使新兵们聚集在军旗下.

original: Usually our policy of national conscript yields yet more men for the army. However at the moment conscription is being resisted.
translation: 通常情况下我们的国家征兵政策能征召更多人加入我们的军队. 然而目前征兵正在被抵制.

original: Our grand Army seems even grander than usual. The other countries cast their eyes enviously at our army.
translation: 我们的陆军比平时更为强大了.其他国家都对我国的陆军投来了嫉妒的目光

original: Our Grand army usually causes envy in neighboring nations, but at the moment no one seems to care.
translation: 我们更强大的陆军通常都会引起周边国家的嫉妒，但是目前看来没人在意

original: Our excellent military drill has led to improvements in our military thought.
translation: 我们优秀的军事训练使我们的军事思想得到了提升.

original: Our military drill has given us a superb army that everyone fears. This has led our senior officers to believe that our army just cannot be improved.
translation: 我们的军事训练造就了强大的令所有人畏惧的陆军. 这导致我们的高级官员们相信我们的军队是不是没有办法再提高了？

original: Our merchant adventurers are adventuring more than usual, meaning our trade is yielding yet more profits than before.
translation: 我们的投机商人比以往更加冒险，这意味着我们的贸易能出产更多的利润。

original: Usually our merchant adventurers go out and bring back riches from around the globe, at the moment they aren't doing as well as they should.
translation: 通常我们的商业冒险家能够走出去并从全世界带来财富，但是目前他们无法做的像以前一样好 .

original: Our shrewd commercial practices have given our merchants a real advantage, however, at the moment they are not performing as well as they should be.
translation: 我们精明的商业惯例曾经给我们的商人带来极大的好处，然而此时它们达不到应该达到的水平.

original: Our viceroys are doing an outstanding job, improving our income from our overseas provinces.
translation: 我们的总督的工作完成的十分杰出，这将提升我们海外省份的税收.

original: Unfortunately some of our recently appointed viceroys believe that when they have an office for profit under the crown, the profit bit is the most important.
translation: 很不幸的是我们最近指定的总督认为当他们有了职权以后，以权谋私才是最要紧的事

original: With our decision to embrace the idea of Smithian economics, our people are continuing to experiment into new and better ways of production.
translation: 由于我们决定采用市场经济的理念，我们的人民不断采用各种更新更好的方法来提高产量

original: Our decision to embrace Smithian economics has led to production improvement, however, we have suffered a wave of conservatism which is holding back improvements.
translation: 我们采用市场经济理念的决定使我们的产量有了提高，但我们也经历了一波阻碍进步的保守主义浪潮

original: Our bureaucrats are doing better than usual, leading to improved tax revenues.
translation: 我们的官员们正做得比平时更好，使得税收增加.

original: Currently some of our senior bureaucrats are too busy lining their own pockets to focus on their tasks.
translation: 最近我们的一些高级官员总是忙着把自己的口袋塞满而无法专注于自己的本职工作.

original: Our national trade policy is currently more successful than usual.
translation: 我们的国家贸易政策最近显得比以前更加成功.

original: Our national trade policy at the moment is not doing very well.
translation: 目前我们的国家贸易政策做的并不是很好.

original: Our espionage system is functioning better than usual, meaning that our spies are even more effective.
translation: 我们的间谍机构运转的比以前更好，意味着我们的间谍比以前更加的有效率.

original: Our Espionage system is currently experiencing difficulties as some of spies are defecting to work for other nations.
translation: 我们的间谍机构最近遇到了一些问题，因为一些间谍叛逃到其他国家去了.

original: With just the right members complimenting each other our cabinet is proving move effective than usual.
translation: 由于成员们恰当的互相尊敬，我们的内阁被证明比以前更有效.

original: Our cabinet government is filled with men who are even more corrupt than usual, because of this our government is less effective.
translation: 我们的内阁政府充斥着有史以来最腐败的人们，因此我们的政府变得低效了.

original: Our decision to grant the bill of rights has allowed our minority groups to prosper in our nation.
translation: 我们通过权利议案的决定使得少数派团体在我们国家繁荣成为可能.

original: With our nation based around the principle of divine supremacy, our missionaries are feeling more zealous than usual.
translation: 由于我们国家以神权至上为基本原则，因此我们的传教士变得比以前积极了.

original: Our scientific revolution is yielding extra benefits as our army research goes even faster.
translation: 我们的科学革命带来的额外好处就是我们陆军的研究进展更快了

original: Our navy is especially feeling the benefits of our scientific revolution at the moment.
translation: 我们的海军目前正强烈感受着科学革命带来的益处.

original: As our scientific revolution advances, farming, mining are feeling the benefits.
translation: 伴随着我们科学革命的深入，农业和矿业正感受着随之而来的益处.

original: Our scientific revolution is currently especially benefiting our thoughts on government.
translation: 我们的科学革命正使着我们在行政观念方面获得益处.

original: Our scientific revolution unleashed a wave of curiosity, people are especially keen on investigating new means of trade.
translation: 我们的科学革命释放了一波求知的欲望，人们现在正热衷于研究贸易的新方式.

original: A wave of conservatism has slowed down the scientific revolution.
translation: 一波保守主义的浪潮使科学革命遭受挫折.

original: Our policy of favoring serfdom has allowed the landlords to exploit their serf tenants even more than usual.
translation: 我们偏向农奴制的政策允许农场主对农奴的剥削变本加厉。

original: Our policy of favoring free subjects over serfdom has pleased the populace.
translation: 我们偏向自由主义而非农奴制的政策使民众感到满足

original: Our overall focus on Land has caused our navy to suffer.
translation: 我们过分关注陆军使我们的海军变得弱校

original: Our decision to focus on Naval has led to our land forces suffering,
translation: 我们注重海军的决定导致我们的陆军力量变得懦弱.

original: Our pursuit of free trade policies has left our merchants worried about the lack of support and protection from the government,
translation: 我们对自由贸易政策的追捧使我们的商人感到缺乏来自政府的支持和保护，

original: Our innovative policies have led to new ideas entering our realm.
translation: 我们的创新政策使一个新的观念进入我们了解的区域.

original: Our centralized policies have yielded extra tax revenue.
translation: 我们的集权式政策使我们获得了额外的税收收入

original: Our decentralized policies have meant that the local provinces are providing extra contributions to the treasury.
translation: 我们的非集权式政策意味着地方行省可以为我们的国库提供额外的收入。

original: Our Policy of favoring the aristocracy is leaving many of our merchants rather unhappy.
translation: 我们偏向贵族阶级的政策使得国内许多商人感到非常不满

original: A local vineyard has produced a wine of extraordinary quality, our people are pleased.
translation: 一座本地的葡萄园生产了一种品质极好的酒，我们的民众感到满意.

original: Some of our cloth suppliers have supplied substandard uniforms to the army. This has lowered morale.
translation: 我们的一些衣物供应商提供了一些不合格的制服给军队。这降低了士气。

original: Rumors of a crisis in our salt production have worried the population.
translation: 食盐生产危机的流言使得民众非常担忧

original: Our naval supplies have been of unexpectedly high quality, allowing us to produce cheaper ships.
translation: 由于我们的海军装备供应质量出乎意料的高，所以我们可以建造更便宜的船只.

original: Our Copper mines are not producing as high quality copper as usual, artillery production is suffering due to this.
translation: 我们的铜矿质量不如从前，因此火炮制造业正在备受煎熬

original: Our iron mines are producing lower quality iron than usual. The raising of army units is getting more expensive because of this.
translation: 我们的钴矿质量不如从前. 军用单位的维护费用因此不断攀升.

original: An epidemic has swept though our local population, reducing the number available for export.
translation: 一种流行病在当地人群中蔓延，降低了可输出的奴隶数量.

original: Storms have struck our porcelain factories. This will reduce the amount available for a few years.
translation: 风暴袭击了我们的瓷器工厂。这将使好几年的产量受到影响。

original: The harvest has failed in this area, reducing spice production.
translation: 这一地区的歉收减少了我们香料的生产.

original: A revolutionary government is loose on the continent of Europe. Our nobility feel that we are ready and willing to wage war upon them, but we aren't. Revolutionary propaganda is spreading in our nation undermining our government, while other European powers think us weak. Do we listen to the war party?
translation: 一个革命政府在欧洲大陆上失控. 我们的贵族阶层相信我们在准备进行一场针对革命者的战争，但我们没有. 革命宣传正在暗中破坏我们的政府，与此同时其他欧洲国家认为我们很弱小. 我们要听取战争派的意见吗？

original: Our Revolutionary government is waging war against powers hostile to our cause. The people are rallying to the cause and our armies are displaying revolutionary Elan.
translation: 我们的革命政府正在进行一场打击对我们理想抱有敌意的国家. 人民正热烈支持这我们的军队而我们的军队正显示着革命的锐气.

original: We are leading the holy fight against the Godless Revolutionaries. The Church and State are fully behind our cause and other countries admire our show of strength.
translation: 我们正引领着对抗无神论革命者的圣战。教会和国家全力支持我们的事业，其他国家都很钦佩我们所展示的实力。

original: Choosing to remain in the Empire will result in penalties to prestige and increased unrest.
translation: 选择留在帝国内将会产生威望和叛乱风险惩罚

original: Our choice to cling to the Holy Roman Empire while our neighbors have freed themselves from its influence is viewed with suspicion and disgust by many of our subjects.
translation: 我们倾向于拥护神圣罗马帝国，而我们的邻居从帝国的影响中独立，这会被我们的附庸厌恶和怀疑。

original: §YAI Difficulty§! determines the skill and behavior of AI nations
translation: §YAI难度§!决定了AI控制国家的能力以及行为习惯

original: §YEasy§!: The AI plays at a reduced skill level and reacts less harshly to player aggression and vulnerability.\n§YNormal§!: The AI plays at its full skill level and will treat player and AI nations the same way.\n§YHard:§! The AI plays at its full skill level and reacts more harshly to player aggression and vulnerability.
translation: §Y容易§!：AI拥有较低的能力水平同时对非AI控制国家表现出较低的进攻性.\n§Y普通§!：AI拥有完整的能力水平同时对玩家和AI控制国家表现出相同的进攻性.\n§Y困难§!：AI拥有完整的能力水平同时对非AI控制国家表现出较高的进攻性.

original: Size the winning army to overrun
Your current technology level does not allow you to build this building
translation: 你当前的科技等级还不允许你修建这个建筑

original: Each province in your empire raises the cost you pay to increase stability. A temple will reduce this cost every month. The best provinces to build temples in are those high value provinces away from your borders.
translation: 每一个省份都会使稳定花费增加. 教堂可以减少稳定花费. 值得建造教堂的省份是那些远离边境的富饶地方.

original: A province with a workshop will receive a boost in tax income. Various other modifiers will increase and decrease the tax income from a province, the bonus from workshop is applied before the additional modifier, it is best build these in high tax provinces.
translation: 工场会提高省份税收. 其他变量会使最终税收变化，但工场的修正在它们之前起作用，推荐尽可能多的修建.

original: Regimental Camps increase both the manpower of a province and the regiment recruit speed. These are best built in provinces with high manpower
translation: 兵营提高省份后备兵员数量和征募速度. 这是高后备兵员省份的理想建筑

original: Shipyards increase the rate at which ships are built in a province. Best built in high tax value provinces or province you think you will build a lot of ships in.
translation: 造船厂加快省份的船只建造速度. 最好建在你会大量生产船只的省份.

original: A constable both increases tax income and unrest in a province. The maximum benefit is gained from province with the highest tax income. Court houses will reduce the unrest increase from a constable so are useful to build in provinces with a constable in it. Constables also increase the bonus from workshops.
translation: 警察院会提高省份的税收和叛乱风险。最大的收益取决于省份的最高基税。法院会降低警察院带来的叛乱风险，在有警察院的省份会很有用处。警察院也会提高工场的产能。

original: A province with a courthouse receives a reduction in local unrest. Courthouses are useful in all provinces, but are especially so in high tax value provinces as increases in unrest reduce tax income.
translation: 有法院的省份会降低本地叛乱风险。法院在哪个省份都有用处，但在高税收省份尤其有用，因为叛乱风险的增加会降低税收。

original: Tax Assessors reduce inflation throughout your empire. Even if you have no inflation they are still worth building as you will be able to mint money at a later date and then reduce the inflation afterwards. Tax Assessor are best built in provinces that are far away from enemies.
translation: 税务局可以降低通货膨胀. 即使你目前没有通货膨胀也推荐建造，因为这可以使你每月收入国库的钱增加. 推荐尽可能多的修建.

original: A customs house gives a small increase in the total tax income from a province. As the tax income increase is so small customs houses are best built in provinces with high tax income.
translation: 海关可以稍稍提高省份税收，推荐在富饶省份建造.

original: Building a fort in a province will increase the time it takes for the enemy to conquer a province by siege. It will also give your armies more time to react to revolts.
translation: 建造要塞可以使敌军占领省份所花费的时间延长，也可以使你的军队有更多时间对付叛乱.

original: You do not fulfill the prerequisites for getting this idea.
translation: 你没有满足得到该理念的所有前置条件

original: Taking advantage of advances in both food preservation and medical science we can now supply our ships with provisions that not only last longer, but also prevent illnesses like scurvy.
translation: 得益于食物保存以及医疗科学的进步，现在我们不仅能为我们的船舰提供维持更久的食物补给，还能防止诸如坏血病等疾病的发生.

original: Louis XVI's flight to Varennes undermined his credibility and paved the way for the formation of the Republic of France in 1792. Fearing that the revolutionary fervor would spread to their countries, other European monarchs called for war against the new revolutionary government. Lead Revolutionary France as it struggles to assert itself against a strong coalition of European powers.
translation: 路易十六出逃至瓦雷讷的行为使其名誉扫地，这也为1792年法兰西共和国的成立铺平了道路。由于担心革命的浪潮会波及到自身，欧洲其他的专制王朝纷纷对新的革命政府宣战。引领法国大革命就意味着向欧洲列强发起挑战。

original: One of the most important periods of European history began on July the 14th with the storming of the Bastille. This event would be the first in a series of attempts to overthrow the Bourbon dynasty and put an end to the absolute monarchy that was ruling France at the time. Lead the fight against the revolutionary rebels as France enters one of its most disruptive phases.
translation: 欧洲历史上最重要的时期之一就始于七月十四日的巴士底狱风波.这一事件可以说是推翻波旁王朝以及终结当时统治法国的绝对君主制的一系列尝试中的第一次.领导起镇压这些革命叛徒的战斗，法国已经岌岌可危了.

original: An infantry assault unit originally equipped with grenades and most often deployed in sieges. During the 18th century the Grenadiers came to regard the bayonet as their preferred weapon of choice in favor of the grenades.
translation: 一支配备了手雷的突击步兵部队，经常会被部署于攻城战中.十八世纪期间，掷弹手们开始将刺刀作为他们的首选近身武器用以配合手雷.

original: The crème de la crème of the Napoleonic army. Although their lances made them less agile, these cavalry troops were formidable adversaries when charging their enemies directly.
translation: 他们是拿破仑军队中精英的精英。虽然他们长枪使得他们不够灵活，但他们的冲锋仍然是敌人的恶梦。

original: A body of infantry formed in a close rectangular formation with cavalry and artillery within its sides. This formation was well suited against cavalry attacks but naturally it didn't fare as well against artillery attacks.
translation: 这些步兵组成封闭的矩形方阵，把骑兵和炮兵保护在内. 这个方阵在面对骑兵时很有优势，但是对炮兵攻击依然进步不大.

original: Mounted cavalry units specialized in skirmishes and renowned for their shooting skills.
translation: 一支擅长混战并以其精湛的射击技巧闻名的骑兵部队。

original: In essence a mounted foot soldier carrying a short musket or rifle also known as a carbine. Their ability to dismount and fight on foot allowed them great flexibility in the battle.
translation: 在本质上他们就是背着一把短滑膛枪或步枪（也被称作马枪）骑着一匹马的士兵.他们能够下马进行战斗的能力使其在战斗中有极大的灵活性.

original: Small and flexible cavalry units constantly in motion and specialized in unpremeditated fighting not held back by slower moving infantry and artillery units.
translation: 小巧灵活的骑兵部队，适合打运动战，擅长进行突击作战，不会被缓慢移动的步兵以及炮兵部队所拖累.

original: A light cavalry unit most often equipped with a lance, pistol or saber. The Uhlans tactical advantage laid in their agility and speed and they were often employed by various European armies
translation: 一支通常会配备长枪、手枪或军刀的轻型骑兵部队.东欧长枪骑兵战术的优势在于他们的灵活性以及高速性，因此他们经常会被各类欧洲军队所雇用.

original: A mounted soldier utilizing his horse as a means of transportation but fighting on foot.
translation: 一种将战马用作交通工具而下马徒步战斗的士兵

original: A battalion comprised of at least a thousand infantry soldiers most often armed with muskets and deployed in a square formation. By maintaining a close-set square, this formation could withstand even the most ambitious cavalry attack.
translation: 一支军队包含了至少一千名步兵，通常装备着火枪布成方阵。保持这种紧密的方阵有时甚至可以抵挡最猛烈的骑兵攻击。

original: A battalion comprised of at least a thousand infantry soldiers most often armed with muskets and deployed in a square formation. By maintaining a close-set square this formation could withstand even the most ambitious cavalry attack.
translation: 一个集团包含了至少一千名步兵，通常装备着火枪，布成方阵. 保持这种方阵有时甚至可以抵挡强大的骑兵攻击.

original: A cavalry unit utilizing shock tactics by charging its enemy at full speed exerting maximum amount of force.
translation: 一种可以实行全速冲击敌人的战术的骑兵部队.

original: A strategy heavily focused on speed and mobility, the artillery would move to one point on the battlefield lay their charges and then quickly relocate to the next attack point in rapid succession.
translation: 胜负取决于速度和机动性，这种火炮可以到达战场上一个点然后攻击，然后迅速重新到达下一个攻击点.

original: You cannot move the capital to this province because it is controlled by an estate.
translation: 你不能将首都迁到这个省份，因为它被一个阶层控制着。

original: Click here to move your capital to this province.
translation: 点击此处将你的首都迁移到该省。

original: You cannot move the capital to this province since it is not a core.
translation: 你无法将首都迁移到该省份，因为它还不是核心省份。

original: You cannot move the capital to this province.
translation: 你无法将首都迁移到该省份。

original: Moving your Capital can be advantageous, especially if it is in a vulnerable position.
translation: 迁移你的首都可能是有利的，特别是当它处在危险地带时.

original: The cost for moving will be §Y$POWER$§!£adm .
Do you wish to move your Capital to this new location?
translation: 你确定要把首都迁移到这个新地方？

original: Have church power of at least
Number of Church Aspects less than
Number of Church Aspects more than
Receiving War Reparations from less than $NUM|Y$ countries (currently $CURRENTNUM|Y$).
translation: 收到来自少于 §Y$NUM$§! 个国家的战争赔款.

original: Receiving War Reparations from at least $NUM|Y$ countries (currently $CURRENTNUM|Y$).
translation: 收到来自至少$NUM|Y$个国家的战争赔款（当前为$CURRENTNUM|Y$个）。

original: Receiving War Reparations from less countries than $COUNTRYNAME|Y$ ($NUM|Y$). Currently $CURRENTNUM|Y$.
translation: 收到的国家战争赔款的数量少于$COUNTRYNAME|Y$（$NUM|Y$个）。当前为$CURRENTNUM|Y$。

original: Receiving War Reparations from at least the same amount of countries as $COUNTRYNAME|Y$ ($NUM|Y$). Currently $CURRENTNUM|Y$.
translation: 收到的国家战争赔款的数量不少于$COUNTRYNAME|Y$（$NUM|Y$个）。当前为$CURRENTNUM|Y$。

original: Tactics, leadership, morale and equipment were all important in battles, however, so too was the discipline of the troops. Steady troops that could hold their formation despite the punishment of the enemy would prove much more effective in combat. Damage done is multiplied by your discipline, and damage taken is reduced or increased depending on your discipline.
translation: 战术、领导、士气以及装备对战斗来说都是十分重要的，而部队的训练度亦如此。一支在敌人猛烈进攻下仍能维持阵型的部队在战斗中是显然是更有效的。部队造成的伤害会根据其训练度得到加成，而受到伤害也会根据其训练度增加或减少。

original: On the $DATE$ the infidels of $PROVINCE$ embraced the one true faith.
translation: $DATE$，$PROVINCE$的异教徒皈依了唯一的正统信仰。

original: On the $DATE$ the faithful of $PROVINCE$ spurned the path of righteousness and converted to $RELIGION$.
translation: $DATE$，$PROVINCE$的信徒放弃了正确信仰而改宗$RELIGION$。

original: This is the potential capital of this nation.
translation: 这里是这个国家潜在的首都。

original: This province is the same culture group, so it cannot be lost as a core.
translation: 这个省份是相同的文化组群，所以不会失去核心.

original: The target of a succession war cannot sign a separate peace.
translation: 王位继承权战争不能签订单独的和约.

original: You must control the capital of the current Emperor's homeland in $COUNTRY$, which is $PROV$.
translation: 你必须控制当前皇帝$COUNTRY$的首都$PROV$。

original: The elector $COUNTRY$ is not controlled by you or one of your dependents.
translation: 选侯$COUNTRY$尚未被你控制也不是你的附庸。

original: This Market is currently closed to our merchants. we can either use war or diplomacy to open it.
translation: 这个市场目前对我们的商人关闭. 我们可以用外交或军事手段来打开它.

original: Your current technology level does not allow you to build this building
translation: 你当前的科技等级还不允许你修建这个建筑

original: You cannot dismantle the empire if you are the current emperor.
translation: 你是神圣罗马帝国现任皇帝，无法取缔帝国。

original: This is your capital. Defend it to the last man.
translation: 这是你的首都，尽全力保卫它.

original: We can't cancel our subject status when it is enforced by a truce.
translation: 我们不能取消和约强迫的附属.

original: No matter if you are rich or poor, you can always be whipped into follow orders on a ship. Conscripting peasants might not create the best of sailors, but at least they are a renewable resource.
translation: 无论贵贱，你都能在船上服从号令。征召农民可能不能培养出最好的水手，但至少是一个持久的来源。

original: Seats in Parliament backing our current issue less than
translation: 在议会中支持我们议案的席位少于

original: Seats in Parliament backing our current issue at least
translation: 在议会中支持我们议案的席位至少为

original: Their primary culture is §Y$CULTURE$§W. §Y$CULTURE$§W is in the §Y$GROUP$§W group.
translation: 他们的主流文化是§Y$CULTURE$§W。§Y$CULTURE$§W属于§Y$GROUP$§W文化组。

original: Our primary culture is §Y$CULTURE$§W. §Y$CULTURE$§W is in the §Y$GROUP$§W group.
translation: 我们的主流文化是§Y$CULTURE$§W。§Y$CULTURE$§W属于§Y$GROUP$§W文化组。

original: They also tolerate the following cultures:
translation: 他们同样容忍下列文化:

original: They guarantee our independence, so we cannot guarantee theirs.
translation: 他们保证了我们的独立，所以我们不能保证他们的独立.

original: They are warning us, so we cannot warn them.
translation: 他们警告了我们，所以我们不能警告他们。
我们已经保证了他们的独立.

original: We have warned $WHO$ to not start any wars.
translation: 我们已经警告$WHO$不要发动战争.

original: We are the Defender of the Faith, and are obliged to protect them.
translation: 我们是信仰守护者，我们有义务保护他们。

original: We cannot cancel access while we still have forces inside their borders.
translation: 当我们仍有军队在他们境内时，我们不能放弃军事通行权。

original: We cannot cancel access while our enemies have forces inside their borders.
translation: 当我们的敌人仍有军队在他们境内时，我们不能放弃军事通行权。

original: We cannot cancel access while our allies have forces inside their borders.
translation: 当我们的盟友仍有军队在他们境内时，我们不能放弃军事通行权。

original: We cannot cancel access while they still have forces inside our borders.
translation: 当他们仍有军队在我们境内时，我们不能收回军事通行权。

original: We cannot cancel access while their enemies have forces inside our borders.
translation: 当他们的敌人仍有军队在我们境内时，我们不能收回军事通行权。

original: We cannot cancel access while their allies have forces inside our borders.
translation: 当他们的盟友仍有军队在我们境内时，我们不能收回军事通行权。

original: There are no friendly units here who allow attachment.
translation: 这里没有可以合并的友方部队

original: There are no friendly units here that allow attachment and have moved at most $PERCENTAGE$% towards their next province.
translation: 这里没有可以接触且最多往下一省份移动了$PERCENTAGE$%的友军单位。
联合统治中的文化差异

original: In essence a mounted foot soldier carrying a short musket or rifle also known as a carbine. Their ability to dismount and fight on foot allowed them great flexibility in the battle.
translation: 在本质上他们就是背着一把短滑膛枪或步枪（也被称作马枪）骑着一匹马的士兵.他们能够下马进行战斗的能力使其在战斗中有极大的灵活性.

original: Small and flexible cavalry units constantly in motion and specialized in unpremeditated fighting not held back by slower moving infantry and artillery units.
translation: 小巧灵活的骑兵部队，适合打运动战，擅长进行突击作战，不会被缓慢移动的步兵以及炮兵部队所拖累.

original: A light cavalry unit most often equipped with a lance, pistol or saber. The Uhlans tactical advantage laid in their agility and speed and they were often employed by various European armies
translation: 一支通常会配备长枪、手枪或军刀的轻型骑兵部队.东欧长枪骑兵战术的优势在于他们的灵活性以及高速性，因此他们经常会被各类欧洲军队所雇用.

original: Since you're the shogun you will take this action as a representative of §Y$EMPEROR$§! and the action will only influence the relation of §Y$EMPEROR$§!.
translation: 既然你是幕府将军，你的这个行动就代表了§Y$EMPEROR$§!，这个行动只会影响到你和§Y$EMPEROR$§!的关系.

original: There are §Y$NUM$§W buildings left to raze until we can conquer it.
translation: 再摧毁§Y$NUM$§W座建筑我们才能征服这个省份。

original: When drilling, an army gets low morale and requires full maintenance costs. Non-Mercenary Regiments gain Army Drill and contribute to our Army Professionalism while drilling.\nBased on its current share of our Force Limit, drilling this army gives:\n
translation: 操练时，军队士气低落，并需要全额维护费。非雇佣军团可以获得陆军职业度并为我们陆军的职业化做出贡献。\n根据目前我们的陆军规模上限，这支军队进行训练可以给予：\n

original: Yearly chance of Skill increase for $GENERAL|Y$: $CHANCE|G$\n
End Hunt for the Seven Cities
§RYou cannot Hunt for the Seven Cities while exiled.§!
translation: §R在流亡期间你不能寻找黄金七城.§!

original: §RPrimitives cannot Hunt for the Seven Cities.§!
translation: §R原始国家无法寻找黄金七城.§!

original: §RYou can only Hunt for the Seven Cities in colonial regions!§!
translation: §R你只能够在殖民地区寻找黄金七城!§!

original: §RYou cannot Hunt for the Seven Cities if your capital is located in a colonial region.§!
translation: §R如果你的首都是在一个殖民地区，那么你不能寻找黄金七城.§!

original: Armies under orders to Hunt for the Seven Cities will automatically chart nearby unexplored provinces in search of the legendary Seven Cities of Gold.
translation: 收到命令去寻找黄金七城的军队会自动前往邻近的未探索省份去寻找传说中的黄金七城.

original: All $NUM$ building slots have been occupied by buildings here.
translation: 总共$NUM$个建筑槽位已被建筑占用。

original: You can build $NUM$ more buildings here.
Due to the amount of cannons in the fleet, the positioning can never be above §Y$VAL$§W% in combat.
translation: 由于舰队拥有的火炮数量，战斗中的部署值不能超过§Y$VAL$§W%.

original: Diplomacy can only take us so far. Let us give our support to the Commanderies and give the army the influence it deserves.
translation: 外交能做的到此为止了。让我们支持都督府，并给予军队其应有的影响力。

original: Foreign trade is the lifeblood of the Empire. We must strengthen the coastal bureaucrats so that they can bring wealth to our coffers.
translation: 对外贸易是帝国的命脉。我们必须加强沿海的官僚，这样他们就能为我们的国库带来财富。

original: The central administration is the fount upon which the entire empire rests. Let us strengthen the influence of the Confucian meritocrats so that we can build a strong and stable state.
translation: 中央行政机构是整个帝国所依赖的源泉。让我们加强这些儒教精英的影响力，从而建立一个强大而稳定的国家。

original: Your Army, excluding Artillery, cannot be comprised of more than §Y$MAX$%§W Cavalry or you will suffer the Insufficient Support penalty causing additional losses in combat.
translation: 在一场战斗中你骑兵的数量所占百分比不能超过（步兵和骑兵总数的）§Y$MAX$%§W，否则将将要受到步兵支援不足的惩罚

original: The Highlanders have come down to fight the English.
translation: 高地人赶来与英格兰人战斗.

original: By the constitution of the Holy Roman Empire, this province is considered unlawfully held.
translation: 根据神圣罗马帝国宪法，这个省份正被非法占有.

original: We now rule both Piedmont and Sardinia, and $MONARCH$ has decided to formally unite the dual kingdoms to one power: the kingdom of Sardinia-Piedmont, the true descendant of the Taurini and the Salassi.
translation: 我们现在统治着皮埃蒙特和撒丁岛，并且$MONARCH$决定正式将两个王国合二为一：撒丁-皮埃蒙特王国，陶里尼人与萨拉西人的真正传人。

original: We now rule both Piedmont and Sardinia, and $MONARCH$ has decided to formally unite the dual kingdoms to one power: the kingdom of Sardinia-Piedmont, the true descendant of the Taurini and the Salassi.
translation: 我们现在统治着皮埃蒙特和撒丁岛，并且$MONARCH$决定正式将两个王国合二为一：撒丁-皮埃蒙特王国，陶里尼人与萨拉西人的真正传人。

original: By the constitution of the Holy Roman Empire, this province is considered unlawfully held.
translation: 根据神圣罗马帝国宪法，这个省份正被非法占有.

original: A local powerful noble has gained control over this province, with almost full autonomy.
translation: 一名强大的本地贵族获得了这个省的控制权，拥有几乎完全的自主权
神圣罗马帝国的成员少于§Y$SIZE$§W\n
神圣罗马帝国至少有§Y$SIZE$§!个成员国。\n

original: The last vestiges of the Roman Empire are gone, and although many would make claim to the imperial crown, we are its true descendants. With all the ancestral lands united under our wise rule, we can usher in a new era of prosperity. We are the children of Rome - the people of Romania!
translation: 罗马帝国最后的遗迹也已被磨灭，尽管很多国家宣称他们是帝国皇冠的继承人，但我们才是罗马的真正子孙，我们将进入一个新的繁荣时代. 我们是罗马尼亚人，罗马之子!

original: The five ancient Patriarchates of Jerusalem, Alexandria, Antioch, Rome and Constantinople are in Orthodox hands - our hands - affirming the unity of the One Christian Church.
translation: 五大牧首区罗马、君士坦丁堡、安条克、耶路撒冷和亚历山大都已在正教徒——我们的手中，确保了基督教会的统一。

original: A significant part of the population in $PROVINCENAME$ dreams of independence under a local flag, despite the fact that they are so similar to us. All they need is some proper $COUNTRY_ADJ$ education!
translation: $PROVINCENAME$的一部分人梦想实现独立，尽管他们与我们的文化如此相近.他们需要$COUNTRY$化教育.

original: Have a strategic interest into becoming emperor themselves.
translation: 他们希望自己成为皇帝。

original: After converting to a new faith, the people are extremely resistant to convert back to what they once believed in.
translation: 在改变信仰后，人民极端不愿重新信奉他们以前信仰的宗教.

original: After converting to a new faith, our missionaries are feeling more zealous than usual.
translation: 在皈依新的信仰后，我们的传教士感觉比以往更为狂热了。

original: Sponsor a religious uprising, promoting our common faith, to destabilize the heretics. The rebel faction will be friendly towards us.
translation: 资助新宗教的崛起，促进我们共同的信仰并铲除异己.反叛的派系将会对我们示好.

original: \n(This deal is better than what we can expect, and with our low stability we cannot refuse!)
translation: \n(这笔交易比我们预期的好，再加上我们\n过低的稳定，所以我们不能拒绝!)

original: China, the Middle Kingdom, is vast, rich and self-sufficient. The attention of the sprawling Neo-Confucian bureaucracy is turned strictly inward - the rest of the world viewed with Xenophobia. If we want to expand and make effective use of our resources, we must reform and Westernize.
translation: 中国——意为天下居中之国，地大物博并能自给自足。新兴的儒教文官思想因此将中国自诩为天朝上邦——在别的国家看来就是仇外。如果我们想要继续发展并有效利用我们自身的资源，我们就必须要改革和西化。

original: - Receives the Insufficient Support penalty if the amount of Cavalry in an army is more than
translation: －会承受补给不足的惩罚，如果一支部队中骑兵的数量超过

original: Our Tribe is mightier than their Tribe!
translation: 我们部族比他们部族更强大！

original: There can be no peace between tribes and settlers!
translation: 游牧民族与定居者之间不可能存在和平！

original: This idea will be available at government technology §Y$NEWLEVEL$§W. We are currently at §Y$LEVEL$§W.
translation: 这个国家理念格将在行政等级§Y$NEWLEVEL$§W得到.我们目前的等级为§Y$LEVEL$§W

original: We are suffering the effects of §Rbankruptcy§W until §Y$DATE$§W.\nThis gives the following penalties:
translation: 我们不幸的受到§R破产§W效果影响，直到§Y$DATE$§W.\n这将受到以下惩罚..

original: We have granted local autonomy to the people in this province. We will not be able to get any income or manpower from this province during this period.
translation: 我们已经授予该省人民地方自治权。在此期间我们将不能从该省获得任何人力和收入。

original: We have reduced taxes in this province for the next decade.
translation: 我们已经降低了本省未来十年的税收.

original: We must occupy all of their provinces before we can annex them.
translation: 在吞并他们之前我们必须占领他们所有的省份.

original: Unless they are considered primitives or rebels, we cannot annex countries larger than §Y$NUMBER$§W provinces.
translation: 除非他们是原始国家或者叛军，否则我们不能吞并省份大于§Y$NUMBER$§W的国家.

original: The total peace cost of their provinces is too great.
translation: 他们省份的总胜利点数太高了.

original: You cannot dismantle the Empire once it has become hereditary.
translation: 你不能取缔实行世袭制后的神圣罗马帝国。

original: There is widespread discontent with our government's rule.
translation: 我们政府的统治引起了普遍的不满

original: As long as there are at least 25 princes in power in the Empire, we can benefit from the Imperial association.
translation: 只要帝国旗下至少有25名亲王为我们效力，我们就能从彼此的协作中受益

original: All Provinces of our Religious Group
translation: 我们宗教圈的所有省份

original: They are oppressing people of our Faith!
translation: 他们在镇压我们的教友!

original: Call a Sword Hunt and make your armies scour the proud empire of Japan to confiscate the weapons of your enemies and hear the lamentations of their women.
translation: 执行一次刀狩令，让你的军队沐浴一次日本帝国的荣耀，没收敌人的武器并聆听他们女人的哀歌吧.

original: We can forge a claim on the province of a fellow Daimyo, although at the cost of Infamy.
translation: 我们可以以背负骂名为代价，伪造属于大名的省份的宣称。

original: We can forge a claim on the province of a fellow Daimyo, although at the cost of Infamy.
translation: 我们可以以背负骂名为代价，伪造属于大名的省份的宣称。

original: This province is adjacent to §Y$WHO$§W and can thus not be a trade node itself.
translation: 该省份与§Y$WHO$§W接壤因此本身不能成为贸易节点。

original: Marketplaces increase production income in a province. This both increases the province's tax income and the value of trade generated in the local trade node. Any province that generates production income is a good place to build a marketplace, especially those contributing to the trade in a trade node that you dominate. In addition, because marketplaces contribute to the trade value of goods in provinces where they have been built, they are especially useful for raising the value of exotic or colonial products such as tea, spices, ivory, and so forth.
translation: 市场可以增加省份的生产收入。这将同时增加省份的税收收入和当地贸易节点产生的总贸易额。任何可以产生生产收入的省份都应该建造一个市场，尤其是那些对你所控制的贸易节点的贸易有贡献的省份。此外，由于市场也会提高所在省份的贸易品价值，对于提升舶来品或是殖民地产品如茶叶、香料、象牙等的价值也是特别有用。

original: Value of Trade Node less than
Value of Trade Node at least
translation: 贸易节点的价值不少于

original: Minimize competition for locally produced goods by restricting the type and amount of goods that are allowed to be sold or imported to local trade nodes.
translation: 通过限制可在本地贸易节点出售或引进的商品的种类和数量，可以最小化本地产的商品遭到的竞争.

original: You have not discovered this Trade Node.
translation: 你还没有发现此贸易节点

original: The Trade Node for the province is $NAME$. It belongs to $NATION$.
translation: 省份属于贸易节点$NAME$。该节点控制于$NATION$。

original: Do you wish to issue an embargo against $COUNTRY$ and reduce the power of their traders where we can? This will upset them.
translation: 你想要贸易禁运 $COUNTRY$ 并削弱他们的贸易竞争力？ 这将激怒他们。

original: Issue an Embargo and reduce the power of their traders in nodes where we have power. However this will also reduce our trade efficiency, unless they are our rivals.
translation: 实施贸易禁运可以降低他们商人在我们有影响力节点上的影响力。但这样也会降低我们贸易效率，除非他们是我们的宿敌。

original: Revoke the Embargo and stop competing against their traders.
translation: 撤销贸易禁运并停止和他们的商人竞争

original: The owner of this Trade Node has an embargo against this country.
translation: 该贸易节点的拥有者针对该国家有一条贸易禁运令

original: This Trade Node is worth a total of §Y$TOTAL$§W¤ each year. Our §Y$NUM$§W merchants are taking in §Y$VALUE$§W¤ of this.
translation: 该贸易节点每年产生的总价值为§Y$TOTAL$§W¤.我们的§Y$NUM$§W名商人获取其中的§Y$VALUE$§W¤.

original: These are the countries we are currently banning from our Trade Nodes. They cannot send any more merchants and their current merchants do not earn income. In addition any of our provinces that supply trade income to Trade Nodes that we do not own will not provide income to these countries. In general, countries are not well disposed to nations that ban their merchants. A trade embargo is a hostile act and the countries we ban will automatically have a Casus Belli against us.
translation: 这些国家是目前被我们的贸易节点所禁运的国家.他们无法再往我们的贸易节点派遣商人，并且目前已在的商人也无法获取收入.此外任何我方行省对非我方拥有的贸易节点提供的贸易收入不会提供给这些国家.通常来说，没有国家会喜欢别的国家禁止他们的商人.贸易禁运被视为敌对行为，被我们实施贸易禁运的国家对我们自然拥有宣战借口.

original: These are the countries that are banning us from their Trade Nodes. We cannot send any more merchants to their Trade Nodes. Also any of their provinces that are supplying trade income to a Trade Node that they do not own will not supply income to us. We consider a trade embargo a hostile act and we have a Casus Belli against any country that dares to embargo us.
translation: 这些是目前对我们实施贸易禁运的国家.我们不能派遣商人前去他们的贸易节点.他们的行省对非我方拥有的贸易节点提供的贸易收入不会提供给我方.我们把贸易禁运视为敌对行为，我们对任何胆敢对我方实施贸易禁运的国家都拥有宣战借口.

original: To the right of the province view, by the coins, is the provinces economic output. Below that is the provinces main resource and production. All produced resources are sent to a Trade Node where any nation may send merchants to compete for a share of the profit. Clicking on the Trade Node button takes you to the Trade Node subview.
translation: 在行省预览界面的右边，钱币旁的数字是行省的经济产出.在那下面的行省主要的资源和产品.所有产生的资源会被送到贸易节点中，那里任何有商人进驻的国家都会分享其产生的利润.点击贸易节点按钮将会打开贸易节点子界面.

original: Send a merchant to the Trade Node in $province$
translation: 派一名商人去$province$的贸易节点

original: To send a merchant to a Trade Node, click on a province that sends its produce to that node, then click on the button to access the Trade Node view. Merchants are sent through clicking on the send-button with a merchant icon.
translation: 要想派遣一个商人团去一个贸易节点，请点击一个向该节点输送产品的省份，然后点击按钮进入贸易节点界面。通过商人团图标上的派遣按钮就能将商人团派遣过去了。

original: To get a monopoly in a Trade Node you need to get six merchants into the Trade Node.
translation: 要想获得一个贸易节点的垄断地位，你需要将六名商人派到该贸易节点中

original: In countries economically dependent on trade, the likelihood of merchants demanding political recognition and power increases. With our country's capital located in a lucrative Trade Node, and with an established merchant class in place, we can form a trade league to better further our nation's economic interests.
translation: 对于那些经济仰赖于贸易的国家，商人对于政治的认可以及权力需求的可能性大大增加了.我们国家的首都位于一处物产丰富的贸易节点，同时当地已有既定的商人阶层，我们可以通过建立一个贸易联盟来进一步提高我国的经济利益.

original: In countries economically dependent on trade, the likelihood of merchants demanding political recognition and power increases. With our country's capital located in a lucrative Trade Node, and with an established merchant class in place, we can form a trade league to better further our nation's economic interests.
translation: 国家经济依赖贸易，商人们可能提出政治认同和要求提高政治权利。我们的首都位于一个有利可图的贸易节点，在这里建立商人阶级后，我们能够形成贸易联盟有效扩大我们的经济收益。

original: The aristocracy of our country has achieved a position of complete political and economic dominance. With demands from leading aristocratic families for ever increasing privileges, we are now in a position to reform our government into an Oligarchic Republic.
translation: 我们国内的贵族掌握了政治和经济的支配地位，随着领头贵族家族要求更多的特权，我们现在需要改革我们的政府为寡头共和制。

original: It is time we leave the rule of our state to those who truely know the will of the divine! The Clergy of our state has managed to reach a position of such political dominance that they are now demanding to have the political power formally surrendered to them.
translation: 现在是把我们的统治权交给真正知道神圣意志的人！我们国家的神职人员已经取得了政治统治地位，他们现在需求政治权利的正式交接。

original: Double clicking will send a merchant to the selected Trade Node
translation: 鼠标双击将一名商人派到选中的贸易节点

original: Using this function will allow you to quickly send merchants to Trade Nodes around the world with minimal effort.
translation: 使用此功能可以使你很方便的将你的商人快速地分派到世界各地的贸易节点

original: You can only create Trade Nodes in provinces that you own.
translation: 你只能在你拥有的省份里创建贸易节点。

original: You must have the province under your control if you want to create a Trade Node.
translation: 如果你想要创建一个贸易节点就必须有该省份的控制权。

original: If there is a siege in a province, it is not possible to create a new Trade Node.
translation: 无法在被围攻的省份创建新的贸易节点。

original: It is not possible to create a Trade Node in a mere colony.
translation: 在纯粹的殖民地上无法创建贸易节点

original: You cannot split off a new Trade Node from one of YOUR OWN nodes.
translation: 你不能从你自身的节点中分离出一个新的贸易节点

original: There is already a Trade Node in this province.
translation: 该省份已有一个贸易节点。

original: A province can only create a new Trade Node if the node it is attached to is rich enough to support a split. $WHO$ is only valued at $CURRENT$, while it needs to be worth at least $VALUE$.
translation: 一个省份只有当其附属的贸易节点非常富有时才能通过分离创建一个新的贸易节点。$WHO$的价值只有$CURRENT$，而创建新节点至少需要$VALUE$的价值。

original: You need at least $VALUE$ to create a new Trade Node.
translation: 你需要至少$VALUE$来创建一个新的贸易节点

original: Create a new Trade Node in this province for $VALUE$.
translation: 在该省份花费$VALUE$创建一个新的贸易节点。

original: Create a new Trade Node in $PROV$.
translation: 在$PROV$创建一个新的贸易节点

original: You can only destroy Trade Nodes in your own provinces.
translation: 你只能破环属于省份里的贸易节点。

original: You can only destroy Trade Nodes in your provinces you control.
translation: 你只能破环你控制省份的贸易节点。

original: If there is a siege in a province, it is not possible to destroy a Trade Node.
translation: 无法破坏被围攻的省份的贸易节点。

original: There is no Trade Node in this province.
You can only destroy a Trade Node if is its poor enough. $WHO$ is only valued at $CURRENT$, while it needs to be worth less than $VALUE$.
translation: 只有在节点过于贫穷时才能毁掉一个贸易节点.$WHO$的价值是$CURRENT$，要想毁掉它则价值要少于$VALUE$.

original: Value contributed to the Trade Node.
The Trade Node is §Y$VAL$§W from our closest province. Our maximum range is §Y$MAX$§W.
translation: 该贸易节点距我们最近的省份§Y$VAL$§W。我们可支持最长的距离为§Y$MAX$§W。

original: How many free slots this Trade Node has.
translation: 这个贸易节点空余栏位的数量。

original: If there are no free slots, then a merchant needs first to be spent competing out another merchant from this trade node.
translation: 如果没有空余栏位，一名商人会被消耗掉用以将其他商人从这个贸易节点中竞争出局

original: Trade Nodes grow stagnant if the total value of trade is too low, or too few countries have sent merchants there. Eventually, stagnant trade nodes will be destroyed.
translation: 如果贸易总值太低或是派去商人的国家太少，那个贸易节点的增长就会发生停滞.而停滞中的贸易节点最终都会被摧毁.

original: Abandon all our merchants in this Trade Node. This will completely remove our presence in this Trade Node.
translation: 放弃贸易节点我方所有的商人.这样做会使我方彻底放弃对该贸易节点影响

original: The Hansa port cities have long been the center of Danish trade, however, this situation is no longer suitable. Denmark must control the major ports along the Baltic coast by any means possible.
translation: 汉萨的港口城市一直以来都是丹麦贸易的重心，但如今这样的情况已不复存在了.因此丹麦需要不惜一切代价控制波罗的海沿岸的一处主要港口.

original: Population of Settlers in $WHERE$ changed by $PERC$.\n
is equal to or less than
We currently have no decisions to make in this province
translation: 当前在该省份没有可用的决议
没有在被强制转换信仰

original: Heresy has spread like a cancer throughout the province.
translation: 异教像癌症一样在省内传播.

original: Religious fanatics have forcibly converted this province to their faith, those who would not submit killed or driven from their homes.
translation: 宗教狂热者强制性地把省份宗教改成了他们的信仰，不从的人都被杀死或者驱逐.

original: Peasant insurgents have seized the province, stubbornly refusing to pay taxes.
translation: 叛乱的农民占领了省份，拒绝交税.

original: We have adopted a slightly different interpretation of the Faith.
translation: 我们接受了一个对信仰稍微不同的解释。

original: We are engaged in the Holy War against the Infidel. God shall grant us victory!
translation: 我们加入的对抗异教徒的圣战。神将保佑我们取得胜利！

original: Our ruler has been excommunicated. May God have mercy on the sinner's soul!
translation: 我们的统治者被绝罚了。愿天主宽恕罪人的灵魂！

original: §Y$FIRST$§! would not trust §Y$SECOND$§! to die properly.
§Y$FIRST$§! expects §Y$SECOND$§! to break every deal and alliance.

translation: §Y$FIRST$§! 信任 §Y$SECOND$§! ,愿意接受他们提出的要求.

original: §Y$SECOND$§! is a human player and should never be trusted.
translation: §Y$SECOND$§!是一位永远不能相信的人类玩家。

original: They are a human player and may ignore this.
translation: 他们是人类玩家，有可能选择忽略。

original: §R$SIZE$§Y $TYPE$§W regiment(s) rise up in revolt in §Y$WHERE$§W.\n
Are you sure you wish to accept the demands of the §Y$NAME$§W?
Tolerance represents your acceptance of different religions within your nation. Low tolerance will affect provinces negatively, for example by increasing the local and global unrest.
translation: 容忍度代表了你的国家对于不同信仰的接受程度. 低宽容度会导致相应非国教省份的减成，比如会增加本地和全局的叛乱度等等.

original: Tolerance of the $FAITH|Y$ Faith and the Syncretic $SYNCRETIC|Y$ Faith.
translation: 正统信仰$FAITH|Y$和相容信仰$SYNCRETIC|Y$的容忍度。

original: Tolerance of the $FAITH|Y$ Faith and the Harmonized Faith $HARMONIZEDLIST|Y$.
translation: 对 $FAITH|Y$ 信仰和已融合宗教 $HARMONIZEDLIST|Y$ 的宽容度。

original: Tolerance of the $FAITH|Y$ Faith and the Harmonized Faiths $HARMONIZEDLIST|Y$.
translation: 对 $FAITH|Y$ 信仰和已融合宗教 $HARMONIZEDLIST|Y$ 的宽容度。

original: The Cardinal has been influenced too recently. We must wait until
translation: 这个枢机最近才被影响过，我们必须等到

original: Do you wish to call for a Crusade against $COUNTRY$? This will give Catholic countries a significant manpower and income bonus while at war with the Infidel.
translation: 你确定要发动对 $COUNTRY$ 的十字军战争？ 这将会给所有跟这个国家处在战争中的天主教国家带来额外的人力和收入.

original: Crusades give Catholic countries a significant manpower and income bonus while at war with them.
translation: 十字军会给跟他们作战的天主教国家带来额外的人力和收入。

original: We have already called for a Crusade against them.
translation: 我们已经对他们发动了十字军。

original: Do you wish to excommunicate $MONARCH$? Neighboring Catholic countries will not need a Casus Belli against $COUNTRY$.
translation: 你希望对$MONARCH$施以绝罚吗？邻近的天主教国家对$COUNTRY$开战将不再需要宣战理由。

original: Excommunication will allow neighboring Catholic nations to declare war on them without suffering the normal stability hit of lacking a Casus Belli.
translation: 绝罚将允许其天主教邻国对他们宣战，而不会受到缺乏战争理由导致的稳定度惩罚。

original: They currently have no ruler to excommunicate.
translation: 他们现在没有统治者以供绝罚。
我们只能绝罚天主教徒。

original: We cannot excommunicate rulers left and right! We must wait, at least until
translation: 我们不能到处绝罚统治者！再次执行绝罚前需要等到

original: The Pope has seen fit to excommunicate this ruler. Neighboring Catholic countries can declare war without incurring the normal stability hits.
translation: 教宗认为应该对这个统治者施以绝罚。相邻的天主教国家可以对他们宣战而不会受到稳定度惩罚。

original: Catholics all over the world are encouraged to attack §Y$NAME$§W in the name of Our Lord! The Crusade will last until $DATE$ or until the Infidel has been destroyed.
translation: 以主之名，世界上所有的天主教徒都被鼓励来攻击§Y$NAME$§W！征伐将会持续到$DATE$或是异教徒彻底被消灭。

original: The Pope has already launched a Crusade. We must wait for it to end before calling another.
translation: 教宗已经发起了一次十字军。我们必须等到它结束才能发起另外一场。

original: While tempting, we cannot launch a Crusade against fellow Christians, heretics or not.
translation: 虽然很有诱惑力，但我们不能对其他基督徒发动十字军，即便他们是异端。

original: Peasant insurgents have had enough of oppression and crushing taxes. They are poorly equipped and trained, chiefly mustering infantry.
translation: 农民叛军受够了压迫和苛刻的税收，揭竿而起. 他们装备很差，缺少训练，主要是应征步兵.

original: Revolutionary rebels are out to topple the regime, which they regard as corrupt and deeply unjust. They believe in their cause, and are led by disillusioned burghers and military officers.
translation: 革命者叛军是来推翻政府的，他们认为现今的政府充斥着腐败和不公正. 他们坚信自己的信念，由觉醒的市民和军官领导.

original: Heretic rebels espouse a different interpretation of the Faith and are willing to die for their cause. They often muster a core of trained soldiers who have been swayed by the heretical beliefs.
translation: 异端叛军支持对信仰的另一种诠释并愿意为此而死。其核心成员通常是被异端信仰侵蚀的士兵。

original: Religious fanatics tend to rise up in provinces controlled by nations of a different faith. They seek to spread their faith and smite all unbelievers.
translation: 宗教狂热者会在不同信仰的国家控制的省份起义. 他们希望传播自己的信仰，击败不信者.

original: Separatist rebels want freedom for their people. They are well led and equipped, but will tend to stay in provinces of their own culture.
translation: 分离主义者想要解放他们的人民。他们组织和装备都很好但倾向于占据他们文化的省份。

original: Noble rebels are dissatisfied with their monarch, usually due to liberal reforms. They field professional troops with a large proportion of cavalry.
translation: 贵族叛军对自己的君主不满，通常是因为自由主义改革. 他们部队中很大部分是骑兵.

original: Colonial Separatists are tired of years of inequality and misrule, seeking independence from their distant mother nation.
translation: 殖民地独立者厌倦了长年的不平等和暴政，希望从他们遥远的祖国中独立出来.

original: Patriot rebels dream of unification with their cultural kin under a free banner. Beware, for provinces taken by them may defect.
translation: 爱国者梦想着自己文化的统一. 小心，被他们占领的省份可能会转投其他国家.

original: Through conquest and diplomacy Russia has managed to transform from a mere settlement into a dominant principality. After several eastern expeditions the Mongol hordes have finally been subdued and a centralized Russian state, ruled under the suzerainty of the Tsar, is emerging. Influences from Western Europe are helping us modernize and reform our nation and Western style of education is being adopted.
translation: 通过征服以及外交，俄罗斯已经成功从罗斯人聚居地转变为一个大公国。经过几次东征，蒙古汗国也终于被征服，一个由沙皇统治的集权式俄罗斯国家崛起了。来自西欧的影响正帮助我们实现现代化，改革我们的国家。同时，我国也会采用西式教育。

original: The Dutch are emerging as one of Europe's most capable naval and colonial powers. Lucrative trade opportunities, locally and overseas, have resulted in a swift evolution for the country into one of the first capitalist countries in the world.
translation: 尼德兰是作为欧洲最有实力的海军和殖民国家登场的. 本地和海外商机带来的大量收益，使这个国家进化成了世界上最大的资本主义国家之一.

original: Global expansion in newly discovered areas and the establishment of colonies is transforming Spain into one of the most powerful and wealthiest nations of our time. Spanish explorers are constantly moving into new lands and extending our borders. Immense amounts of gold and silver are being brought back to our motherland, filling the coffers of our state Treasury.
translation: 在新大陆的全面扩张以及殖民地的大量建立使得西班牙成为了当时最强大也最富有的国家之一。西班牙的探险者们不懈地探索着未知的地域，扩展着我们的疆界。无数的黄金白银被运回祖国，填满了国库。

original: Trade has long been a foundation of English national policy. By extending our influence across borders and controlling its political development domestically, we have managed to become one of the foremost European powers. Our colonial expansion is becoming a major factor in promoting our nation's economic growth, reinforcing our position in world affairs.
translation: 贸易长久以来就是英格兰的基本国策. 通过扩展我们在国界以外的影响力和家族式地控制国家的发展. 我们成功地成为了欧洲最强大的国家. 殖民扩展成了国家经济增长的一个重要因素，这进一步巩固了我们在国际上的地位.

original: This year will mark the beginning of an evolutionary period for our nation. The old feudal ways will begin to make way for a more modern centralized nation. Although struggling financially due to miscalculated projects and military campaigns, we have managed to transform ourselves into one of the most dominant powers of Europe.
translation: 今年将会是标志着我国进入进化时期的一年.传统的封建方式将会在一个更现代化的集权式国家中消失.尽管由于项目预算失误以及军备竞争加剧，我们的财政面临窘境，但我们还是设法将我们转变成了欧洲最具统治力的强国之一.

original: As the heart of the Renaissance, our nation is blossoming culturally. We have just entered the beginning of what looks like a prolonged artistic rebellion, especially in the field of architecture and literature. The cultural evolution is not aiding our country in maintaining peace within our borders however. Our country is continuously stricken by foreign states seeking power and territorial gain.
translation: 作为文艺复兴的中心，我们国家的文化蓬勃发展. 我们已经进入了一个持久的艺术革命的时代，特别是在建筑和文学方面. 但是文化革命却没能帮助我们的国家保持内部的和平. 我们一直被外来的追求力量和侵吞领土的国家侵扰着.

original: Regardless of the absence of a strong, central authority, our nation is prospering. The Hanseatic League, formed by hundreds of towns in northern Germany, has contributed to the prosperity of our nation. Intellectual growth, combined with sea and overland trading, has also helped spur the development and transform our country into a wealthy manufacturing center.
translation: 尽管我们缺少一个强大集权的中央机关，我们的国家仍然在蓬勃发展着.由德国北部数百个城镇组成的汉萨同盟对我国的发展起了至关重要的作用.通过结合海路与陆路贸易所增长的智慧也有助于刺激我们的发展进步，并将我们的国家转变欧洲一个富裕的生产制造中心.

original: At the mere age of 15, $MONARCH$ has taken his father's position as head of the Shiite Turkmen tribe. He has quickly established a base of power in the northwest and proclaimed himself Shah of Iran. Several of the neighboring regions have been conquered and the possibility of a resurrected Iranian nation doesn't seem so absent anymore.
translation: 年仅15岁的$MONARCH$取代了他的父亲成为了什叶派土库曼部落的首领.很快他就在西北部建立了一个权力基地并宣称自己为伊朗王.周边的几个地区已经被征服了，伊朗民族国家的再度崛起看来并不是没有可能的.

original: $MONARCH$ has begun to lay the foundation of his new empire. Although inferior in numbers, his well-disciplined troops have managed to achieve several decisive victories against the Sultans of India. The battle of $CAPITAL$ became the first great victory in a series of territorial expansions and, with time, the empire of the Mughals could stretch over the larger part of the Indian plateau.
translation: $MONARCH$已经为他的新帝国奠定了坚实的基础。虽然人数不多，但他纪律严明的军队在对抗印度苏丹的战役中打了不少的胜仗。特别是$CAPITAL$之战成为了这一系列扩展疆土的战役中的第一个胜仗。在不久的将来，莫卧儿帝国将横扫整个印度半岛。

original: For decades England has attempted to subjugate the Irish population and take control of the island. To unite the Irish lands under a sole flag may be our only chance to repel them.
translation: 数十年来英格兰一直都想征服爱尔兰人并占领爱尔兰岛. 将整个岛屿联合在一个旗帜之下或许能帮助我们驱除这些侵略者.

original: By uniting our political development domestically and extending our influence beyond our borders we will be able to reinforce our position in world affairs and transform into one of the foremost European powers, the British Empire.
translation: 通过家族式联合政治发展及在国外影响力的提升，我们成功地巩固了在国际事务中的地位并且转变成了欧洲最强大的国家之一，不列颠帝国.

original: After various excursions through Western Europe, $MONARCH$ is more determined than ever that extensive westernized reforms have to be implemented to fight the backwardness of our country. Skilled workers and scientists are being brought back to us in an effort to westernize the nation and make it more modern. The military is undergoing an extensive reorganization and so are production and agricultural techniques.
translation: 在游历了西欧诸国之后，$MONARCH$更加下定决心要在我们的国家进行全面的西式改革，一改我国落后的现状.有经验的工人以及科学家被请到这里致力于西化并使我们的国家更加现代化.军事、经济、农业技术也都在进行着全面的重组与改革.

original: $MONARCH$ has become known not only as a great conqueror but also as a great consolidator and reformer. His competent rule has laid the foundation for the modernization of our country. He is a great admirer of the advancement of the West and, with the help of foreign advisors, he has begun an extensive cultural and military reform.
translation: $MONARCH$不仅作为一名伟大的征服者，同时也作为一名伟大的重组改革家而出名.他主持的法规已经成为我们国家迈向现代化的基石.他是一名西方先进文化的崇拜者，在外国顾问的帮助下，他已经对文化和军事开始了全面的改革.

original: Foreign explorers and settlers from all over Europe have progressively colonized an increasingly large part of our country. New diseases in combination with enslavement and exploitation have wiped out a large part of our population, shredding our cultural icons and values into pieces and promoting Western thoughts and ideas to replace them.
translation: 来自欧洲各地的探险家和移民已经渐渐地将我们大部分的国家殖民化了.由奴隶制度与剥削制度所结合产生的弊病已经削减了我们大部分的人口，将我们的传统文化价值观念抛弃，并用先进的西方观念思想来取代他们把.

original: We currently have no active mission.
translation: 我们当前没有激活的任务

original: Since time immemorial, $PROVINCENAME$ has rightfully belonged to our great nation. Our spies report that the population yearns to rejoin us and that in every home flags and weapons are hidden in case our troops arrive to free them of their oppressors.
translation: 从很久以前起， $PROVINCENAME$ 已经正当地属于我们伟大的国家了. 这将是个解放的纪元，非法占有它的国家应当被处理.

original: Our nobility have come to us with an interesting proposal. If we were to grant them the Liberum Veto they would in return give us substantial support during the current war. Although their offer is very generous indeed, some of our advisors are suggesting that this could just be the thin edge of the wedge. In fact although they will get angry if we refuse them, they will most definitely prey on any future weakness we show to demand further concessions.
translation: 我们的贵族有一个有趣的提议。如果我们实行自由选举制，他们就会在战争中支持我们。 尽管他们的提议确实很慷慨，但是我们的一些顾问认为贵族们还会得寸进尺。实际上，如果我们拒绝，虽然当下他们会感到愤怒，但他们还是会等待我们在将来暴露出任何一个弱点时再强迫我们做出让步。

original: Our interest in an East India Company is based chiefly on hopes and ambitions aroused by the enormous revenues produced by the initial ventures of other companies. At the same time, there is also a desire upon the part of $MONARCH$ to play a dominant role in contemporary world trade, a desire that isn't necessarily wholeheartedly endorsed by our country's local merchants.
translation: 我们对东印度贸易公司的兴趣源自于其他公司初始的风险投资带来的巨大的财政收入引起的希望和雄心. 同时，$MONARCH$ 也希望在同时期的世界贸易中处于主宰地位，这个愿望不一定非得要我国本地商人的全力支持.

original: Own a port province in India, China, Japan or the East Indies.
translation: 在印度，中国，日本或东印度群岛拥有一个港口省份。

original: God's will has been made clear to you:
translation: 上帝的意志已经向你表明

original: In the name of Allah, you must
In the name of God, we must
It would be most prudent to
translation: 我们必须采取谨慎的行动

original: The spirits have spoken. You must
translation: 古老的灵魂发话了. 你必须

original: Our finances are poor. We should
translation: 我们的国家很穷. 我们必须

original: Our advisors have convinced us of the benefits of a large gold reserve. Amassing wealth now will ensure our success in times of crisis.
translation: 我们的顾问说明了大量黄金储备的好处. 积聚财富将保证我们在困难时期的成功.

original: Vengeance shall be ours! We must
translation: 我们应当复仇! 我们必须

original: The Church has tasked you with a sacred quest:
translation: 教会给了你一个神圣的任务:

original: It is an intolerable offense to every true Christian that the city of our Lord is in infidel hands. Like the brave Crusaders of old, we must assemble a mighty host and drive the heathens out of Jerusalem!
translation: 我主的城市落到了异教徒的手上，任何一个真正的基督徒都不能忍受这一行为. 我们必须像过去的勇敢的十字军战士一样聚集起来，把异教徒驱赶出耶路撒冷.

original: Our national pride demands that we
translation: 我们的国家尊要要求我们

original: As a naval power, we must have a fleet big enough to defend our coastlines. We need to construct more ships of the line.
translation: 作为一个海军国家，我们必须有一支强大的舰队来保护国家的海岸线. 我们需要建造更多的主力舰.

original: Our national pride demands that we
translation: 我们的国家尊要要求我们

original: No other nation should have a bigger fleet than we do! We need to increase the size of our fleet until we have the most ships of the line.
translation: 没有任何一个其他国家可以有比我们更强大的舰队! 我们需要扩大舰队的规模，拥有最多的主力舰.

original: As long as there is still a city in Hispania ruled by the infidels, we cannot stop our holy mission! We need to liberate the entire Iberian Peninsula from the Moors!
translation: 只要伊比利亚半岛还有一座城市处于异教徒的控制之中，我们就不能停止我们神圣的事业！我们需要从摩尔人手中解放整个伊比利亚半岛！

original: It is our holy mission to drive the moors out of Hispania, and being at peace with them is an affront to God. We must declare war on Granada immediately, else we will be condemned as sinners.
translation: 把异教徒驱赶出伊比利亚半岛是我们神圣的任务，跟他们保持和平状态简直是对上帝的侮辱. 我们必须立刻向格拉纳达宣战，否则我们将作为罪人被处罚.

original: There are still Moors following the Muslim faith in Hispania. They must be converted or driven out, God will not accept anything less. These new converts will gladly contribute to our Holy Church.
translation: 在伊比利亚半岛仍然有追随者伊斯兰教信仰的摩尔人.他们必须被转化或者驱逐，这是主所能接受的最底线.这些新近被转化的教徒将会对我们神圣的教会做出很大奉献.

original: We need to secure Hispania by establish a presence across the sea to the south. A few Christian cities there should be a safe protection for our realm.
translation: 我们必须到达南方沿海省份以保证伊比利亚半岛的安全. 一些基督教城市可以为我们的王国提供保护.

original: We can go West to India
translation: 我们可以向西到印度去

original: Although there are vast expanses of ocean, the winds favor traveling to the west. Our navigators believe they can reach India, if only they are given the proper support.
translation: 尽管海洋十分的广袤，但风似乎更倾向于吹向西部.我们的航海家相信只要我们给予适当的支持，他们就能到达印度.

original:
There lies Peru with its riches.
Here, Panama and its poverty.
Choose, each man, what best becomes a brave Castilian.
— Francisco Pizarro
translation:
那里是富饶的秘鲁。
这里是贫瘠的巴拿马。
能做出最正确的选择的人才配称为勇敢的卡斯蒂利亚人。
—— 弗朗西斯科·皮萨罗

original: The Aztecs need to be saved!

Our priests are worried about the eternal salvation of the Aztecs, they need to be brought into the worship of our Lord and Savior. Non nobis, Domine, Domine, non nobis, Domine. Sed nomini, sed nomini, tuo da gloriam.
translation: 我们的牧师担心阿兹特克人的永恒的救赎，他们得对我们的主和救世主的充满敬仰.

original: Our nation lacks a proper shipyard, where we can construct the fleets we need so much. We now have the technology to construct one of these, and we should put that knowledge into action.
translation: 我国缺少一个合适的造船厂，那儿我们可以建造我们现在急需的舰队.现在我们已经拥有建造造船厂的技术了，我们应该把这些理论付诸行动

original: The cultural identity of the ruling elite is shifting, as our $PRIMARY_CULTURE$ heritage is gradually losing ground to the language and traditions of $CAPITAL$.
translation: 精英通知阶层的文化正在转变，我们的$PRIMARY_CULTURE$的遗产正逐渐被$CAPITAL$的文化和语言所替代.
成立斯堪的纳维亚联邦

original: For untold centuries the Kingdoms of the North have been divided and locked in internecine power struggles. Previous attempts at Union have ultimately failed, to the delight of their European neighbors. Even so, the vision of a lasting union remains a tantalizing possibility...
translation: 在很多个世纪以来，北方分裂成了多个王国，他们自相残杀，两败俱伤. 先前的联合的尝试最终彻底失败了，那些欧洲邻国应该会相当高兴吧. 尽管如此，一个持久的联邦依然是有可能的.

original: Establish a Presence in the Caribbean
The natives of the Islands here in the Indies are both pagans and have gold, it is our duty to bring them the light of the faith and enrich the crown.
translation: 这些岛上讲着印地语的土著人不仅是异教徒还很有钱，给他们带去信仰的光辉并为我们的国家创造财富是我们的职责所在.

original: Our explorers have yet to find the Indies, we believe that huge and wealthy lands lie to the South and West. We must find them for the glory of our country.
translation: 我们的探险家已经发现了西印度群岛，我们坚信在西边或南边还有一块遍布财富的大陆，为了祖国的荣耀，我们必须发现它们。

original: We have discovered rich lands with new opportunities, our explorers have heard tales that the legendary El Dorado is to found somewhere here, so we must claim these lands.
translation: 我们发现了带着新机遇与挑战的富饶土地，我们的探险家在这里还听到了关于某处有传奇的黄金国的传说，所以我们必须要宣示对这些岛屿的所有权。

original: We have discovered the region of La Plata, it has rich lands and a perfect natural harbor. We must claim these lands for the crown.
translation: 我们发现了拉普拉塔地区，这里有富饶的土地和完美的天然海港。为了国王我们必须对这片土地宣示所有权。

original: Our navigators have heard tales of rich lands somewhere to the south. We must find these lands before others do.
translation: 我们的航海家听说过南方某处有富饶的土地的传闻.我们必须赶在其他人之前找到这片土地.

original: The Savage Zapotecs must be destroyed!
translation: 野蛮的萨巴特克人应当被毁灭!
